2a1(mdo sde): // snying ngo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
2a2(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la ti ka na/ gnas
2b1(mdo sde): thub pa 'idang seng rnams kya gnas na/ na thus chen par dang bAr
2b2(mdo sde): 'dres pa'o/ de ge steng gi dge 'dun chen pa dang thabs gcig ge/ 
2b3(mdo sde): pe gang ga'i klung gu ba mi snyidang dpag tu med/ grangs me dpa'i byang chub
2b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 
3a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar phyin ma thag tu/ yang
3a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na// nub phyogs na/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che brgya drag stong du mas bskor cing
3a3(mdo sde): mdun du bdang po'i yid nga ni na gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste/ yang nor bu rin po che de'i 'od
3a4(mdo sde): kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gzugs su snang ba thams cad
3a5(mdo sde): ma lus par mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gang lha dang / mi rnams dang
3b1(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams dang /  gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gang sa dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung rnams
3b2(mdo sde): kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba chen po ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag thams cad ma lus par
3b3(mdo sde): spangs par gyur cing / nor bu rin po che snang ngo // lhag ma dag kyang mtha' yas mu med pa/ 
3b4(mdo sde): brjod du med pa/ nam mkha 'a bzhin du snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham ma/ ldan
3b5(mdo sde): ni/ lding nger gyur to// gang yang sems ci ni der 'dus pa de dag kyang / bdag kyang mi mthong / gci
3b6(mdo sde): la gcig kyang mi mthong ngo // de dag la 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gag nas
4a1(mdo sde): yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to// bdag bdag gi lus kyi gzugs dang / mtshan dang / 
4a2(mdo sde): dbyibs dngareg pa yang mi dmigs par gyur te/ gang dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de
4a3(mdo sde): dag stong par mthong ngo // nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kyang mi mthong ngo // skar ma
4a4(mdo sde): gzugs dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung
4a5(mdo sde): gi khams kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur te// sgra dag kyang rna ba'i bu gar grag par gyur ma
4a6(mdo sde): gyur to// dri dag kyang sA la zla bar ma b+hir+yA // sems dang sems las byung ba la ying
4a7(mdo sde): bajig gir bya ba dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung bar gyur to// yang 'byung ba
4b1(mdo sde): chen po dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te/ phyogs gang dang / gang tu brtogs pa de dang de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan pa
4b2(mdo sde): kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugasu mthong bar gyur to// rgyang ma nas brgya thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches bskor ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba
4b3(mdo sde): gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gang de na byang chub sems dpas bcu la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob pa/ skye ba gcig
4b4(mdo sde): gis thogs pa srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas/ 'jigs par mi byed/ sngags par mi byed/ skrag par mi byed/ chos thams cad rang bzhin
4b5(mdo sde): gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyi//  dang / stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas/ de'i phyir de dag 'jigs par mi byed/ spangs par mi byed
4b6(mdo sde): skrag par mi byed// gang lhag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / lha dag dang / klu dag dang / gnod sbyin dag
4b7(mdo sde): dang / dri za dag dang / lha ma yin dag dang / nam mkha' lding dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dregs dang / sha za dang
4b8(mdo sde): bsnyen srul po dang / lus srul po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad 'jigs par gyur/ spangs par gyur/ skye bar gyur nas
5a1(mdo sde): rol dang / pha rol la rmongs shing // sems 'khrugs nas/ de dag gcig la gcig kyang mi mthong / de na 'di ji zhig 'a
5a2(mdo sde): lta bu zhig/ 'di ji'i rang bzhin zhes 'dri ba yang gang yang mi snang // yang de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzer
5a3(mdo sde): bu zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/ chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la// gang zag gang
5a4(mdo sde): ngag ma 'o tshal ba// gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur nas// dbang po drug la rmongs par gyur// phung po gcig ni mi mthong zhing // gzugs kyi phung
5a5(mdo sde): la bgyid de/ 'di la gang zag kha cig ni// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag la// chos kyi de
5a6(mdo sde): bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs// de dag tshu rol pha rol la// bzod pa na mkha'i mtshan 'tshal to// 'di na mnyam bzhag dpa' ba ste// brjod du med pa'i
5a7(mdo sde): gnas lags so// rin chen chen po yid bzhin nor// spyi bo la ni mchis par gang // nor bu rin chen brgya byin thogs// gang gis rgyang tha
5a8(mdo sde): nas mthong ba// sems can de dag skal pa che// dpa' 'gro shin tu pha rol mchi// ston pa lta bar mchis po rnams// de dag thams
5b1(mdo sde): rang che// de ring 'di ni zab mo'i gtam// mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal// bcom ldan gang dag 'dir phyin pa'i// sems can gal dbugs dbyu
5b2(mdo sde): mdzod// sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir// 'di ni dpa' bo'i spyod yulo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin to/ 
5b3(mdo sde): grang na kun gzhi thos 'gyur zhing // shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas// de ni ting 'dzin spyod yul lo// de ni namakha'i snying po yaM// byang chub
5b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' spyod yul te// snang ba med cing spros med pa'i// ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan// lta ba gnyis la gang chags pa// phyi phyir zhing
5b5(mdo sde): ni rmongs par 'gyur// rtag dang chad la chags pa ni// pha rol tshu rol shin tu rmongs// lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las// rab tu grol
5b6(mdo sde): bar su 'dod pa// brjod du med par bsgom par gyis// de ni myur du sa 'thob 'gyur// kye grogs po dag/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
5b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po las thog ma pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyis/ dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya ste/ 'di
5b8(mdo sde): lta ste/ ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin skye zhing 'jig pa shes par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du mang pa
6a1(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid mi skye ba/ mi 'gag pa/ mi dmigs pa/ cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du byed thams cad bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang
6a2(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs mi spangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la tshogs par dmigs
6a3(mdo sde): pa'i sems su ma gyur par byas na/ de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing / phyin chad kyang chad pa dang / rtag par mi gnas
6a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ 'khor de lhags pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji ltar mthong
6a5(mdo sde): ba dang thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes pa de bzhin du 'khor der mtho nga bar gyur pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
6a6(mdo sde): kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho dang
6a7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ ye shes na mkha' dong mtshungs pa/ brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa/ bzod pa rdo rje
6a8(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gan su 'gro ba rnams kyi ded dpon lta bu
6b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ga thams cad kyi ni gter lta bu sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni bum pa bzang po lta bu/ mun par bcug pa rnams kyi na nyim
6b2(mdo sde): lam stor ba rnams kyi ni zla ba lta bu// 'jigs pa rnams kyi ni ri rab lta bu// nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis yongasu gdungs pa rnams kyi ni sman bcu
6b3(mdo sde): khu ba dam pa lta bu// dge ba'i rtsa ba chang de lhung ba rnams kyi khar ba lta bu/ phreng bas 'tsho ba rnams kyi ni me tog lta bu/ sdom pa spyod pa rnams
6b4(mdo sde): kyi ni me long lta bu/ ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa yongasu spangs pa rnams kyi ni gos lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni zam pa lnga
6b5(mdo sde): bu pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi ni gru lta bu// mtho ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni sras lta bu/ tshig ngan pa dang skur pas nyan pa rnams
6b6(mdo sde): gdugs lta bu/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni seng ge lta bu/ char ba rnams kyi ni chu lta bu/ bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni go cha lta bu/ bslab pa
6b7(mdo sde): 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni mig 'byed pa lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bru thams cad kyi ni sa lta bu/ nang pa rnams kyi ni sman pa lta bu/ bkras pa rnams byin
6b8(mdo sde): 'bru lta bu/ skom pa rnams kyi ni zla ba'i nor bu lta bu/ ngal ba rnams kyi ni mal lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni
7a1(mdo sde): / nyi ma'i nor du lta bu/ byang chub kyi lar du zhugs pa rnams kyi dri shing rda lta bu/ skyed re tshil rwa rtseng rnams kyi ri rdzing bu lwa bu/ byang chud kyi phyogs
7a2(mdo sde): la brtson pa rnams kyi phreng ba lta bu de tshur 'ong ste/ rigs kyi bu de pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu lte bu/ rigs kyi bu des bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi ro rer du yid bzhin
7a3(mdo sde): lta bu rigs kyi bu de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni kun tu 'tshe ba'i shing dang 'dra ba gcod pa'i phyir/ lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi nir tshor lta bu
7a4(mdo sde): 'dzem pa'i phyir ngag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mong sa pa rnams kyi ni rdo rje lta bu/ bdud rnams kyis ni mi zlogs pa/ thabs can rnams kyi ches grangs/ ye shes kyi ni
7a5(mdo sde): 'byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni gnas/ rang rgyal ba rnams kyi ni phreng ba dang mtshungs pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi ni gos dang mtshungs pa/ lha rnams
7a6(mdo sde): kyi ni mig lta bu/ mi rnams kyi ni lam lta bu/ byol song du gyur pa rnams kyi ni skyangs/ yi dgas rnams kyi rten/ sems can dpral ba pa rnams kyi ni mgon/ sbyin gnas kyi sems can
7a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni snong du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyini shing rdu lA bu/ rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7a8(mdo sde): rang rgyas pa ma tshong byi theng pal du/ ma khri khye 'i lus yin te/ rig kyi buM ma rimam dres pa gyib gyi ni phan ba
7b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ni ldan/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin gyis
7b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig/ mchod pa dang / bkur bsti thams cad kyis de la ci nus par/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs pa
7b3(mdo sde): me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / snod sna tshogs kyis bkur bster gyis shig/ rim gro gyis shig/ sti stang du gyis shig/ mchod par gyis
7b4(mdo sde): shig/ lam gyi byi dor gyis shig/ brgyan par gyis shigabastod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig/ khyed tham ngas cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan thob pa dang / snod du
7b5(mdo sde): gyur par ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa thams cad kun stan las langs ras/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b6(mdo sde): dpa' cher po/ na mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te/ snying ni rab tu dga'/ bzhin ni rab tu dga'/ rig kyang rang
7b7(mdo sde): tu dang bas lha zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang / 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po dang / lha'i dang po dang / klu'i dang po dang / gdod sbying
7b8(mdo sde): kyi bang po dang / dri ba'i dbang po dang / lAm yin dbang po dang / rnam par lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'amatsho'i dbang po dang / lho bye chen po'i dang gi dang / drang srong lngar nga
8a1(mdo sde): shes pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la tshogs kyi mchog ji lta bu zhig gis bkur bstir bya snyam mo// de
8a2(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos/ mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po che bdun las byas shing / ri dang 'drog dang / 
8a3(mdo sde): ri skam dang / phug dang / grog po dang / g.yang sa dang / rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / dring ba la sogs pa med la/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par
8a4(mdo sde): sprul to// des dpal dri za'i skad du rjod pa'i klu'i dbyangs dang / shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ dri zhim pa dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur
8a5(mdo sde): ldan par sprul to// shing rlon dang / rtswa dang / skam shing dang / 'dab mas la gnas pa thams cad kyang rin ngo che sna bdun las byas sprul to// mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi
8a6(mdo sde): khams 'di thams cad na yang / nad ni rab tu med/ sems can dmyal ba dang byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyang rab tu ni
8a7(mdo sde): sems can dag gis kyang zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dag thob par gyur to// de'i tshe gang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de
8a8(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa'i mdangs dam pa rdzogs pa dang ni ldan/ yan lag thams cad ni yongs
8b1(mdo sde): su rdzogs/ rdul med pa rab rib dang bral ba'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ni mdzes par byas/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni bral/ sems ni rab tu ni/ dge ba thams cad la ni sems
8b2(mdo sde): mos/ dkon mchog gsum la ni sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ 'khor der lhags pa'i sems can de re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na yang / nor bu rin po che thogs par mngon par sprul
8b3(mdo sde): nas/ nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so'i tshul gyi 'od zer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma lus par snang ba chen po des khyab par gyur
8b4(mdo sde): to/ nor bu rin po che de las kyang sil snyan sna tshogs byung bar gyur to// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char ya dang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// gos bzang po sna tshogs
8b5(mdo sde): kyi char dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dang / dri sna tshogs kyi char dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char dang / gdugs sna tshogs kyi char dang / snod
8b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi char dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to// lha rdzas kyi gos dang / chos gos dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi se mo do dang / me tog bad+ma
8b7(mdo sde): dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / u ra ga sa ra dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi mgo lta bu'i phye
8b8(mdo sde): mas lam mer bkram par mngon par gyur to// lam de'i g.yas g.yon gnyi ga brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal dang 'dra ba rin po che'i khang pa yang mngon par sprul te/ khang pa
9a1(mdo sde): de na 'dod pa'i dbang po'i btsun mo gtso mo dang / slas dang / 'dra ma dag yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil skar sgrogs shing / rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa de 'dra
9a2(mdo sde): bdag der sprul to// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi bo'i steng / nam mkha' la lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs lta bu dpag tshad brgya tsam la rin po
9a3(mdo sde): che'i dra ba'i skud pa dang / mu tig gi se mo ngos brgyan pa mngon par sprul te/ rgyan de las kyang lha las 'das pa'i sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra byung ngo // rtswa dang
9a4(mdo sde): shing dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ste/ sa la gnas pa de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i
9a5(mdo sde): sil snyan las bstod pa'i sgra 'byung ba grag ste/ sgra de gang gi rna bar thos pa'i sems can de dag bla na med pa ya/ nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur
9a6(mdo sde): to// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i tshogs chen po de mthong ste/ shin tu ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos thob
9a7(mdo sde): nas/ de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa de'i star ji lta bur bsham snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po che las byas pa'i
9a8(mdo sde): me tog pad+ma sdong bu ni dngul/ lo ma ni gser/ snying po ni rin po che a sma gar ba/ ze ba ni nor bu rin po che tshangs pa'i 'od zer las byis pa/ nang du rgyang grags gcig tsam
9b1(mdo sde): yod pa/ me tog pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan rnam pa brgya phrag stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bangar ba'i pad+ma byung nas/ pad+ma'i stan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nam
9b2(mdo sde): mkha'i snying po skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par snang ngo // de'i spyi bo la yang nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ na mkha'i snying
9b3(mdo sde): bo'i g.yog byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa/ brgya stong phrag mang po rnams kyang rang rang
9b4(mdo sde): gi pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan la 'khod par snang ngo // de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam/ sa pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
9b5(mdo sde): sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// gang dag sngon du 'ongs pa ni// gus dang ldan pas phyag byas te// phyi nas stan la 'dug byed
9b6(mdo sde): na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di 'ongs nas// tshogs chen dag kyang bstan gyur na// ston la phyag kyang ma 'tshal bar// stan la 'dug pa lta bur snang // sman gyis rgyal pos smras pa/ 
9b7(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas mthong // rtog pa kun la mi gnas pas// sems can du ni mi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ 
9b8(mdo sde): yang dag mtha' la gnas pa'i phyir// da ltar sems can mi mthong na// tshogs chen de ni ci phyir bstan// the tsom gyur pa bshad par gsol// sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa/ kun tu
10a1(mdo sde): rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis pas don dam mi shes te// sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir// 'di ni dpa' bo'i thabs yin no// don dam gyis ni sdug
10a2(mdo sde): bsngal ba// de dag rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir// mkhas pa kun rdzob bden pa yis// 'di 'dra ba'i tshogs bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
10a3(mdo sde): chen po sman gyi rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ so so'i skye bo byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams
10a4(mdo sde): cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs/ dpa gcig gi spyod yul dang / sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes so// yongs su brtag pa bzung nas/ 
10a5(mdo sde): gal te sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur na ya nga de dag gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba cig gi spyod yul dang / sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes te/ de
10a6(mdo sde): bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs
10a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mi shes te/ gal te sems can thams cad bse ru dang 'dra ba'i rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang / de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
10a8(mdo sde): ba thob pa/ gcig gi spyod yul dang / rnam par grol ba dang / don dam pa la brtag pa dang / sems can yongs su smid par bya ba'i sbyor ba mi shes so// yongs su
10b1(mdo sde): brtag pa bzung na/ gal te sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' so sor rig pa thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i
10b2(mdo sde): 'dzin thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang / mos pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'i byin gyis brlabs mi shes so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
10b3(mdo sde): namakha'i snying po 'di yang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/ so sor rig pa thob/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob nas/ bskul ba dpag tu med pa 'das te/ ji ltar de ltar
10b4(mdo sde): tshogs chen po 'dus pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dag shes nas/ ji ltar 'dir sems can kha cig tshogs chen po 'dir 'ong zhing lta ba'i phyir/ 'dod
10b5(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rigs kyi bu de 'di nyid du mi snang bar gyuranas/ nub phyogs nas 'dir 'ong nyan thos dang / rang sangs
10b6(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang / thur mongs ma yin pa mtha' yas pa'i namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan/ sems can thams cad kyang skyo bar
10b7(mdo sde): byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi bden pas sgrub pa'i tshogs chen po yang bstan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs chen po
10b8(mdo sde): yang bstan pa bzhin no// gal te rigs kyi bu de don dam pa'i bden pa mi skye ba'i tshogs ston du zin na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/ bslad par 'gyur ro// 
11a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad la gnas pa'i bar du yang bslang bar 'gyur bas 'di'i spyod yul dang / sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar chos// 
11a2(mdo sde): zab mo'i yon tan la gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ni thabs shes pa la mkhas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad la gnas so// the tshom med do// ye shes gzhan la rag ma lus
11a3(mdo sde): ba la mkhas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog rgyal po la 'os pa dang 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po de ni sems can thams
11a4(mdo sde): cad mtho ris dang thar par skye bar ston pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad las yongs su thar par byed pa'o// lus kyi dug 'byung ba chen po'i nad gso bar byed pa'o/ 
11a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal bar gyur/ pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog bslang nas/ mtho ris dang thar par gnas pa'i thabs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal te/ 
11a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod par byed/ phyag 'tshal byed/ dri 'bul/ a ka ru'i 'dug pas bdug par byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ni de dag gi bsam pa dang / 
11a7(mdo sde): bag la nyal ba dang / de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel pa ci 'dra ba dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ci 'dra ba la yang rtog cing / sems sbyang ba ji lta
11a8(mdo sde): bur bya ba'i rigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/ chos la bskyed pa 'am/ dge 'dun la bskyed pa 'am/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sbyin pa'i rang bzhin nam
11b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin nam/ bsgom pa'i rang bzhin yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmi lam na'ang rung / sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas mngon sum du
11b2(mdo sde): drang po'i thabs kyis ston te/ thabs des lta ba ngan par byed pa smon lam ngan pa'i bsam pa dang / skyabs ngan pa dang / ngan par 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar par byed do// 
11b3(mdo sde): nas kyang de'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur ba dang / smon lam drang po dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang po dang sten par 'gyur ba dang / myur du dri mi zhim pa dang / 
11b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su thar bar 'a/ gyur pa dang / de dag gi ngan song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa 'i las thams cad smon lam gyi dbang dang / legs par
11b5(mdo sde): spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byang bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag myu ra du bdag gi sems la dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to// 
11b6(mdo sde): gang yang sems can lus la nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / gang yang sems g.yengs pa dang / gang dag gi mig gi bar chad byas pa dang / lce bcings pa dang / gang dag la
11b7(mdo sde): yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyur na/ gal te de dag gis nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nad med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir snying thag pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
11b8(mdo sde): dnga' chen po ga mang la'i snying po'i ring nas brjod par byed cing / a ka ru dang / tag rus gdugs nas/ skyes bu dam pa nam la'i snying po la phyag 'tshal na/ rigs kyi bu ni de dag gi rdzi
12a1(mdo sde): lam na bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug gam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ dpal gyi gzugs sam/ dbyangs can gyi gzugs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi
12a2(mdo sde): gzugs sam/ blon po'i gzugs sam/ dpa' bo'i gzugs sam/ sman pa'i gzugs sam/ pha'i gzugs sam/ ma'i gzugs sam/ khye'u'i gzugs sem/ bu mo'i gzugs kyis rmi
12a3(mdo sde): lam na nad pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ de'i nang zhi ba'i phyir/ sman dang / yo byad du gyur pa thams cad de bzhin du ston te/ nad pa'i sbyor ba gcig gis nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
12a4(mdo sde): gang zhal ta dang / longs spyod 'dod pa dang / gang kha ton dang / thos par 'dod pa dang / gang dben par 'dod pa dang / gang rabasam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab
12a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / gang yang grags par 'dod pa dang / gang bzo// sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / gang dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gang gzugs 'dod pa dang / gang nor 'dod pa dang / 
12a6(mdo sde): gang dam pa 'dod pa dang / gang rigs 'dod pa dang / gang bu 'dod pa dang / gang g.yog 'dod pa dang / gang yon tan 'dod pa dang / gang sbyin pa 'dod pa dang / gang tshul khrims 'dod pa
12a7(mdo sde): nas/ gang shes rab kyi bar du 'dod pa dang / gang tshig 'jam po 'dod pa dang / gang sems can rnams dang 'thun par 'dod pa dang / gang sdig pa thams cad las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / 
12a8(mdo sde): gang sbyin pa la gzhog par 'dod pa nas/ shes rab la gzhag pa'i bar du 'dod pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang
12b1(mdo sde): sems can ser sna can rnams gtong ba la gnog par 'dod pa dang / ngang tshul ngan pa dag tshul khrims la gzhog par 'dod pa dang / le lo can dag brtson 'grus la gnog par 'dad
12b2(mdo sde): de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni thabs ston par byed do// gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral zhing / bdag la lta zhing / sems can thams cad la btang snyoms su byed la/ bdag gi thabs gang gis
12b3(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub la sems gzhag pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nas snying rje chen po'i bar la dgod par bya snyam du sems
12b4(mdo sde): dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po la phyag bya'o// dgon pa 'am/ dbye 'am/ bla gab med pa las a ka ru dang / ta ka ru dang / kA la a nus ris bdug par bya'o// thal
12b5(mdo sde): mo sbyar te phyogs mtshams kun tu yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ sngags kyi tshig 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad d+ya thA/ su mri sha su mri sha/ kA ru NI kA/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi tsar
12b6(mdo sde): sa car/ kAru NI// mur mu ra/ be ga d+ha ri/ nA mA tse b+hUH/ mahA ru Ni// tsin tA ma Ni bu ra ya/ karu NI/ marba shA me pA pa ya ang ShAd+hA ri sa krung bkrung / 
12b7(mdo sde): gsung /  // d+ha ra ya tAn/ ma ma AH/  char a // gti// sngags 'di la ni du mar bzlas tenyal ra
12b8(mdo sde): bya'o// rigs gri bu ni de 'i mi'i gzugs sam/ ri dgas kyi gzugs sam/ bya'i gzugs sam/ bdag nyid du ston pa 'am/ de'i bsod nams kyi skal ba ji lta bu de 'dra ba'i
13a1(mdo sde): gzugs sam/ tshig gis de la tshul gcig pa de 'dra ba'i thabs ston par byed de/ thabs gcig po des sems can khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag yongs su smin par/ 
13a2(mdo sde): byed nus so// gang theg pa la mi gnas pa dang / gang nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa dang / gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i sems can dag des thang cig yud tsam dang ldan
13a3(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab dang / thabs cung zad kyis kyang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la phyir mi ldog par gzhog pa nas/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs dang / sa bcu la
13a4(mdo sde): gzhog pa'i bar du nus te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ na mkha'i snying po de ni thabs dang / ye shes dang / snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
13a5(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu rnam kha'i tshad ni la las gzung nas kyi/ rigs kyi bu de'i thabs dang / ye shes dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stongs
13a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i tshad gzung bar ni mi nus te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ na mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
13a7(mdo sde): dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu sems can gang g.yo med pa/ rgyu med pa/ yang dag pa'i nan tan dang ldan pa/ lta ba drang po dang ldan pa/ gzhan mi smod pa/ bdag ni stong pakaHphrag dog dang
13a8(mdo sde): ser sna spangs pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ bsam pa lhag pa dang ldan pa de dag la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di snying brtse bar byed de/ thabs dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang
13b1(mdo sde): yul pa'i bangs kyang ston cing / sems can de sabs dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba des de 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar ba dang / blan med pa med
13b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang byang chub tu sngo bar byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 
13b3(mdo sde): mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba chen po des pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ spro ba dang / brtul ba chen por 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
13b4(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyurate/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan gyi chos dang / brtul ba
13b5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ sems can tham sa cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
13b6(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i slad du yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'chang zhing / de shin tu lham me/ lhang nger gda' la/ byang chub
13b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzhan dag la de ltar ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa'i snying po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang
13b8(mdo sde): ldan pa/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa/ sdug bsngal chen po las thar par byed pa ste/ sems can gang dag ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba ngan song du 'gro ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
14a1(mdo sde): thams cad sprug par byed pa/ 'jig par byed pa'i sems can de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni sman du gyur pa'o// ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang wA/ 
14a2(mdo sde): ba ngan pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la ni 'di nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'o// ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags su 'jug pa'o// de dag gi snying la the tshom yod pa 'dral bar byed pa'o// gang dag
14a3(mdo sde): snying gi snod chag par gyur pa/ ltung ba'i dngos por gyur pa/ phas pham pa'i sems can dge ba'i chos thams cad zhig par gyur pa/ ngan song du 'gro ba/ mgon med pa/ rten med pa/ 
14a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs pa la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di khar ba dang mtshungs la/ lam ston pa'o// sdig pa tham das cad dang / dri mi zhim pa thams cad ston par byed pa
14a5(mdo sde): 'khru bar byed pa'o// 'gro ba ngan pa'i lam las zlog par byed pa'o// shing rta dang mtshungs pa'o// mtho ris dang thar pa la 'jog par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni
14a6(mdo sde): sems can gang dag sems shin tu 'dod par 'jug pa dang / gang dag shin tu khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / gnod 'chab pa dang / ser snas sems 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / 
14a7(mdo sde): gang dag shin tu gti mug gi mun par song ba dang / rgyu med par smra ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyis mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / gang dag nor sogs pas chog mi shes pa dang / ga
14a8(mdo sde): dag mi dge ba'i chos bcu'i bar du rtag tu shin tu ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi ngan song gi sgo gcod par byed pa nas/ shing rta dang / mtshungs pa'i bar du yin te/ sems can rnam
14b1(mdo sde): mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhog par byed pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni lha dang nga
14b2(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par bya ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan na/ sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba
14b3(mdo sde): par bgyid cing / ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham pa de la rigs kyi bu 'di mtho ris dang thar pa'i bang
14b4(mdo sde): bas tshim par bgyid pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang lag das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i ltung ba'i
14b5(mdo sde): rtsa ba ni lnga ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan na/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por
14b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ 
14b7(mdo sde): mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba 'phrog par byed dam/ 'phrog tu 'jug par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o// gang
14b8(mdo sde): yang chos spong bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi 'byung bar bshad pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung bar bshad pa 'am/ theg pa chen po'i 'byung bar bshad pa spong bar byed/ 'gog
15a1(mdo sde): bar byed/ sbeng bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang nga'i phyir mgo dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig dgos pa bslab pa 'dzin
15a2(mdo sde): kyang rung / bslab pa mi 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ de'i gos ngur smrig 'phrog cing khyim par byed dam/ lus la chad pas
15a3(mdo sde): bcod par byed dam/ btson ra 'jug par byed/ srog dang bral bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// gang yang rgyal rigs kyi cheng du ngasams te/ ma'i srog gcod/ 
15a4(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i srog gcod par byed/ dge 'dun 'dus pa dbye bar byed/ ched du bsams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
15a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dar byed na/ mtshams med pa'i las 'di lta las las gang yang rung ba zhig 'byung bar byed pa ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi
15a6(mdo sde): pa'o// gang yang rgyal rigs rgyu med par smra bar gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol la btang snyom su byed/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu blangs shing 'jug par byed/ gzhan
15a7(mdo sde): yang sems can mang po dag mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la 'doms par byed/ gnog par byed/ gnas par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang yang rgyal
15a8(mdo sde): rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'di lnga las/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bcur bde/ 
15b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de thams cad sprugs par 'gyur ro// ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
15b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po ni de 'dra ba'i yul mtha' 'khob kyi nang du skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam la
15b3(mdo sde): lar ni bram ze'i gzugs dang / cha lugs dang skyong lam ston to// gang dang gang gis bdag gi skye ba 'byung bar ston pa/ de dang de dag tu rgyal rigs de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad par
15b4(mdo sde): byed de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba thams cadamakhyen pas bshad pa/ zab mo zab pa'i mdo/ sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag 'chang
15b5(mdo sde): bar byed/ sten par byed/ de'i phyir rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/ smong bar byed/ 'chags par byed/ 
15b6(mdo sde): gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed cing / de sbyin pa dang / 'dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / brtul ba'i spro ba chen po la gnas shing / mtho ris la rten par 'gyur ro// byams pa blon
15b7(mdo sde): de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba yang lnga sde/ lnga gang zhen/ gang yang blon po mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed dam/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'jog par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba
15b8(mdo sde): nga ba'o// gang nga thong byed par byed/ gco sa 'byed pa dang / grong byer 'byed pa dang / yul 'byed bar byed pa 'din ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i rtsa ga gnyis pa'o// gang sa zong
16a1(mdo sde): po chos spong bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi 'byung ba bshad pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba bshad pa 'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung
16a2(mdo sde): bar bshad pa spong bar byed/ 'gog par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// gang yang blon po bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ rab tu byung ba la gtse bar byed na/ bslab
16a3(mdo sde): ba 'dzin kyang rung / bslab pa mi 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ de dag gi gos ngur smrig 'phrog par byed/ khyim
16a4(mdo sde): par byed dam/ lus la chad pas gcod dam/ brtson rar 'jug par byed dam/ srog gcod par byed pa de ni blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gang yang blon pos
16a5(mdo sde): mtshams med pa lnga las mtshams med pa gang yang rung ba'i las byed cing / stsogs pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu blon po gang ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga po
16a6(mdo sde): 'di dag las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ blon po de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde
16a7(mdo sde): ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba la rten par 'gyur te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po de lta bu'i yul mtha' 'khob
16a8(mdo sde): gzhan du gnas shing skye ba 'byung bar yang ston te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis sems can rnams la chos 'chang/ la lar ni bu mo
16b1(mdo sde): bar gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/ gang dang gang dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston pa de dang de dag tu yang blon po de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba/ 
16b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pas bshad pa/ zab mo zab pa'i mdo sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag 'chad par byed/ ston par byed de/ de'i phyir blon po de sngon byas pa'i mi dge
16b3(mdo sde): ba'i sdig pa'i las la tsha bar byed/ smod par byed/ las kyi sgrib pa de yang 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed de/ de sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa
16b4(mdo sde): la brtul ba'i nan tan gyi gnas shing / mtho ris la rjen par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni lnga pa'o// lnga gang zhe na/ srog gcod pa dang / ma
16b5(mdo sde): byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jo ma zhing khrag 'byin par byed par byed pa ste de lnga'o// gang
16b6(mdo sde): nga'i nyan thos ltung ba'i rtsa ba de lnga las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rtag tu ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i
16b7(mdo sde): snying po de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston cing / la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis 'chad de/ snga ma bzhin gyi bar du mtho ris
16b8(mdo sde): la rten par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni brgyad de/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis 'khrul par gyur pa'i theg pa chen po la
17a1(mdo sde): gnas pa'i las thog ma pa dag ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing / lha dang / mi dang / theg pa/ 
17a2(mdo sde): chen po'i bde ba las pas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing 'khor ba na yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ sems
17a3(mdo sde): can gang dag sngor ngan par spyad pa'i rgyus ston slongs pa/ rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes nas/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa las dge ba'i bshes
17a4(mdo sde): gnyen la rten te gnas te/ theg pa chen po shin tu zad dpa 'di nyan cing / rigs kyi bu de dag blo chung ngu zin kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
17a5(mdo sde): bskyed do// de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de shin tu zab pa stong pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan par byed/ lung sbyin par byed/ klog par byed/ 
17a6(mdo sde): de/ de dag ji ltar thos pa dang / de dag ji ltar kun chub pa bzhin du/ sems can gzhan sngon gyi blo dang 'dra ba dag gi 'dun du don dang bcas/ yig 'bru dang bcas pas rgya cher dran par byed/ 
17a7(mdo sde): ston par byed pa dang / dka' ba ma byas pa'i byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo de dag thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngangs par 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur te/ skrag pas bla na med pa
17a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems smon par 'gyur ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po ste/ 
17b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ltung ba'i rtsa ba des dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa thams cad sprugs par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba las phas pham par 'gyur
17b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems bslus shing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho mching rnams chen po khad kyis gzhol ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpas
17b3(mdo sde): sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba thog mar shes par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rim gyis chos
17b4(mdo sde): bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po yang de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma
17b5(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar gyur la/ ngan song gis 'jigs skrag nas/ de dag gal te byang chub so/ mas dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas/ ltung ba
17b6(mdo sde): de dag pagag+sas bu'i phyir mthong bar 'dod na/ des thoras kyi phun la/ a ga ru'am/ traka rlungam/ bdug pas bdugs nas pal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' rna
17b7(mdo sde): ga pa'i mang nas sod par bya'o// de mal bdil pa bzhi du/ rigs kyi sa sems can de mthongs/ des pa si sa bu bzus su ra te/ ma ra
18a1(mdo sde): de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar byung ba de dag 'chag su 'jug go// bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i spyod pa zab pa/ thabs mkhas pa yang de la ston par byed do// ting / 
18a2(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / sa'i bar du yang 'jog par byed do// de'i phyir ngan song thams cad las yongasu thar cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
18a3(mdo sde): las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rdo rje bzhin du mthu che zhing / brtul ba brtan par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
18a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// gal te des bdag nyid mdun du mngon sum du ma bstar na/ byang chub sems dpa' des skya reng 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe langs te/ skya reng
18a5(mdo sde): la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// skya reng skya reng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa skya ra nga khyod 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir shar ma thag tu/ bdag la
18a6(mdo sde): thugs rjes dgab par mdzod cig/ namakha'i snying po thugs rje chen po la bdag gi tshig gis gsungs te/ ci nas kyang de bdag gi rmi lam du ston cing / de'i slad du bdag ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chag
18a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po las thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig chen po thob par 'gyur bar mdzod cig ces bya ste/ des de'i tshe mal du gnyid log par bya'o// 
18a8(mdo sde): tu reng shar ma thag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa ltung ba byung ba pa de'i rmi lam du ston par byed de/ ye shes kyi thabs chen pos
18b1(mdo sde): de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba yang 'chag su 'jug go// thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyang ston par byed de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de de nyid du byang chub kyi se chom ma
18b2(mdo sde): brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la yang shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang myur du yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang byang
18b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag la la zhig la khyod kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod mi nus/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
18b4(mdo sde): rgya bar mi nus kyis/ khyod myur du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems skyed cig dang / de'i phyir khyod myur du 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes/ rdza
18b5(mdo sde): ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar du de skad ces zer na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyi sa pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma
18b6(mdo sde): ba la la zhig la/ kye khyod kyi so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba dang / tshul khrims dang legs par spyad pas ci zhig bya/ khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
18b7(mdo sde): skyed cig/ theg pa chen po lhogs shig dang / de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis khyod kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba'i las gang cung zad kyang bsgrubs pa de dag de'i
18b8(mdo sde): phyir dag cing rnam par smin par 'gyur ba med do zhes/ ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin gyis bar du de skad zer na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// 
19a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa la la zhig la/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam spongs shig/ mnyan cig
19a2(mdo sde): ma klogs shig/ gzhan la ma ston cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam sba bar gyis shig/ khyod ni de'i phyir 'bras bu chen po 'thob par mi 'gyuraro// khyod ni de'i phyir
19a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams mthar 'byin par byed kyang mi nus kyis/ khyod theg pa chen po'i gtam la dad par gyis shig/ theg pa chen po nyon cig/ khyod theg pa chen po lhogs shig/ gzhan la
19a4(mdo sde): ston cig dang / de'i phyir khyod ngan 'gro dang / ngan song gi/ lam thams cad du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du tham/ med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
19a5(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro zhes de skad smras nas/ gal te de de'i tshig bzhin du byed cing / lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu len par byed na/ gnyi ga yang ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur te/ 'di
19a6(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag lce gnyis par 'gyur te/ gzhan du sems la gzhan du ston cing / 
19a7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'di yang sgra grags pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir 'dod par byed/ kha ton byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ 'chad par byed/ pha rol la
19a8(mdo sde): yang thos pa tsam ston par byed cing / bdag ni theg pa chen po pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin no zhes de skad zer zhing / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir gzhan la phrag dog du byed la/ pha rol
19b1(mdo sde): / gang las nye bar spyod pa dang / yongasu spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba la/ de'i rkyen gyis de dag 'khrug par 'gyur/ de dag gi mi bsngags pa brjod par byed/ smod par byed/ brnyas par byed
19b2(mdo sde): ngan du brjod par byed/ bdag stong par byed cing / de dag phrag dog gi rgyus bdag mi las bla ma'i chos dang ldan par 'chad par byed de/ de'i phyir dngos po des ltung bar 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i
19b3(mdo sde): bde ba las phas pham par gyur nas/ de'i phyir yang theg pa chen po las lci ba chen po'i ltung ba byung bar gyur te/ de'i phyir ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// dper na skyes bu la la zhig rin po
19b4(mdo sde): che'i gling du 'gro 'dod de/ rgya mtsho 'ching rnams chen por gru las song ba las/ rgya mtsho 'ching rnams chen por gru nyid zhig par gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa
19b5(mdo sde): yang theg pa chen po'i rgyam ma rnams rgal bar 'dod pa las 'o// phrag dog gi phyir brdzun smras nas/ de'i rkyen gyis de dag dang / ba'i gru zhig cing / shes rab kyi srog dang bral ba
19b6(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyuraro// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' le sa thog ma pa phrag dog gi phyir brdzun du smras pa'i rkyen gyis lhung ba lci ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems
19b7(mdo sde): dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ las thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba dag zab pa stong pa
19b8(mdo sde): nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas pa'i skyes bu rig pa chen po dang ldan pa/ tshogs chung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul
20a1(mdo sde): gyi theg pa chen po'i mdo sde de klog par byed/ 'dod par byed/ kha don byed/ klags nas gzhan la rgya cher ston par byed de/ bdag gis chos 'di dag rang gi blos
20a2(mdo sde): rtogs nas/ nga snying rje ba'i phyir de ltar khyed la stor gyis/ khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos zab mo 'di la mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sgoms shig dang / da ltar gyi nga bzhin du khyod kyang ye shes mthong
20a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyu ro zhes smra zhing / chos 'di lta bu zab mo zab pa dag mngon par ni ma byas kyi/ blags pa tsam gyis bstan to zhes ni mi zer bar rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti'i phyir bdag 'tshong bar byed de/ 
20a4(mdo sde): de'i rkyen gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / 'phags pa'i gang
20a5(mdo sde): zag gi spyan sngar nyes pa dang / bcas par 'gyur/ ltung ba lci ba byung bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams theg pa chen pos// bslus par 'gyur te/ de ni de'i nyan thos kyi theg par mi
20a6(mdo sde): 'gyur na/ theg pa chen po lta ci smos/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par lta ci smos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skye bu
20a7(mdo sde): zhig 'brog dgon pa chen por song ba las/ bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen cing ngal bar gyur nas/ de 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa'i shing gi drung du zas kyi phyir 'dug nas/ des shing 'bras bu
20a8(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa bor te/ dug gi shing ro med pa la 'dzegs nas dug gi 'bras bu za'o// zos nas 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ gang zag de yang dpe de dang 'dra bar brjod do// de
20b1(mdo sde): bas na mir snyed pa shin tu dkon pa rnyed nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas te/ theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'dod pa la rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang grags pa'i phyir bdag stong / na
20b2(mdo sde): smod pa byed pas ltung ba lci ba de 'dra ba byung bar gyur nas/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyis shin tu smad cing / ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de 'dra ba ni rgyal rigs
20b3(mdo sde): dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dpangs rigs thams cad kyis mi bsten par bya'o// gang de sten par byed pa ni shes pa thams cad kyi 'das pa dang bcas pa yin te/ de yang byang chub
20b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba drug pa'o// / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rgyal rigs rna mas kyi mdun du 'don pa'i phyag dar pa 'am/ blon po'i
20b5(mdo sde): phyag dar pa 'am/ dpa' bo'i phyag dar ba 'am/ sman pa'i phyag dar ba blun pa/ mkhas pas bsnyems pa/ nor che ba longs spyod che ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi
20b6(mdo sde): dngos po rnam pa mang po dag byed par snang ste/ de dag gtong bas rgyags shing dregs nas/ snyems pa dang rgyags pas rgyal rigs dag kyang 'byed par byed/ dge sbyong dag kyang rgyal rigs dang
20b7(mdo sde): 'byed par byed cing / de dag rgyal rigs la gnas nas/ dge sbyong dag kyang chad pas gcod par byed de/ nor gyi chad pas 'phrogs par byed pas/ gnod pa de'i phyir dge slong de dag gis gang
20b8(mdo sde): zag gi yang rung / dge 'dun gyis yang rung / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi yang rung / mchod rten gyi yang rung ste/ phrogs nas de dag la skyes bu 'bul bar byed/ phyag dar ba de dag kyang / 
21a1(mdo sde): rgyal rigs la 'bul bar byed de/ de gzhi ga ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bdun pa'o// gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar ba de dag
21a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bcas te/ nyes par 'gyur/ chos de lta bu dag kyang chos ma yin par 'dogs/ chos ma yin pa ni chos su 'dogs te/ chos spangs/ mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i bslab pa mi lta/ ston
21a3(mdo sde): ba nag po dang / storan pa chen po la mi lta/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa dang / thabs kyi bslab pa dang / gang yang mdo sde gzhan dag las @#
21a4(mdo sde): bshad pa de yang spangs nas/ dge sbyong dag gtse ba'i phyir/ de 'dra ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i bya bar bya ba 'chal bar byed de/ bya bar bya ba de dag gis dge slong dag gtse bar 'gyur/ 
21a5(mdo sde): zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la sbyong ba'i yid la byed pa gdong bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan pa de dag gnod sems mang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir dge slong dag gi nyon mongs pa
21a6(mdo sde): ma zhi ba zhi bar mi byed/ srab mor mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe dge slong dag bsam pa nyams par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ spyod pa nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams par
21a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de'i phyir lhong par 'gyur/ phal cher lhod par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ dge sbyong ma yin na dge sbyong du yi dam 'cha'/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin na
21a8(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod par yi dam 'cha' zhing / bong bu dang mtshungs pa dang / chos shin tu bsal bar 'chad par 'gyur te/ de dag la rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu bkur sti
21b1(mdo sde): byas pa dang / rim gro byas pa dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ de dag gis dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi mi bsngags pa khyim pa la brjod pa dang / rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas
21b2(mdo sde): de yang dge slong spong ba la brtson pa de dag la zhe sdang zhing 'phya bar 'gyur ro// gang de na dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi phan pa dang / longs spyod du bya ba de kha ton la brtson pa'i dge slong
21b3(mdo sde): la 'bul bar byed pas/ de gnyi ga ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong bsam gtan pa ni zhing dam pa yin gyi/ kha ton pa dang zhal ta la gnas pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir
21b4(mdo sde): te/ dge slong bsam gtan pa dag ni ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang sa dag la snod du gyur pa/ sbyin gnas dadam pa/ snod dam par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi snang
21b5(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ lam ston par byed pa/ las kyi zhing dang / nyon mongs pa'i zhing las sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la gzhog par
21b6(mdo sde): byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ni tshogs ma byung ba/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan na/ 
21b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad
21b8(mdo sde): las phas pham par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems kyis bsdus par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po ni/ de lta bu dag gi yul du skye
22a1(mdo sde): zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / 
22a2(mdo sde): spyod lam nas/ byol song gi mtshan pa dang / spyod lam gyi bar du gzugs sna tshogs ston te/ rgya cher ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin las 'byung ba bzhin klag par bya ste/ de dang de dag tu
22a3(mdo sde): sems can de dang de dag la ji ltar 'thun pa bzhin du chos 'chad par byed de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa'i mdo sde dang / ting 'dzin dang / bzod pa
22a4(mdo sde): dang / sa 'chang te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa thabs mi shes pa ltung ba zung ba dag ngo tsha bar byed/ ltung ba des 'jigs par byed/ sngangs par byed/ 
22a5(mdo sde): sbags par byed/ ltung ba de dag 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed do// gal te sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas/ 
22a6(mdo sde): mthong bar 'dod cing / ngan song du ltung bas 'jigs te/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba bshags par 'dod na/ gal te de dag byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos phyag 'tshal zhing / de'i ming nas
22a7(mdo sde): brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can de'i 'dun du tha mal pa'i tshul du 'dug pa 'am/ bram ze'i gzugs nas/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyi byang chub sems/ 
22a8(mdo sde): dpa' las thog ma pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de ji ltar byung ba 'chag su 'jug go// de'i thabs mkhas pa zab mo dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la spyod pa yang ston
22b1(mdo sde): sa dang sa dag tu yang ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la gzhog par byed de/ rim gyis lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis gzhog par byed do// de nas de dag ngan song gi 'dzeg
22b2(mdo sde): pa chen po las shin tu thar par byed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gzhog par byed do// de ltar de glog dang mtshungs pa dang / pha rol
22b3(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa la mthu che zhing brtul bar 'gyuraro// de bas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// gal te de dag
22b4(mdo sde): la mngon sum du bdag ston par mi byed na/ gang de la gsol bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa nyes pa dang bcas pas tho rangs kyi thun la langs te/ kha shar phyogs
22b5(mdo sde): su bstan te 'dug la/ lha'i bu skya reng la gsol ba gdab par bya ba 'di skad du brjod do// skya reng skya reng thugs rje chen po can/ skal ba chen po can khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du
22b6(mdo sde): shar ma thag tu/ bdag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po thugs rje chen po can la bdag gi tshig gis sbron te/ bdag gi rmi lam du yang de ston
22b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gis thabs des ltung ba bshags par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po la thabs dang ye shes thob par mdzod cig ces smras nas/ des de'i tshe la du
22b8(mdo sde): gnyid log par bya ste/ skya reng 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i rmi
23a1(mdo sde): lam na/ tha ra la bar mdun du 'dug ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'chag su 'jug/ ye shes dang thabs chen pos thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa gang dag gis/ 
23a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po la shin tu brtan por gnas par 'gyur ba dang / 
23a3(mdo sde): de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta
23a4(mdo sde): bu'i thabs dang / shes rab kyang de la stor to// de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/ kha'i snying po 'di ni shin tu dpa' ba las byung ba'i
23a5(mdo sde): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la 'dug par snang ngo // de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po ni yon tan
23a6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can gang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming thos sam/ gzugs 'drir 'jug gam/ de la mchod
23a7(mdo sde): pa byed dam/ rim gro byed/ sti stang byed/ bkur bsti byed/ mchod pa byed cing / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa du ma
23a8(mdo sde): ngag gis bkur bsti byed/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ bdag gi srog kyang de la 'bul bar byed na/ sems can de dag ni sems mes dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chus ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin
23b1(mdo sde): dug gi 'chi bar mi byed de/ de dag tshe zad pa ma gtogs par mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sus kyang de dag gi srog 'phrog par mi nus/ dus ma yin par mi 'chi/ nad bu can du mi 'gyur/ 
23b2(mdo sde): bkres pa dang / skom pas dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rgyal po'i chad pas chod par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de dag mig gis
23b3(mdo sde): gzugs mi mthong / rna bas sgra mi thos/ snas dri mi tsher/ lces ro mi myong / lus kyis reg mi shes shing / da dung du dbugs phra mo 'byung ba dang / 'jug par byed/ da dung du de'i lus
23b4(mdo sde): la tshe dang / drod dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po tha mal par ston par byed de/ sems can gang sngon bram ze la
23b5(mdo sde): gus par gyur pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa la ni/ rigs kyi bu de bram ze'i gzugasu ston to// gang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la gus pa de dag la ni/ 'dod pa'i dbang
23b6(mdo sde): drug gi bar du ston pa nas/ gang mthu bo che la gus pa dang / gang dbang phyug chen po la gus pa dang / brgya byin la gus pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba la gus pa dang / nyi ma dang / 
23b7(mdo sde): ba dang / gnas srung po dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ngal bso po la gus pa dang / gang dag lha dang / ri dang / shing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka sna
23b8(mdo sde): tshogs la gus pa'i bar du/ gang dang gang gi skyabasu song ba'i sems can de dag la/ de lta de ltar sems can de dag gi mdun du bstan nas/ gang gi bsam pa ji 'dra ba bzhin du de'i
24a1(mdo sde): gzugs kyis 'di skad ces smra'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag la/ gang dag shes rab kyis mthong ba/ 'khor ba'i srid pa sgrol ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba na
24a2(mdo sde): ni de kun shes/ sems can de dag gis chos 'di dag rnam par shes pas shes par byas nas/ mtho ris la rten par 'gyuraro// sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag
24a3(mdo sde): gi mdun du 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs bstan nas 'di skad ces smra'o// sangs rgyas ye shes bden pa yis// srid pa'i rgya mtsho gang sgrol ba// ye shes de la myur du reg/ 
24a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// de'i tshe sems can de dag sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'i sgras dga' zhing rangs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa
24a5(mdo sde): med pa/ yongasu dag pa/ gang nas sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das bzhugs pa 'tsho ba gzhes pa/ chos kyang ston pa der/ skye bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun la
24a6(mdo sde): klag par bya'o// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nam kha'i snying po ni yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab dang ldan no// gang yang ting 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs pa sems kyi shin tu
24a7(mdo sde): dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ des tho rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal te/ mchod pa ci nus kyis bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems
24a8(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag ste/ 'di skad ces brjod do// dgongs shig dgongs shig/ na mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po brnyes pa/ bdag la dran par dang / ting 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor stsol cig/ 
24b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ u mu ra na khe/ bag gA ni le/ sa mu rba a ba ta re na na ya na ya/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ a ru ba dzam b+ha smi ti/ a grA dzam pa s+thi ti/ badz+ra dzam b+ha smi ti/ ko Shas+thi ti/ 
24b2(mdo sde): ba ma skr-i ti/ bud ko Ti s+thi ti swA hA/ de la dran pa dang / ting 'dzin la 'jug pa sbyin par byed do// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' lung nyan kyis bshad pa yang rung ste/ gtsug leg
24b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs klog par 'dod na/ des khrus byas te/ skya reng 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o// mchod pa ci nus kyis bya'o// sems can
24b4(mdo sde): thams cad la byams pa'i sems bya'o// 'di skad kyang brjod par bya'o// dgongs shig dgongs shig/ mkhas pa chen po sems can thams cad kyi nang na bsam gyis mi
24b5(mdo sde): khyab pa/ rigs kyi bu na mkha'i snying po gang zag gi ma/ chog/ dran pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor bdag la stsol/ cig/ 'di lta ste/ a ni la dza/ bi shan+d+ha sha dzA
24b6(mdo sde): bi ya ba na dza/ bi ba kr-i su me/ ba ta la dzA si/ s+than sha ra be/ shA sta kar ne/ hu ma hu ma/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka swA hA/ gang rgya mtsho 'ching rnam chen por 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang khung du
24b7(mdo sde): 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang bcud dam pa spyod 'dod par gyur pa dang / gang btson rar bcug pa dang / gang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang / gang mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa dang / gang dag mes/ 
24b8(mdo sde): 'dzags pa dang / chu dang / mtshon dang / dug dang / byad ste ma dang / stag dang / seng ge dang / dug drag po dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can gyis 'jigs par bgyid pa dang / gang
25a1(mdo sde): dam du bcings pa dang / gang chad pas bcad pa dang / gang gsad pa la thug pa dang / gang nad kyis btab pa dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa dang / gang dag chos gos
25a2(mdo sde): dang bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang / yo byad kyis phongs pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod cing / mchod pa ci nus kyis
25a3(mdo sde): byed la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gzhog cing / 'di skad du yang smra ste/ dgongs shig dgongs shig/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ grags pa chen po na mkha'i
25a4(mdo sde): snying po 'gro ba'i don bzhed pa thugs rje chen po dang lnga na pa bdag la gzigs shig/ bdag 'di lta bu las rab tu// thar pa mdzod cig/ skal pa stsol cig/ mthu chen po bdag ni
25a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag go/ shin tu dbul lo// bdag ni khyod la gnas nas/ ni ba dang bde ba 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du thob par 'gyu ro zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems
25a6(mdo sde): dpa' na mkha'i snying po gzugs tha mal pa nas/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyi sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ dbugs 'byin par byed do// gang dag ci las 'jigs pa de dag de dag de
25a7(mdo sde): las rab tu thar par byed do// gang dag dbul ba gos med pa nas/ gang dag yo byad kyis brel ba'i bar du de dag la de lta de ltar bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// yo byad thams cad phun sum
25a8(mdo sde): tshogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i bu la la zhig gnas chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par sems pa de/ gral te byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod cing phyag 'tshal la/ 
25b1(mdo sde): mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa la sogs te/ bram ze'i gnas chen po dang / khyim bdag gi gnas chen po dang / gzo'i gnas chen po dang / thos pa'i gnas chen po dang / sgom pa'i gnas
25b2(mdo sde): chen po dang / gang mos pa'i gnas chen po'i bar du 'dod pa de dag gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/ khrus byas te gos gtsang ma
25b3(mdo sde): bgos nas/ tho rangs kyi thun la/ byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po la skyabasu song nas/ gsol ba gdab pa 'di skad du brjod par byed de/ namakha'i snying po thugs rje chen po dang ldan
25b4(mdo sde): ba bdag la skal ba stsol cig/ bsam pa dang / sems pa thams cad dang / bsam pa yid bzhin rab tu rdzogs par mdzod cig/ gang sems shing gang gsol ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
25b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis mdzod cig ces brjod na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam paradag pa mi las 'das pas skad de thos nas/ sems can de
25b6(mdo sde): dag la bdag ci rigs par ston te/ de dag la de ltar thabs kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha mo'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i thabs kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan no// 
25b7(mdo sde): blo rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po'i thigs pa ni la la zhig gis tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i
25b8(mdo sde): snying po thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang / thabs kyis sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i tshad ni gzung mi nus so// rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad kyi/ 
26a1(mdo sde): / tshad ni la las bzung nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa'i snying po sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshog su sprul par byed pa ni tshad
26a2(mdo sde): gzung mi nus te/ la lar ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugasu sprul par byed do// la lar ni bram ze'i gzugasu byed cing / sems can ji lta bus 'dul ba de lta bu'i
26a3(mdo sde): gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed de/ de byol song du gtogs pa rnams kyi nang du ni byol song gi gzugasu sprul par byed do// sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nang du ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i
26a4(mdo sde): gzugasu sprul par byed pa nas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rta/ dran pa'i rnams la gshing rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyi bar du/ sprul par byed do// kha cig la ni mngon sum du sprul pa sprul
26a5(mdo sde): bar byed/ kha cig la ni rmi lam du sprul par byed/ cig la ni sdig pa'i las sprug pa'i phyir/ ngan song las bsgral ba'i phyir/ mtho ris la dgod pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams
26a6(mdo sde): kyi don gyi phyir/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnam par shes pa tha ma rgyu ba'i tshe/ gzugs sna tshogasu sprul par byed de/ de dag de la thog mar skyabasu song zhing mthong ste/ bde ba thob nas mtho ris kyi
26a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du gnas pa'i bde ba thob pa'i bar du 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sus kyang de'i sprul pa thams cad kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus so// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i
26a8(mdo sde): snying po 'di ni thabs dang / ye shes kyi yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ldan no// de bas na rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog mgo bo
26b1(mdo sde): la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo // de nas de'i che 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa'i snying po la ngo mtshar thob/ rmad du byung du
26b2(mdo sde): bla ma la bkur bsti dang / sti stang du bya ba thob par gyur nas/ thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la mchod pa dang / bkur sti sna tshog
26b3(mdo sde): kyis bkur stir byed/ me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me mar dang / bdug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / 
26b4(mdo sde): bstod pa dang / glu dang / sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byed do// byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po des kyang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das
26b5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa/ rnyog pa lnga dang lnga/ na pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can ma rig pa'i mun pa
26b6(mdo sde): chen pos rmongs pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi don ji ltar bgyi bar nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu namamakha' nim bcings ma grol ba/ nyon ma mongs pa/ 
26b7(mdo sde): ma rmongs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o// na mkha' la rlung gi rkyen gyis na/ 'thul ba'i rdul gyis dkrigs shing yongasu ma dag pa'i mtshan du snang ste/ chus ni zhi bar byed/ dri ma med cing yongs su
26b8(mdo sde): dag par 'gyuraro// gang na skar ma dang / gza' dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i bye brag mi mngon na ni/ skad cig dang thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / dus dang lo rnams kyi
27a1(mdo sde): bgrang ba yang mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni rang bzhin gyis dang ba/ yongasu dag pa yin mod
27a2(mdo sde): kyi/ sems can rnams kyi blo bur du byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis/ sems nye bar nyon mongs par byas te/ de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po chu dang mtshungs pas
27a3(mdo sde): chos 'chad par mdzad do// sems nyon mongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongasu sbyong bar mdzad pas yongasu dag pa dang / de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir
27a4(mdo sde): sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas/ ye she sa kyi 'od zer gyis tshim par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'gyur te// 'di lta ste/ 
27a5(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gnas par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gnas par 'gyuraro// 
27a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la snying rje ba la shin tu gnas par 'gyuraro// de dag las kyang 'jig rten dung gra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// rang sangs rgyas rnamapa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
27a7(mdo sde): mas pa chen po mas la menas lung ma gyu y-i// de nag shegs pa ma pa lang pa rdzogs pa sas rgyas rams las sa sung ba phru / 
27a8(mdo sde): ma du sa/ dab ga lags/ tshal pa/ sa rnam sa ma lags kyings ma pa ga pa lagan lal/ 'i rnams da pa
27b1(mdo sde): mig gis kun tu reg pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lag so// gang yang nang du mig gis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/ gsol
27b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ma lag so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus la brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ na mkha' yid la gnas pa nas/ yid kyis kun tu
27b3(mdo sde): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la/ namakha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems can na mkha' la gnas sam/ 
27b4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ namakha' sems can la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lagaso// de skad ces bka' stsal nas
27b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gcig la gcig mi rten to// gcig la gcig
27b6(mdo sde): spyod yul ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rtog pa ma mchis pa stong pa nyid de/ sgro ma gtags pa yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das/ 
27b7(mdo sde): namakha' ni 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi g.yo ba/ gsob lags te/ myu gu ma mchis pa/ sa bon ma mchis pa/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa/ 
27b8(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa/ yi ge ma mchis pa/ rlom sems ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad la
28a1(mdo sde): de ltar rtogs na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba rang / man ta kra ya dzi mdza ya/ dzan ni/ ma mu ni/ 
28a2(mdo sde): ha ra/ A ra ya pa la/ gu na ga b+ha/ ni ya ma bi na ya/ pu ba ya/ sha ta sha pa/ shA pa sha ra/ ta thA ga ma/ sha mang gu/ ma du shi sha/ sha ma dze ta nA ya/ kle shan+ta/ sang sho sha
28a3(mdo sde): ne swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rig las rgyal bar byed pa/ seng ge'i 'gros kyi phyir bsgyings pa'i gzugs
28a4(mdo sde): 'dis/ sems can dag 'chi ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i tha ba la/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa sdug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag
28a5(mdo sde): bar gtong rus so// khyod ni 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med par 'gro ba dang / sems can rnams snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
28a6(mdo sde): mang ba dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du/ gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde sna tshogs 'chad pa dang / 
28a7(mdo sde): sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar pa nas/ dge sbyong gi phyag dar pa'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang ba dang / thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par
28a8(mdo sde): nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis tingange 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to// 
28b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la ye shes skyes par gyur to// srog chags khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can dag gi gang dag rtsod 'gyur ba de dag gi ni gzhi yi rgya
28b2(mdo sde): ba spongs// myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba dag gi ni// rtsa ba bzhi po thams cad 'gyur bar gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / 'khor
28b3(mdo sde): de thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mngon par bstod do// 
28b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra man Da nA ma d+ha ra
28b5(mdo sde): ma hA yA na sA tra ka bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po 'i gzungs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
28b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gangs kyi ri dang nye ba sna tshogs kyi grong gi rtsa'i spyil po na/ dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
28b7(mdo sde): bo dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms kyi zas phyis len pa spangs te/ rtsa'i spyil por skyil mo krung bcas nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon
28b8(mdo sde): du gzhag nas bzhug so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// bcom ldan 'das snyom
29a1(mdo sde): par zhugs pa thag tu dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar ga la bzhugs pa'i sku ma mthong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
29a2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas lha rnams
29a3(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs snyam sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rtsa'i spyil po'i nang na ting
29a4(mdo sde): 'dzir la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag gis mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sde/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cang mi smra bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// 
29a5(mdo sde): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang cang mi slu bar ba com ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar de nyid du skyil mo krung bcas te/ 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta
29a6(mdo sde): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub
29a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas/ ring du lon pa 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa 'am/ skye ba gcig gis
29a8(mdo sde): thogs pa yang rung ste/ ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / rtsa'i spyil po ga la ba der dong ste phyir pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis mthus mi gang tsam gyi bar snang / 
29b1(mdo sde): // des de la ma dpal ban dur gyur pas/ sems can thas cad kyi sems mgru bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i la na la sgomam par chug so/ de
29b2(mdo sde): brtsal dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor de dag thams cad sems rab tu dga' ba dang sems mgu ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems
29b3(mdo sde): shin tu tshim pa skyes so// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ting
29b4(mdo sde): 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor de dag tham/ sa cad kyi dbang po rnams rab tu zhi bar gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog ces bya ba/ byang chub
29b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu/ sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / rtsa'i spyil po ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu/ bdag nyid steng gi na mkha' bar snang la
29b6(mdo sde): 'dug pa snyam du shes te/ de steng gi nam mkha' de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
29b7(mdo sde): par zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog ting 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bar snang thams cad me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma
29b8(mdo sde): dkar pos kun tu khebs nas/ nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ byang chub sems dpa'
30a1(mdo sde): drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu steng gi na mkha' las sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
30a2(mdo sde): spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug sa la 'dug ma nus nas/ de byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma de dag dang lhan cig tu steng gi bar snang la na mkha' la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ 'dug ma thag
30a3(mdo sde): tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
