83b8(mdo sde): ba 'bum phrag du ma yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu
84a1(mdo sde): mo chu shing lta bu la sogs pa/ lnga'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma yang 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus te/ gar byed cing gru len la lha'i bu mo re res kyang / de bzhin gtse
84a2(mdo sde): pa la bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dpe med pa dngar cing mngon par dngar to// dngar cing mngon par dngar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
84a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// lha'i ris re re nas kyang lha'i bu mo 'bum
84a4(mdo sde): phrag du ma gar byed cing klu len te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der drong ste lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin
84a5(mdo sde): ngag dngar cing mngon par dngar te/ mngon par rab tu dngar to// dngar cing mngon par dngar te/ mngon par rab tu dang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
84a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// yang de'i tshe phyog/ 
84a7(mdo sde): dang phyogs mtshams dag na/ dge slong gnas pa de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te tshogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
84a8(mdo sde): do// yang de'i tshe tshe rlung gi rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung chen po zhes bya ba dang / 
84b1(mdo sde): rlung gi rgyab po chen po shugs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rje su cher chags shes bya ba me tog dang / spos thams cad dang lhan cig ldan zhing / bcom ldan 'das
84b2(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i sgra'i chos snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// sprin gyi rgyal po chen po 'bum phrag du ma yang glu dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs
84b3(mdo sde): sgrogs shing / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags te/ seng ge'i sgra'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// yang de'i tshe seng+ge
84b4(mdo sde): dpa' bo la sogs pa ngang pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa drag la ngang pa'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ngang pa 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ 
84b5(mdo sde): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ngang pa'i skad dpe med pa ngag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
84b6(mdo sde): dod/ ngang pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe rma bya'i rgyal po legs
84b7(mdo sde): mthong la sogs pa/ rma bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la rma bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor rma bya 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
84b8(mdo sde): lhags nas/ rma bya'i sgra skad snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rma bya'i
85a1(mdo sde): rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe khu byug gi rgyal po sde la
85a2(mdo sde): sogs pa/ khu byug gi rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la khu thug gi rgyal po re re yang 'khor khu byug 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
85a3(mdo sde): nas/ khu byug gi skad snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// khu byug gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting
85a4(mdo sde): 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe ka la bing ka'i rgyal po pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i mig la sogs pa ka la bing ka'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ ka la
85a5(mdo sde): bing ka'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ka la bing ka 'bum phra ga grangs med pa dag/ ka la bing ka'i sgra skad snyan pas/ 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
85a6(mdo sde): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi stod pa yang dag pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ka la bing ka'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'
85a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe shang shang te'u yi rgyal po rgyal ba la sogs pa/ shang shang te'u yi rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs
85a8(mdo sde): med pa la/ shang shang te'u yi rgyal po re re yang 'khor shang shang te'u 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
85b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lha'i sgra skad snyan pas bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shang shang te'u yi rgya lta po de dag thams cad
85b2(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe bya'i rigs 'dres pa la sogs pa tha dad po grangs med pa la bya
85b3(mdo sde): rigs 'dres pa re re la bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa yod de/ bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor bya 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
85b4(mdo sde): ste lhags nas/ so so bya skad kyi rol mo'i sgra dpe med pa'i gdangs kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i stong pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan
85b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bya'i rigs 'dres pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
85b6(mdo sde): tinge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe seng ge'i rgyal po chen po che pad+ma la sogs pa/ seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la seng ge'i rgyal po
85b7(mdo sde): re re yang 'khor seng ge 'bum phrag grangs med pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra skad kyi rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la
85b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// seng ge'i rgyal po de dag thang
86a1(mdo sde): kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po ri ka'i nang bun lta bu
86a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor spos kyi glang po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bco
86a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
86a4(mdo sde): nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'a khrod do// spos kyi glang po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag
86a5(mdo sde): la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / stag dang / ri dwags rigs tha dad pa 'dres pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas
86a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sbrul dang / stag dang / ri dwags de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs
86a7(mdo sde): ba dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad dan la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe sha sbrang dang / 
86a8(mdo sde): sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrang ma dang / bi shu ka dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / se sa dang / 'ug pa dang / sdig pa dang / srin gyi med grangs med pa'i
86b1(mdo sde): yang grangs med pa dag dang / sdig sbrul tha dad pa 'dres pa gnas pa thams cad dang / phag dang / khyi dang / wa dang / gzhan yang srog chags phra mo rnams bcom ldan 'das ga
86b2(mdo sde): la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ston yang dag pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
86b3(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / myur du gdug pa dang / sbrul gzi gu dang / sbrul mi bzad pa'i gdug pa'i rigs 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag/ bcom
86b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon yang dag pa dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
86b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang // de'i tshe lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung / dang / btang bzung chen po dang / 'khor yug dang / 
86b6(mdo sde): 'khor yug chen po dag dang / ri gzhan dag gi lha rnams rang rang gi khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bo der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs
86b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi smon yang dag pa dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang / 
86b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe sman dang / nags kyi lha thams cad rang rang gi khang par zhugs
87a1(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi ston yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das
87a2(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la
87a3(mdo sde): rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen snying po'i 'khor rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das
87a4(mdo sde): kyis skad cig gcig la bskal pa brgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa tshad med pa/ brjod du med pa'i
87a5(mdo sde): yang brjod du med pa la 'jug par mdzad pa de ni ji ltar shes par rung / bcom ldan 'das rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba phrag ni ji snyed/ phyogs
87a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu ni/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye
87a7(mdo sde): shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis
87a8(mdo sde): sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par mdzad cig gu snyam mo// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
87b1(mdo sde): chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ mi 'jigs pa thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtog
87b2(mdo sde): pa sems kyis shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces smraso// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
87b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo las// 
87b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas ngan bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
87b5(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho rnam pa/ ra gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
87b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhum su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs/ 
87b7(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhum su cha phra bar snang ba
87b8(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum
88a1(mdo sde): bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du phyog su gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po
88a2(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
88a3(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal nas/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gan su gshegs
88a4(mdo sde): pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
88a5(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug chen po rim gro byed du 'ong ba rnam par/ gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin
88a6(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po/ 
88a7(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byis pa'i rtsed mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
88a8(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge slob pa'i grwa gang du gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya
88b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge dang / bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / brtsi ba dang / 
88b2(mdo sde): shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
88b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dam bcas pa thob par bya ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlobs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
88b4(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
88b5(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
88b6(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprid chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi
88b7(mdo sde): ba dang / rab tu byung ba la gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de
88b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ mngon par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
89a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi na bza' ngur smrig bzhes pa rnam par gzhag
89a2(mdo sde): paba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod cing bzhugs
89a3(mdo sde): pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod
89a4(mdo sde): pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
89a5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la
89a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs lo sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
89a7(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
89a8(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la/ 
89b1(mdo sde): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
89b2(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
89b3(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam/ 
89b4(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba/ zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
89b5(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
89b6(mdo sde): bo'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
89b7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me'i 'od dang / klog gi 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / 
89b8(mdo sde): nor bu'i 'od dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
90a1(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyal po'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sna
90a2(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
90a3(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi long ba dang / 'phye bo dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
90a4(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// s+thi na chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs bu rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang
90a5(mdo sde): yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnam par gan ga pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
90a6(mdo sde): bo'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi khom pa rnam pa sna tshogasu skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
90a7(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod
90a8(mdo sde): do/ sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
90b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa dang / kun tu rtsub dang / gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs byed pa
90b2(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprid chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drug brgyad cu
90b3(mdo sde): rtsa bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
90b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
90b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi sor mo'i 'phreng ba'i nang kun tu 'khru ga pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la/ sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdong ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
90b6(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'brog nas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
90b7(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs
90b8(mdo sde): la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
91a1(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// spring chen snying po sprid chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chom rkun kun tu 'khrug pa rnam
91a2(mdo sde): bar gzhag pa'i byir gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi ngas kun tu 'khrug pa
91a3(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu
91a4(mdo sde): bye ma rab tu 'bar ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
91a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu na mkha' lding / kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
91a6(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi dbyen kun tu 'jug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i
91a7(mdo sde): sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brag 'phen pa dang / 'jog pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
91a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi glang po che nor skyong gyis 'jug pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa
91b1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sbri cher snying po spyi chen po'i rango la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bra
91b2(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bram ze'i bu mo sru byed kun tu 'khrug/ 
91b3(mdo sde): pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun tu rgyu
91b4(mdo sde): ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas/ kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
91b5(mdo sde): po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shAkya gsod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying
91b6(mdo sde): po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
91b7(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rang gi lus la lus su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes

92a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lus bsgo ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i

92a5(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'deg pa dang 'jo/ ga pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la/ 
92a6(mdo sde): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dus byas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
92a7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes

92b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i

92b6(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos

92b8(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brjod du med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
93a1(mdo sde): spang ba' ma yod da/ gli chen rnying bsdod chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa byin gyis cas/ 
93a2(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs
93a3(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rlob sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs
93a4(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
93a5(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa rnams kyi ming rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
93a6(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag tu rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi

93a8(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa
93b1(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi/ 
93b2(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
93b3(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa
93b4(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor dpa zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// de la sogs dpa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba'i sgo bye ba
93b5(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chags pa med pa 'jigs pa med pa'i rigs shes bya ba'i
93b6(mdo sde): 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dag kyang byung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog
93b7(mdo sde): por byas nas sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstan te/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su smin par byas nas/ phyir
93b8(mdo sde): log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan grangs med par bskor bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la phog par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa
94a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
94a2(mdo sde): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas su
94a3(mdo sde): skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom
94a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
94a5(mdo sde): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ btso/ 
94a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
94a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhum su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ 
94a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
94b1(mdo sde): kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhum su cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
94b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi na'i bskyed mos tshal du sku bltam pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
94b3(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
94b4(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du gom pa 'dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
94b5(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bri
94b6(mdo sde): ni'i bskyed mos tshal du phyogasu gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
94b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
94b8(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
95a1(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal nas/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlab/ 
95a2(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ 
95a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug rin po che rim gro bgyid du mchi ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
95a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
95a5(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bko da pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
95a6(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa'i rtsed mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
95a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge slob pa'i grwa gang du gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
95a8(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
95b1(mdo sde): / @ dang / dayod pas rbab rnam par gag par byen gyi
95b2(mdo sde): / gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge dang bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / brtsi ba dang / shod dgod pas bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la skye
95b3(mdo sde): babs byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan
95b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma/ dam bcas pa thob par bgyi ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na
95b5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu ba dar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor na
95b6(mdo sde): bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
95b7(mdo sde): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ skyed mos 'tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par
95b8(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho
95b9(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba dang / rab tu byung ba gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ 
96a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ 
96a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung bar mngon par phyogs te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ mngon par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la
96a3(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
96a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis na bza' ngur smrig bzhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
96a5(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka 'thub spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
96a6(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems de pa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
96a7(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
96a8(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag
96b1(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
96b2(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa
96b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhan/ 
96b4(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
96b5(mdo sde): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa/ rnam par gzha ga pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang
96b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
96b7(mdo sde): bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag
96b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
97a1(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par
97a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ btso
97a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems
97a4(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos
97a5(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i/ byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
97a6(mdo sde): chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhugs kyi 'od dang / klog gi 'od dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor
97a7(mdo sde): bu'i 'od dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
97a8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs
97b1(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol
97b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
97b3(mdo sde): pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis long ba dang / 'phye bo dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs
97b4(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
97b5(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la
97b6(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
97b7(mdo sde): kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu mi khom pa rnam pa sna tshogasu skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
97b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba bcu'i las
98a1(mdo sde): kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
98a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ 
98a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa dang / 
98a4(mdo sde): kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can/ rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor/ bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
98a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dug brgyad rtsa bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
98a6(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
98a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
98a8(mdo sde): bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sor mo'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ 
98b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin
98b2(mdo sde): 'brog gnas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa
98b3(mdo sde): de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
98b4(mdo sde): bas nga byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
98b5(mdo sde): mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dang/  gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
98b6(mdo sde): bkod pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir ba sdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun kun te 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la
98b7(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
98b8(mdo sde): kyis mi ngas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
99a1(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag gi klu'i
99a2(mdo sde): gnas dag tu bye ma rab tu 'bar ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
99a3(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i gnas dag tu na mkha' lding kun
99a4(mdo sde): tu'akhrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan
99a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'a nyes kyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ 
99a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brag
99a7(mdo sde): 'dren pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
99a8(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che nor gyis 'jug kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
99b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bram ze'i bu mo su/ 
99b2(mdo sde): byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom
99b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas/ kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs
99b4(mdo sde): kha sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa ya dang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ brko ma ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
99b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis shAkya gsod pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par ga/ zhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
99b6(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la/ 
99b7(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'kho di bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi
99b8(mdo sde): lus la las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom
100a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bgrod pa ni gcig bur byas te/ gnyis sam gsum ma mchis la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
100a2(mdo sde): thams cad na yang / bkod pa ni gcig pur bas te/ gnyis dang gsum du ma mchis pa 'di ni chos nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas
100a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa can dag tu theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bko/ 
100a4(mdo sde): pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'jig pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i
100a5(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin las 'jig pa ma ma/ chis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin nyid
100a6(mdo sde): 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad 'ji ga pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
100a7(mdo sde): 'jig pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan
100a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ lta bar gyur pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin
100b1(mdo sde): las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin lus stong pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid lags te/ lta bar gyur pa
100b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid shes pa des/ chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lta bar gyur pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// 
100b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
100b4(mdo sde): cad ni sgro btags pa ma mchis pa ste/ sgro btags pa'i rnam// par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sgro btags/ pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 
100b5(mdo sde): sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin las/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin
100b6(mdo sde): gyis sgro btags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad sgro gtags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgro btags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs
100b7(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
100b8(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni las su bsgo ba mchis pa ste/ las su bsgo ba rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin las/ 
101a1(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ las su bsgo ba'i rang bzhin las/ las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ las su bskor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ las
101a2(mdo sde): bskor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ las su bsko ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan
101a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis las su bsgo ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ 
101a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni blang ba dang / dor ba ma mchis pa ste/ blang ba dang dor ba rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i
101a5(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma la gas pa'i slad du ste/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 
101a6(mdo sde): blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad blang ba dang
101a7(mdo sde): dor ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis blang ba dang dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
101a8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa ste/ 
101b1(mdo sde): 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las
101b2(mdo sde): 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin gyis
101b3(mdo sde): 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par gzhag
101b4(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa da' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
101b5(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 'dus byas rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad/ du zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lag
101b6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du ste/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid 'dus ma byas lags te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ 'dus ma byas
101b7(mdo sde): shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
101b8(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags
102a1(mdo sde): te/ dngos gzhi rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las/ dngos gzhi ma
102a2(mdo sde): mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyis/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos gzhi'i ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin gyis/ dngos gzhi ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad
102a3(mdo sde): dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
102a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnas ma mchis pa lags te/ gnas rnam par dag pa lags so// 
102a5(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lag sa pa'i slad du ste/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gnas ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ gnas kyi rang bzhin nyid
102a6(mdo sde): gnas ma mchis pa lags te/ gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnas ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad gnas ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rnam par gzhag
102a7(mdo sde): ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
102a8(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags
102b1(mdo sde): pa'i slad du ste/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las dngos po ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis// dngos// 
102b2(mdo sde): po ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
102b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
102b4(mdo sde): ni gnyisu mchis pa lags te/ gnyis rnam par dag pa/ lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin
102b5(mdo sde): las gnyisu ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid/ gnyisu ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnyisu ma mchis pa shes pa des// 
102b6(mdo sde): chos thams cad gnyis ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na
102b7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa
102b8(mdo sde): lags te/ mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las mtshan nyid
103a1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa shes
103a2(mdo sde): pa des/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
103a3(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ma
103a4(mdo sde): gas/ dag pa sa pa na / sa /  bzhin la pa sa gas pa da /  sa pa na
103a5(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dmigs pa'i ra/ nga bzhin nyid dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ da mi/ gas pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs pa ma mchis pa shes pa
103a6(mdo sde): des chos thams cad dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
103a7(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dbu ma'i lam lags
103a8(mdo sde): te/ mtha' rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtha'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ mtha'i rang bzhin las/ dbu ma'i lam gzhan ma lags kyi/ mtha'
103b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha'i rang bzhin gyis dbu ma'i lam shes pa des/ chos thams cad dbu ma'i lam lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha' rnam pa
103b2(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a
103b3(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lus kyi rang bzhin las
103b4(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin las/ lus ma mchis pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi/ lus kyi rang bzhin nyid/ lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus kyi
103b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis lus ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad lus ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom lda/ 'das kyi lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stongs
103b6(mdo sde): kha sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
103b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor ba rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad
103b8(mdo sde): du ste/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin las 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags kyi/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor ba ma
104a1(mdo sde): mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la
104a2(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
104a3(mdo sde): kyis chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te/ brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i
104a4(mdo sde): slad du ste/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te/ brjod du med pa'i
104a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags/ na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa rnam par
104a6(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
104a7(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun nas
104a8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ kun nas nyon
104b1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thang / 
104b2(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
104b3(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chags/ 
104b4(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa lags te/ chags pa rnam par dag pa la gso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ chags pa'i rang bzhin
104b5(mdo sde): las chags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ chags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis chags pa ma mchis pa shes/ 
104b6(mdo sde): pades/ chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
104b7(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rlom sems ma/ 
104b8(mdo sde): mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las/ 
105a1(mdo sde): rlom sems ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ rlom sems ma mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ rlom sem
105a2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rlom sems ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rlom sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// 
105a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos
105a4(mdo sde): thams cad ni yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yod pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yod pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yod pa'i rang
105a5(mdo sde): bzhin las yod pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags rlo/ yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ yod pa ma mchis pa legs te/ yod pa'i rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma mchis pa shes pa
105a6(mdo sde): des chos thams cad yod pa ma mchis pa lags ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
105a7(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa
105a8(mdo sde): lags te/ ming rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ ming gi rang bzhin las ming ma mchis pa gzhan ma
105b1(mdo sde): lags kyi/ ming gi rang bzhin nyid/ ming ma mchis pa lags te/ ming gi rang bzhin gyis ming ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad ming ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom
105b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ming rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
105b3(mdo sde): pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du
105b4(mdo sde): zhe na/ bdag gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ bdag gi rang bzhin las/ bdag ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma lags kyi/ bdag gi rang bzhin nyid bdag ma mchi/ 
105b5(mdo sde): pa lags te/ bdag gi rang bzhin gyis/ bdag ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
105b6(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ 
105b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las
105b8(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ rgyu dang rkyed kyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba
106a1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags te/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 
106a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ 
106a3(mdo sde): bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i
106a4(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las/ 'dres pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'dres pa ma
106a5(mdo sde): mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'dres pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'dres pa ma ma tshis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dres pa
106a6(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
106a7(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las/ gzha
106a8(mdo sde): ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las/ yi ge ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid/ yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis/ yi ge ma
106b1(mdo sde): mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yi ge ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal
106b2(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nga rgyal med pa
106b3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags te/ nga rgyal med pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin
106b4(mdo sde): khas nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi nga rgya la med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ nga rgyal ma mchis pa la/ gas te/ nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ nga rgyal
106b5(mdo sde): med pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad nga rgyal med po ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la
106b6(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan
106b7(mdo sde): 'das chos thams cad ni yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags te/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang
106b8(mdo sde): bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yul bsam
107a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchi
107a2(mdo sde): pab shes pa des/ chos thams cad yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu
107a3(mdo sde): yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa/ 
107a4(mdo sde): de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi sgor 'jug pa grangs med pa dag la/ phan tshun gnyen por gyur pa 'dres pa'i tshul dag gis
107a5(mdo sde): 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu/ 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis
107a6(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shos dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / 
107a7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems
107a8(mdo sde): dpa' gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thug su
107b1(mdo sde): / rlung de/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthong bar 'dod pa mkhyen nas/ bsam pa yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdu bar bya ba
107b2(mdo sde): phyir zhabs gnyis kyi mthil nas/ 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med
107b3(mdo sde): bsnyed phyung ngo // de bzhin du zhabs kyi sor mo'i tshigs re re dang / de bzhin du rje ngar gnyis dang / de bzhin du dus po'i lha nga gnyis dang // de bzhin du brla gnyis dang / de
107b4(mdo sde): bzhin du sta zur dang / de bzhin du rtsib logs gnyi ngas dang / de bzhin du lte ba khung dang / de bzhin du phra dag pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung mgo gnyis dang / 
107b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du dpung pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du lag ma thil gnyis dang / de bzhin du phyag sor gyi tshigs re ro/ dang / de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / de bzhin du
107b6(mdo sde): mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du dbu'i sgra nyag ma re re dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re nas/ 'od zer rgya
107b7(mdo sde): mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed phyung ste/ shar phyogasu 'bros so// 
107b8(mdo sde): de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ 
108a1(mdo sde): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'od zer gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin/ 
108a2(mdo sde): du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtsham/ 
108a3(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og gi phyogasu yang 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag thams cad 'phros so// de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma
108a4(mdo sde): snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sdang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis
108a5(mdo sde): khyab par mi byed do// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rte/ na gyi khams rgya mtsho 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa gang yin pa de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams
108a6(mdo sde): re re nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhag so// 
108a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed
108a8(mdo sde): lhags na/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 
108b1(mdo sde): 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing
108b2(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi
108b3(mdo sde): khams stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra
108b4(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul sbed lta co smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci spros/ 'khor
108b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta/ ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 
108b6(mdo sde): 'khor gang gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang gA'i klung
108b7(mdo sde): gcig gi bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bzhi cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i brgyad cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bcu
108b8(mdo sde): drug cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i cha nyi shu snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa
109a1(mdo sde): lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/ 
109a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang nor bu rin po/ 
109a3(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po'i sprin bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam
109a4(mdo sde): mkha' khyab par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ye shes
109a5(mdo sde): kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs/ pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to// gtor cing
109a6(mdo sde): mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang
109a7(mdo sde): gi phyogasu yang de dang 'dra'o// shar lho'i mtshamasu yang de dang 'dra'o// lho nub kyi mtsham su yang de dang 'dra'o// nub byang gi mtsham su yang de dang 'dra'o// byang shar gyi
109a8(mdo sde): mtsham su yang de dang 'dra'o// steng du yang de dang 'dra'o// 'og gi phyogasu yang de dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa de dag las/ 
109b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga ng+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed
109b2(mdo sde): lhag so// byang chub sems dpa' re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga d+ma'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
109b3(mdo sde): grangs med pa snyed kyis bskor na/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams
109b4(mdo sde): brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smo / 'jig rte/ na gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smo sa/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul pa rab
109b5(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos cwo 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor
109b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta/ 
109b7(mdo sde): ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'
109b8(mdo sde): re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing / sgrib pa
110a1(mdo sde): / med la/ ma 'dres pa'i na mkha' khyab par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po/ 
110a2(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po'i sprin sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to// gtor cing mngon par
110a3(mdo sde): gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs tsha/ 
110a4(mdo sde): re rer 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho las/ 'jig
110a5(mdo sde): ched gyi khams re re'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la bya/ chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam che'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
110a6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang sems can su la yang gnod pa 'am sgrib pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang / gling
110a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang zung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / gangs chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po rnams dang
110a8(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang / lha'i gnas rnams dang / klung dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / 
110b1(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang gnod pa 'am/ sgrib pa med do// sngon ji lta ba de bzhin du phyis kyang bya ba la 'jug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nam/ 
110b2(mdo sde): kyis kyang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du zhugs par mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos
110b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha gcig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs
110b4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can drag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye
110b5(mdo sde): shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang ra/ rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
110b6(mdo sde): ngag gis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par mdzad pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 'dus sam/ 'on te gzhan yang dag
110b7(mdo sde): par ma 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam/ zhi gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang
110b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyan thos chen po rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa la
111a1(mdo sde): rnam par rtse ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed yod par
