111a2(mdo sde): gyur la/ nyan thos chen po de dag re res kyang / se gol gtogs pa re re la sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga ng+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
111a3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed bskyed de/ nyan thos chen po re res kyang / sems bskyed pa re res gom pa 'dor ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga
111a4(mdo sde): bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed song la/ gom pa re re bor bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed/ 
111a5(mdo sde): kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig/ grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'ad bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang du nyan thos
111a6(mdo sde): chen po gcig 'gro ba der gnyis mi 'gro ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gar krung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba
111a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed du 'gro bar byed de/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshan
111a8(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams phyogasu song zhing / nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba der/ gnyis mi 'gro la/ de nas
111b1(mdo sde): mi la la zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas kun nas bskor te/ lag mthil bzhin du
111b2(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste/ byur bur byas la/ de nas mi des bye ma'i grong khyer de nas/ bye ma 'bru re re nas blangs
111b3(mdo sde): la/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma'i 'bru ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gses te/ brtse ba'i thabs 'dis bye ma'i 'bru de dag thams cad char gses la/ de nas mi de bye ma'i 'bru char
111b4(mdo sde): gses pa de dag thams cad shar phyogasu khyer te/ 8bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'das shing / bye ma'i 'bru char
111b5(mdo sde): gses pa gcig bor te/ brtsi ba'i thabs 'dis phye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams cad bor te/ shar phyogasu ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / 
111b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtsham su bor
111b7(mdo sde): la/ de nas mi des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag bor ba dang / gang dag tu ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad
111b8(mdo sde): grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par rabs kun nas bskor te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas
112a1(mdo sde): nas dbye mas bkang ste byur bur byas la/ nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni bye ma'i grong khyer de las/ bye ma'i 'bru gcig tsam du zad do// 
112a2(mdo sde): nga'o byang chub sems dpa' 'dir ma 'dus pa ni/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma lhag ma ji snyed pa tsam mo// de'i lhag ma'i bye ma snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
112a3(mdo sde): cad kyang ming 'thun la/ rus gcig pa sha stag yin na/ ming tha dad pa dang / rus tha dad pa lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob pa dang / sangs
112a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog yongasu grub pa mtha' yas pa la sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dag pa du mar sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kham
112a5(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongasu sbyong ba dang / sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// de nas
112a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi nang nas/ kha cig gi sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur
112a7(mdo sde): ba mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor de'i nang du bsdu ba dang / de dag gi sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur/ 
112a8(mdo sde): pa bstan pa'i phyir/ se gol gyi sgra mdzad do// de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi
112b1(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho de dag gi mdab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
112b2(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg rab
112b3(mdo sde): tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur
112b4(mdo sde): te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re na/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs
112b5(mdo sde): mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyo gas mtho/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ byang
112b6(mdo sde): shar mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho
112b7(mdo sde): mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// nub phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// byang phyogs kyang de
112b8(mdo sde): dang 'dra'o// shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams kyang de dang 'dra'o// steng dang 'og gi phyogs kyang de dang
113a1(mdo sde): 'dra'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchong / 
113a2(mdo sde): dag gi mdab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
113a3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg rab tu/ 
113a4(mdo sde): ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur
113a5(mdo sde): 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang / shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs/ 
113a6(mdo sde): dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyog sa mtho/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ 
113a7(mdo sde): byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma' ma/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho
113a8(mdo sde): mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi kun nas phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
113b1(mdo sde): mchogang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ rdul
113b2(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ng+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas/ 
113b3(mdo sde): par gyur te/ 'dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi stegs bu rin po ches spras pas ni bskor/ rin po che'i tshong tsong gis ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni
113b4(mdo sde): bsgreng / dril bu g.yer ko dra ba'i bla re ni bres/ tsan ngan sbrul gyi snying pos ni thugs nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas ni bka'/ rin po che 'thor pa chen po ni
113b5(mdo sde): mig mangs ris su bris/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i phyogs re re nas kyang mu tig rgyan phrang kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag
113b6(mdo sde): tu med/ grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // 
113b7(mdo sde): dar gyi lda ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // ras kyi lda ldi kha dog sna tshogs la kha dog du ma
113b8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // dar gyi chun kor kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag
114a1(mdo sde): khrig grangs med pa dag 'byung ngo // dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grang
114a2(mdo sde): med pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng de dag la/ rlung gis phog na yang lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng
114a3(mdo sde): dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ sil snyan gyi yan lag dpe med pa 'bum phrag bye ba rdung ba'i slob dpon
114a4(mdo sde): gyis brdungs pa las kyang / de lta bu'i sgra snyan par mi 'byung ngo // dril bu g.yer ka'i 'phreng ba rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha yul pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung ba de lta bu/ 
114a5(mdo sde): ni gser gyi snod 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam brdung sa pa las kyang de lta bu'i sgra zab cing yid du 'ong ba mi 'byung ngo // mig mangs ris re re la yang rin po che'i shing / 
114a6(mdo sde): ljon pa re re yod de/ rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng bas ni mdze sa par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni
114a7(mdo sde): bsgreng / rin po che'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas ni brgyan/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas kyang brgyan to// ras kyi lda ldi'i rgyan dang / 
114a8(mdo sde): tu med grangs med pa dang / me tog gi lda ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas kyang brgyan to// rin po che'i shing
114b1(mdo sde): sdor ba re re'i drung na yang ring po che'i seng ge'i khri 'bang dpag tshad lnga brgya pa yod do// rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes
114b2(mdo sde): par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni sbreng / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla res ni bres/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni byugs/ me tog man de ra ba dang / man dA ra ba
114b3(mdo sde): chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang ka mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / sna ma dang / bar shi ka
114b4(mdo sde): dang tA ru ni dang / bal li dang / go tar ni dang / rab tu dri zhim pa dang / don sma ri dang / lha'i snga ma dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / bad+ma dkar po dang / 
114b5(mdo sde): me tog chen po rnams ni bkram/ nor bu rin po che chen be glog gi sgron ma'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grang sa med pa dang / nor bu rin po che gnyi zla'i sgron ma'i rgyan
114b6(mdo sde): 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal
114b7(mdo sde): po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che ze ba can gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba can gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang nor bu
114b8(mdo sde): rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang ka/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan
115a1(mdo sde): dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che pad+ma ral gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dag gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / 
115a2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che an+da snyil gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// 
115a3(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig dkar po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan
115a4(mdo sde): kyis kyang rgyan to// mu tig mthon mo'i rgyar 'phreng gi rgyad gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig ser po'i rgyar 'breng gi/ rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig dmar po'i rgyan 'phreng gi
115a5(mdo sde): rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gser mdog gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig na mkha' 'dog gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gi 'bru'i ngos re re dang / 
115a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i 'bru'i ngos re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad
115a7(mdo sde): med pa dag byung ngo // de la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha
115a8(mdo sde): cig las ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs
115b1(mdo sde): med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin
115b2(mdo sde): kha cig las ni gzungs tha dad pa/ rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad
115b3(mdo sde): par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer
115b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni smon lam tha dad pa rgya
115b5(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung po// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ brtson/ 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa'i rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par
115b6(mdo sde): bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grang sa med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od
115b7(mdo sde): zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ 
115b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod
116a1(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad
116a2(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa
116a3(mdo sde): dag byung ngo // yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ 
116a4(mdo sde): ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 
116a5(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
116a6(mdo sde): mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhag so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re'i 'khor yang / 
116a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog pA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhag so// byang chub
116a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med parjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing
116b1(mdo sde): sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i na mkha' khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags na/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / lha'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i
116b2(mdo sde): sprin tingange 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i brjod pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i na mkha' khyab par byas te/ de bzhin
116b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo// 
116b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas darang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la' khod do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub
116b5(mdo sde): dang / byang dang / shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub bya mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar rgyu mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
116b6(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag kyang / 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu ga yo/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldegachem
116b7(mdo sde): chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams
116b8(mdo sde): de dag re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags
117a1(mdo sde): so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor yang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ng+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
117a2(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhag so// byang chub sems dpa'i re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med parjod pa/ stong gsum
117a3(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la/ ma 'dres pa'i na mkha' khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ byang
117a4(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i spri so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de
117a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing / mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan
117a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las 'byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
117a7(mdo sde): kyi gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
117a8(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag byung ste/ de
117b1(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang lus 'dzam+bu nu bo'i gser gyi mdog can gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa bas lhag pa/ dba' bar 'gro ba'i tinge 'dzin la rnam par rtse ga
117b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog yongasu grub pa mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi
117b3(mdo sde): khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongasu sbyong ba/ pad+ma'i stan la 'khod pa sha stag go// pad+ma re re yang rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ sdong bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ nor bu rin po
117b4(mdo sde): che'i ze ba can gser gyi mdab ma bkod pa shin tu rgyas pa'i gzugs can 'dza pU chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis/ phyogs thams cad kyi sprin
117b5(mdo sde): snang bar byed pa/ kun nas 'od zer bkod pa/ sangs rgyas/ kyi yul mtha' yas pa'i gsung rjod pa'i 'od zer/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng ba rab tu
117b6(mdo sde): 'gyed pas mdzes par byas shing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba sha stag go/ de nus byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'od zer rgya mtsho 'bum phrag bye ba
117b7(mdo sde): khrag khrig grangs med pa btang nas/ pad+ma de dag las babs te/ lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / spos kyi
117b8(mdo sde): sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / rol mo'i sprin dang / rgyan gyi sprin dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sprid dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi
118a1(mdo sde): sgra'i sprin chags pa med cing bsgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gtor cing / 
118a2(mdo sde): mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
118a3(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
118a4(mdo sde): sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rte/ na gyi khams dag nas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bla na med pa yang
118a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas pa she stag go// de nas 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi
118a6(mdo sde): khams rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bdag cag gis mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs
118a7(mdo sde): kyis mkhyen nas/ gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer grangs med pa dag byung ste/ des
118a8(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad sdang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
118b1(mdo sde): 'phrul pa thams cad kyang bstan te/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa/ yongasu smin par byas nas yang phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
118b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las/ lan grangs med par bskor bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la phog par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la
118b3(mdo sde): 'od zer des phog ma thag tu yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu dang / gtsug tor dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang
118b4(mdo sde): bo re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
118b5(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung
118b6(mdo sde): gis 'jig pa dag mthong ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten
118b7(mdo sde): gyi khams rgya mtsho srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas bskor te/ rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang
118b8(mdo sde): ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gang tu mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig par mthong ba de dag ni/ ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig lta
119a1(mdo sde): bur blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa ni/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul lhag ma ji snyed yod pa/ 
119a2(mdo sde): tsam du blta bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che glog gi
119a3(mdo sde): sgron ma las grub pa yino// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che snang
119a4(mdo sde): ba thams cad 'dus pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol lani nor
119a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che ze ba can las grub pa yin no// 'jig rte/ na gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i/ ze ba las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
119a6(mdo sde): la ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rdo rje rtse mo las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi kham
119a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig
119a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che pad+ma ra ga las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dag las grub pa yin no// 
119b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya las grub pa yin no// 'jig
119b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che an da snyil las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po las grub pa yino// 
119b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa
119b4(mdo sde): yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig dkar po las grub
119b5(mdo sde): pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig gser mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig na mkha' mdog las/ 
119b6(mdo sde): grub pa yino// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig
119b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lnga la ni// 
119b8(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che se rgya mtsho/ 
120a1(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par/ 
120a2(mdo sde): bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yino// 'jig
120a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
120a4(mdo sde): la ni nor bu rin po che mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che/ 
120a5(mdo sde): smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa/ rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya
120a6(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbugs 'byin 'thob pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad
120a7(mdo sde): bar bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa
120a8(mdo sde): rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las
120b1(mdo sde): grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod/ 
120b2(mdo sde): pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa las
120b3(mdo sde): grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 
120b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 'jig rten ra gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo re re la zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ zhing thams cad kyi sbrul snyed du sna tshog su gnas pa dag
120b5(mdo sde): snang ngo // zhing re re na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag snang bar gyur te// zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi kha dog du gnas pa dag/ 
120b6(mdo sde): snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug pa
120b7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slob tu bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems
120b8(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gcig/ 
121a1(mdo sde): nas gcig tu brgyud pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan kyang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstan par mi nus so// sangs rgyas/ 
121a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das re re la yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho
121a3(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i
121a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho/ rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thoso// 
121a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dag kyang snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
121a6(mdo sde): 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag kyang snang zhing thos so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i
121a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdu dra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du bstan
121a8(mdo sde): kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sku dang ye shes chags pa med pa bsnyes pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 
121b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos par byed cing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'don tu 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / bdug pa
121b2(mdo sde): dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod pa de dag gi bsod nams ji snyed / 
121b3(mdo sde): cig 'phel bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'dzam dpal
121b4(mdo sde): gzho nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med
121b5(mdo sde): pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin
121b6(mdo sde): pa lnga las byung ba/ bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa'i bar du bskyed pa yang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpas tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa la/ 
121b7(mdo sde): zan chang gcig tsam yongasu btang bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba de zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dper na/ 
121b8(mdo sde): zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di ltar mtho ba dang mtshungs pa med pa dang / che bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ 
122a1(mdo sde): lham me lhan ne/ ljang nger 'dug go// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mtho ba dang / 
122a2(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa dang / ches byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba rnams zil gyis gnon te/ 
122a3(mdo sde): lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can thams
122a4(mdo sde): cad dbyug pas bsnun tam/ mtshon gyis btab ste/ bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod
122a5(mdo sde): sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ brnyas/ pa'i sems kyang bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang po 'phel bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
122a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / bsnyas pa'i sems bskyed pas ni/ chos kyis phongs par gyur pa'i
122a7(mdo sde): las byas par 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa yongasu bzung bar 'gyur// chos ma yin pa yongasu 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung gcod par byed pa yino// sangs rgyas rnams ma
122a8(mdo sde): byung na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'jab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams
122b1(mdo sde): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / bdud kyi ris rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// 
122b2(mdo sde): ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// 'khor los sgyur ba dang / stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// mi'i 'jig rten yang 'byung bar mi
122b3(mdo sde): 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang phrad pa las 'byung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las 'byung ba'i phyir// 
122b4(mdo sde): de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sem/ sa dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas thams
122b5(mdo sde): cad la mchod par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ bskur bsti byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur bsti/ byas par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'
122b6(mdo sde): gang la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed la/ lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' phul te/ sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa rgya mtsho
122b7(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du phul la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis/ 
122b8(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bdug pa las dmigs pa 'am/ mar me las dmigs pa 'am/ me tog las dmigs pa 'am/ spos las dmigs pa 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig las/ 
123a1(mdo sde): dmigs te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag
123a2(mdo sde): lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyuraro// snga ma des ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi 'od/ stong gi char yang mi phong
123a3(mdo sde): 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ bye ba'i char mi phod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/ dpe dang rgyur yang mi zod do// 
123a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la/ nyes/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig ni stong pa nyid la mos par
123a5(mdo sde): gyur na/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan mos pa skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches
123a6(mdo sde): grangs med pa skyed par 'gyuraro// bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma de ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi char yang mi phod// 'bum
123a7(mdo sde): gyi char yang mi phod/ bye ba'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// 
123a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las byang chub sems dpa'i zan bcad dam/ khros te than byang chub sems dpa' glang po cher skyes pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la/ 
123b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa gcig bcad la 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / don gyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan
123b2(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zan bcad de/ khros nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos
123b3(mdo sde): med par byas la/ sems can thams cad long bar byas na/ mi dge ba'i las 'di ni snga ma'i mi dge ba de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// bcom
123b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za da
123b5(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'amaci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / 
123b6(mdo sde): phyogs tha dad pa nas/ lhags pa'i byang chub se mas dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams yid ra nges te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
123b7(mdo sde): bstod do// mdo'i rgyal po sprin chen po'i le'u re re la/ chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi
123b8(mdo sde): glog gis gsal bar byas pa'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las/ dga' ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa/ 'jig rten grangs med pa dang 'thun par
124a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bas dbang byed cing / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i
124a2(mdo sde): le'u ste/ sum cu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
124a3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki ni nA ma ma hA yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem
124a4(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig no/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi
124a5(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
124a6(mdo sde): blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ting
124a7(mdo sde): 'dzin yongasu dag pa dang / bzod pa yong su dag pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yong su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byams pa
124a8(mdo sde): yong su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yong su dag go// blo gros rnam par dgag snying rje yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yong su dag go// bro gros rnam par dag pa
124b1(mdo sde): dga' ba yongasu dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yongasu dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i/ 
124b2(mdo sde): ye shes yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ stobs yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par
124b3(mdo sde): dag pa/ mi 'jigs pa yongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag
124b4(mdo sde): go blo gros rnam par dag pa/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag pa la su zhig me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / 
124b5(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis sti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nu sa te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gang
124b6(mdo sde): yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mtha' yang zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam pa
124b7(mdo sde): dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so// bsam gyis mi khyab
124b8(mdo sde): bo/ mtshungs pa med do// dpag tu med do// grangs med do// dpag gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs
125a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la/ 
125a2(mdo sde): su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed
125a3(mdo sde): pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar gzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / 
125a4(mdo sde): ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor bar byed pa des phan yon lnga yongasu bzung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 
125a5(mdo sde): dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong
125a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin
125a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin pa dang / de yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du
125a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam/ bdud kyi
125b1(mdo sde): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs mtho zhing rigs che ba dang / bcas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i
125b2(mdo sde): dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam
125b3(mdo sde): par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
125b4(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// su zhig skor ba byed pa ni// tshe rabs
125b5(mdo sde): dag ni thams cad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan// bsod nams ldan ni nga 'jigs med 'gyur// mchod rten skor ba byas nas ni// 
125b6(mdo sde): tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur// ngas ni gang dag bstan pa yi// mi khom brgyad po de dag spong / 
125b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa// mnyes par byed 'di dal ba gcig/ mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang // mthu dang stobs dang
125b8(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur// le lo can du de mi 'gyur// de ni phyug cing nor cher 'gyur// bsod nams ldan zhing rdzi ba med// 'jig rten sgron ma mnyes byas nas// yang dang yang du sti stang byed
126a1(mdo sde): / bdag med stong pa'i chos thos na// de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur// myur du dad pa thob 'gyur zhing // chos don ji bzhin mkhas par 'gyur// tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa
126a2(mdo sde): dang / phyug po rnamasu skye bar 'gyur// dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gtong ba btang zhing ser sna med// 'dzam bu'i gling na gang yang rung // khyad par can gyi rigs mdzes pa// der
126a3(mdo sde): ni brtan pa de skye ste// dma' ba dag ni rnam par sbas// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// skye ba thams cad kun tu yang // dbang cher grags pa'i khyim bdag dang // dpal dang gzi brjid gzi
126a4(mdo sde): ldan 'gyur// bram ze sA la che 'dra dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing mang thos dang // rgyal rigs sA la che 'dra dang // phyug cing nor chen ldan par 'gyur// ris bskor rgya mtsho tshun cad kyi// sa
126a5(mdo sde): kun la ni gang smon pa// gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug bla// rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyu ba rdzu 'phrul che// rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal srid
126a6(mdo sde): gnas nas sangs rgyas la// yang dang yang du sti stang byed// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su// song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dang / lhun po'i zom gyi dbang phyug po// lha yi dbang po
126a7(mdo sde): brgya byin 'gyur// lha dbang shin tu 'thab bral dang // de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang // lha dbang shin tu 'phrul pa dang // dbang sgyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba
126a8(mdo sde): byas na ni// de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing // lha rnams bye bas mchod par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mi gang skor ba byed
126b1(mdo sde): pa yis// bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang // brjod pas zad par bya mi nus// su zhig byang chub sems bskyed nas// ston pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal ba// de ni bskal pa bye bar yang
126b2(mdo sde): nams kyang long zhing 'theng mi 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mngon tu skor ba byed pa ni// bung ba sngon po mdzes 'dra yi// rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob 'gyur// 
126b3(mdo sde): mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// de ni nges par rtag tu yang // 'thun pa'i don kun thos 'gyur zhing // don min rnams ni spangs par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// mthu/ 
126b4(mdo sde): dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni le lo med 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bag yod ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba/ byas na ni// brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brtan
126b5(mdo sde): la/ brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang // de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis de// nams kyang 'chi dus byed mi 'gyur// mkhas pa tshe ni rdzogs
126b6(mdo sde): rdzogasu// zad par byas nas 'chi dus byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor dang // grong rdal rnamasu longs spyod dang // gzugs kyis khyad par/ 
126b7(mdo sde): 'phags par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// de ni 'dod pa mi sten cing // lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing // gtsang ma'i chos la gnas par 'gyur// blo gros rnam par
126b8(mdo sde): dag pa// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de/ pus mo gnyi ga'i lha nga sa la
127a1(mdo sde): btsugs nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sku legs par brgyad pa de/ ci 'dra bar
127a2(mdo sde): bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur cig ces de la mos pa skyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang
127a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyiraro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang
127a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa/ bla na med pas kyang zad par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs kyi bu des bsod
127a5(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung ba'i phyir te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
127a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / 'chags kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang
127a7(mdo sde): rung chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding
127a8(mdo sde): ngam mi 'am ci 'am// lto 'phye chen po 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sems can gyi grangasu ma gtogs pa shing ngam/ ri 'am/ khung bu 'am/ bu ga 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung
127b1(mdo sde): steng de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de log su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / 
127b2(mdo sde): ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la/ sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu
127b3(mdo sde): 'dud kun tu 'dud par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de// sangs
127b4(mdo sde): rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyis 'jug dang // su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun 'gro ba// de 'gro tshon 'jig rten gsum po 'dud pa byed// mi rnams gtso bor
127b5(mdo sde): 'byung gang du 'gro byed pa// de log su ni rtswa dang shing dang sdong lcags dang // sman dang shing lo rnams dang / 'bras bu mdab ma dang // yid 'ong dri ldan me tog rnams ni
127b6(mdo sde): 'dud par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rnam sa la pus mo bcug pa ni// de la mi'i dbang po kun kyang 'dren par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dbang dang klu dang lha'i rgyal po dang / 
127b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par gtugs par byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bus gtsugs phyag byas na// dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur
127b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni go char 'gyur// mthu che bla mar bya zhing thub par dka' bar 'gyur// de yi yul na sems can gang dag gnas
128a1(mdo sde): gyur pa// de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur// de la sems can gang yang sdig pa mi skyed de// skye bo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du
128a2(mdo sde): 'ong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// de la sems can kun gyi rgyal po rab tu 'dud// lha dang klu dang mi dang lto 'phye chen po 'dud// bskal
128a3(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas rnamasu dbugs phyin thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// gang tshe rgyal ba dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin ga
128a4(mdo sde): ba rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba 'thob// 'dren pa gzhal yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// 'jig/ rten sangs rgyas gyur ces mos pa bskyed nas ni// bcom
128a5(mdo sde): ldan mchod rten rnams la pus gtsugs phyag 'tshal ba// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya grangs zad 'gyur na// de ni ring por mi thogs byang chub mtshungs med 'thob// gang
128a6(mdo sde): zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la// bskal pa bye ba gzhal yas sti stang byed pa bas// gang zhig phyi dus mi bzang bskal pa 'di la ni// mchod rten phyag 'tshal de yi
128a7(mdo sde): bsod nams ches mang ngo // sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa// spyod pa dam pa spyad nas khyad par bsnyes gyur pa// mi yi khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na
128a8(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin 'gyur// byang chub tu ni sems bsngo te// me tog 'phreng ba byas nas su// mchod rten dag la su 'bul ba// de ni nams kyang po/ 
128b1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar gyur// der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyi// gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur// mchod rten 'breng ba 'dir
128b2(mdo sde): phul na// khang bzangs dag dang khang brtsegs pa// lha yi bu mos bsten pa rnams// sum cu gsum du spyod par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing // gser gyi bye ma
128b3(mdo sde): bdal gyur pa// bai DUR+Ya dang shel dag gi/ lha yi rdzing bu thob par 'gyur// der ni lha yi dga' spyad nas// mkhas pa tshe tshad rdzogs par 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos na
128b4(mdo sde): mi nang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis// mkhas pa bag yod gyur nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas te// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa byed
128b5(mdo sde): mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'dod na dgas mi 'phrogs zhing // zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrogs mi 'a/ gyur// de ni nams kyang rmongs mi 'gyur// rkang gnyis
128b6(mdo sde): mchog la mchog byas na// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du chags pa med cing zhe sdang med// brkam pa med cing dbang po bsdams// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// tshe
128b7(mdo sde): rabs bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa// kun tu dkur sti byas par 'gyur// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// brgya
128b8(mdo sde): byin lha yi dbang phyug 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la// dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na// lha yi dag dang mi rnams kyi// don
129a1(mdo sde): thams cad grub par 'gyur// dma' ba'i rigs ni rnam spangs te// der ni de skye 'gyur ma yin// phyag cing nor chen ldan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug de 'gyuraro// 
129a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na// gzugs dang don dang longs spyod dang // kha dog dang ni 'byor pa dang // kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing // 'dod
129a3(mdo sde): chags kyis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams kyi skyod shes shing // tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na// gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag
129a4(mdo sde): dang 'a ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing // sdig pa'i las/ ni byed mi 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa mchod byed na// de ni spos dang me tog gis// nams kyang 'phongs pa
129a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur zhing // dran ldan shes rab ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs la su mchod pa// de yi nor gyi phung po la// rgyal po dang ni chom rkun dang // me dang chus kyang reg mi
129a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la// dar gyi dbul ba su 'bul ba// de ni skam dang mya ngan dang // nang du can du gzhar mi 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma mchod byed pa// tshe
129a7(mdo sde): rabs dag ni thams cad du// mya ngan med cing gnod med dang // 'khor los sgyur ba 'byor ce na 'gyur// 'dren la mchod pa byas na ni// rkang pa lag pa mnyen 'gyur zhing // yan
129a8(mdo sde): lag rnam par dag 'gyur la// gzugs dang kha dog ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te// byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed// gang dag 'jig rten rab dkon pa// 
129b1(mdo sde): rkang gnyis mchog rnams mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// mchod cing bde la shes rab ldan// byang chub dam pa 'tshang
129b2(mdo sde): yang rgya// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la// 'phreng ba'i khang pa byas na ni// de ni g.yog 'khor mi phyed cing // rgyal po 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// 'phags pa rnams kyis gang
129b3(mdo sde): spangs pa// sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi// dge ba'i las la sten par byed// lha 'am 'on te klu rnams sam// 'jig rten dag na gang / 
129b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa// de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang // sti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur// brtan pa de ni gar skyes par// bsod nams gzi brjid shin tu brjid// yul 'khor dag dang
129b5(mdo sde): grong khyer dag/ rigs der sti stang byed par 'gyur// sangs/ rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// rkang gnyis mchog la su ma chod pa// de dag mthu stobs che ba dang // g.yog
129b6(mdo sde): 'khor chen pos mdzes par 'gyur// byang chub tu ni sems bsngos te// 'phreng ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na// sangs rgya sa rnams kyis gang bsngags pa'i// 'byor pa
129b7(mdo sde): dag ni des 'thob bo// de ni mtheng dang zhar ba dang // smad dang ma rungs mi 'gyur gnas// gang dang gang du skyes par yang // mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan par 'gyur// sems can
129b8(mdo sde): dbul po rnams mthong na// de ni nor gyis sdud par byed// de ni nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// blo gros chen pos sa 'di kun// yongasu btang ba byas nas/ 
130a1(mdo sde): kyang / dmar pa'i sems su mi 'gyur zhing // de ni nams kyang 'phongs mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa// de dag bu dang bu mo dang // chung ma
130a2(mdo sde): dge zhing bzang mo dag/ btang nas mya ngan byed mi 'gyur// de ni sngon du 'gro 'gyur zhing // dkri ba med la mthong na dga'// phrag dog dang ni nga rgyal gyis// nams kyang de la
130a3(mdo sde): gnod mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa// de dag phrag dog med cing des// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// phan pa 'dod cing lton ldan// gang dag byang chub
130a4(mdo sde): mngon zhugs pa// 'jig rten kun na de rin chen// de dag 'byung ba shin tu dkon// smad pa med pa'i sbyin gnas 'gyur radas 'di dag ni rim gyis su// bgrang bar bya zhing
130a5(mdo sde): dpag par nus// de dag rnams kyi ston mtha'// tshigagos bstan par mi nuso// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// dus gsum sems ni shes par nus// de dag
130a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston mtha'// tshig gis bstan par mi nuso// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag/ skra ni bye ba stong gshegs pa'i// skra yis zad par bya bar nus// de dag yon tan zad mi
130a7(mdo sde): nus nas rnams thams cad phyer blags pa// rab tu phra rdul shes par nus// sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus// chu klung thams cad rab 'bab pa// 
130a8(mdo sde): rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro yang srid// sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ skyon mtha' brjod de lta min// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// sngon gyi lus rnams ji snyed pa// bgrang/ 
130b1(mdo sde): bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag yon zad mi 'gyur// sngon gyi lus rnams thams cad la// spu 'phreng ji snyed yod pa rnams// bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag lton zang
130b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// 'gro ba lnga por 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi spu rnams ni// bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag ston zad mi 'gyur// sa 'di ji snyed thams cad pa// chu yi
130b3(mdo sde): phung por gnas gyur kyang // de ni bgrang zhing dpag par nus// de dag lton brjod mi nus// mar me mdzad nas bzung nas ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa ji snyed pa// de yi bar du shing ljon
130b4(mdo sde): rnams// ji snyed ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur ba// de dag 'bras bu me tog rnams// de dag zad par shes par nus// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya
130b5(mdo sde): bgrangs par// brtson pa zhig gis de dag gi/ bsngags 'phreng yid du 'ong brjod kyang // sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ ston mtha' ni brjod mi nus// sangs rgyas sras po
130b6(mdo sde): de dag la// mi gang mi dga' byed pa de// lha dang mi ni spangs nas su// de dag dmyal ba spyod yul 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// mi gang la la gnod byed pa// 
130b7(mdo sde): mig med pa 'am long ba dang // sdug bsngal dpung gnyen med par 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'gro// de ni 'bar zhing 'jigs skrag 'gyur// lus ni chen por gyur nas
130b8(mdo sde): kyang / sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur// tshe rabs de dang de dag tu// de lus dpag tshad tsam 'gyur te// de dag phrum ltar zlum gyur la// kun nas yongasu bza' bar 'gyur
131a1(mdo sde): de tshe lus la mgo bo ni// lnga stong yod par 'byung 'gyur zhing // mgo bo de dag re re la'ang // lce ni lnga brgya tham pa yod// gcig la'ang thong shol brkyang
131a2(mdo sde): dag gis// lce ni rab tu rmo bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i las ni rnam smin gyis// mi bzad chen por gshegs par 'gyur// na med de nas shi 'phos nas// de ni tshe dang rab tsha bar// blo gros
131a3(mdo sde): ngan pa tshor ba myong // de sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // dmyal ba'i sa
131a4(mdo sde): na dkon ma yin// tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khri dag dag ni brgya bgrangs par// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / 'gyur zhing // des ni bzang po rnams mi mthong // sangs
131a5(mdo sde): rgyas sras po skyob rnams la// gnod pa dag ni byas gyur na// a la ga rta 'jigs pa yis// shin tu gdug pa'i sbrul tu skye// de ni bkres dang skom pas nyen// sdig pa'i las rnam
131a6(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur// de ni zas kyang mi rnyed de// nams kyang 'drangs par za mi myong // shi 'phos gshin rje'i 'jig rten du// de ni rtag par gtun tu rdung // dge slong dag la gnod byas
131a7(mdo sde): pas/ nams kyang skabs ni rnyed mi 'gyur// de nas shi 'phos dus byas te// mi yi lus ni thob gyur na// blo ngan de ni dmus long 'gyur// gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa med// de ni
131a8(mdo sde): nyes par smras byas te// 'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// ngan song dag tu myur du 'gro/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsdams ga/ 
131b1(mdo sde): zhig gnod byed pa// bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu// nams kyang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams la// gang zhig chos bzhin srung byed pa// des ni ngan 'gro/ 
131b2(mdo sde): kun spangs te// myur du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang // stobs dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med// dran dang ldan zhing shes rab ldan// bde zhing ngo tsha
131b3(mdo sde): khrel ltos ldan// gang du 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron// yongasu mya ngan 'das gyur pa// sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas ni// yang dang yang du sti stang byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi
131b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa yi// 'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas sras po rnams la ni// su zhig phyi phyir dang mi byed// gang gris sangs rgyas stong rnams dang // brgya dang bye ba bgrang nga
131b5(mdo sde): la bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// de snyed bskal par bkur kha bas// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi// dam/ chos 'jig tshe gang zhig gis// nyin dang mtshan du 'chi
131b6(mdo sde): byed pa// de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags// chos 'jig dus na chos 'dzin pa// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sangs rgyas ye shes rab gnas pa// nga la des ni mchod
131b7(mdo sde): pa byas// dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe// ston pa'i bstan pa srung byed pa// bskal pa byed pa stong rnams// de ni nams kyang rgud mi 'gyur// lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing // de na
131b8(mdo sde): nad kyis btab mi 'gyur// de ni yid du mi 'ong bas// nams kyang 'phrogs par mi 'gyuraro// ston pa'i bstan pa srung byas na/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // des dang gsal
132a1(mdo sde): dang gnyen pa dang // sems can rnams la byams sems 'gyur// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// bde dang dga' 'thob mdzod ni mang por 'gyur
132a2(mdo sde): sngon gyi rim gro bya ba 'thob 'gyur zhing // mi khom brgyad po ma lus zad par spong // 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// dper na na mkha' skar mas yongs gang ltar// rtag tu
132a3(mdo sde): mtshan gyis go char byas pa dang // rab tu tshig snyan yid 'ong dbyangs ldan 'gyur// 'jig che rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// gang na yid bde med cing rab sdug pa// rigs dman
132a4(mdo sde): de ni de yis spangs par 'gyur// phyug cing shin tu bde lta longs spyod ldan// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bsan da mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// 
132a5(mdo sde): mi dman sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen bkur byed// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchog tu rab mdzes gzugs
132a6(mdo sde): ldan shes rab ldan// mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur// rgyal po mkhas pa 'dzangs rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchog
132a7(mdo sde): tu gzugs mdzes blta na sdug pa dang // skyes pa bud med lha rnams dga' ba dang // bde zhing mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan// ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba lha yi lhas// 
132a8(mdo sde): gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshad pa// maM de'i lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus kyi chen thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ston pa mi mchog gzugs byed pa// ras dz+r-i/ 
132b1(mdo sde): rtsig ngos 'dri'am gser las byas// de yi chos kyi khyang par gang yin pa// de dag ma lus rab tu bstan gyis nyon// de ni blta min long bar gzhar mi 'gyur// sgur por mi 'gyur
132b2(mdo sde): yan lag mi sdug min// de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing kha dog ldan// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par 'thob// spobs pa 'thob
132b3(mdo sde): cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong // shes bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi gtso// de mthong sems can bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur// sdig byed mi 'gyur zhe sdang med sems ldan// g.yo/ 
132b4(mdo sde): med mi rku rgyal po 'khrug mi byed// mthu dang ldan zhing dang dang cher grags par 'gyur// byams la gnas shing mi dman sems dang ldan// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs sku rab
132b5(mdo sde): mdzes byas na// de ni mchog 'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'os// blo ldan phyug cing che nyid rgya cher ldan// dbang ldan 'khor lo// sa sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 'dren pa'i sku
132b6(mdo sde): gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// lha yi dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa// lhun po'i zom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur// bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal srid ston// de ni dran
132b7(mdo sde): dang blo gros mi ldan min// de ni rtog mos shes rab tshang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na dbugs phyin thob 'gyur te// 'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs// sems can
132b8(mdo sde): snying po mtshungs med mchod byas nas// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro/ ngan 'gro gsum po des ni rnam spangs te/ bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur// 
133a1(mdo sde): 'dren pa'i gru gzugs rab tu sangs byas pa// dbang ldan dang thug sang pa snar 'gyur te// me ma dga' bya'i sems kyis sas rgyas mdzod// rgyal ba/ 
133a2(mdo sde): sa ma/  na mas pa gyun// ma sa A //  tha sa ma kyang ngag la gyur la
133a3(mdo sde): gnal med khang mchod pa lnga sdug thob par 'gyur// de ni dedang dpor stobs bcu ldan pa po// sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra med pa 'thob// kha dog mtha' yas 'jig rten kun na gsal/ 
133a4(mdo sde): gaper ge na che be rgyan pang mthus// su dag dga' pa'i yid kyi mo ga zangs// dang kyis 'jig rten mgon lachar du gtor// don ma'i 'jig rten pa mad rnams ldan/ 
133a5(mdo sde): rdul phreng gnas nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/  kas shing tha 'dri ldan lum// yan lag legs gnas ma tshus meng 'thob par 'gyur// skye bo mang ngos pa ma
133a6(mdo sde): ma yin te// phrul ba ga tu 'dod pa spong bar gyur/ snang ba rnam par spyod kyi 'dong pa la// rang thugs zung ltar drang par shes par 'gyur// changs spyong dge babyung bar 'a
133a7(mdo sde): pa spyod/ dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu spong bar 'gyur// brgal ba mtha' yas mang du de kha nas// rab mdzes sut+pal bsung ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de la~M lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra
133a8(mdo sde): no tsadran la bur drigam pang pal srung // spyad pa rnam par spyod mtho ba dang // ma badri rtson gti mug gnang mi byed// dman pa med pa'i sems kyis dbugs phyin rnyed// @
133b1(mdo sde): yod lha yi nang na rgyal po 'thob// gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa na/ de ni gus pas de dag chos kyang 'dzin// mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin// 
133b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig dus tshe// rab tu dga' bas ston pa'i chos rdul 'dzin// des ni chos
133b3(mdo sde): mchog mdzes pa de spyad pas// gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhar mi 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing // nyon mongs med pa gser
133b4(mdo sde): mdog stobs bcur gyur// de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du// rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i bsngags brjod nus// 'jig rten kun tu sdig pa'i las
133b5(mdo sde): spangs te// dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gis la sa byas shing // rlabs chen spyod tshe don ni legs byas nas// 'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs
133b6(mdo sde): rgyas 'gyur// gang gis spos chu yungs 'bru tsam bla ngas te// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bdug phye da pa// de yi phan yon brjod kyis sems
133b7(mdo sde): dang zhing // rdul dang dri ma spongs la mnyan par gyis// de ni bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun rgya// nad med gyur cing blo brtan bag yod la// spyad pa
133b8(mdo sde): rnam par spyod ci mya ngan 'dul// skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong // rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur// mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor los sgyu
134a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te// gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi go cha can// 'jig rten kun na yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob// de la yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal med// spyad pa spyod tshe longs spyo
134a2(mdo sde): nyams mi 'gyur// phyug cing nor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang // mya ngan med 'gyur 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// skye bo mang po lhags te de la 'dri// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa khyad 'phags
134a3(mdo sde): chos// tshig rab brjod cing the tshom sel bar byed// chos gos yid bde slar yang smra bar byed// sdig pa'i las med blo rgya me dang ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos mchog khyad 'phag
134a4(mdo sde): pa/ dga' bar 'gyur la rtag tu mkhas byas te// mig kyang sbyong zhing mun pa sel bar byed// 'dod chags mi che zhe sdang che ma yin// mi yi 'jig rten gti mug che ma yin// de ni tshangs/ 
134a5(mdo sde): spyad dag pa mchog 'di spyod// mi yi don ni dpag tu med pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la spos bdugs na// de la gnod par sems pa su yang med// de ni rnams
134a6(mdo sde): kyang longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur// blta bar 'os shing nor chen ldan par 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya rnamasu// sem sa ni rnam dag sdig pa rnam dag cing // zhi zhing rab
134a7(mdo sde): zhi zhi dul ldan gyur nas// mi dman sems kyi byang chub mtshungs med 'thob// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas// mya ngan med bde zhi ba mchog bkod cing // 'khor lo mtshungs/ 
134a8(mdo sde): med 'jig rten kur bskor nas// phyi nas nyon mongs rdul med mya ngan 'das// su zhig dga' mgu sems kyis gos kyis ni// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mchod byed pa// de ni gos
134b1(mdo sde): mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig brgya grangs mtha' yas cag tu rnyed// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// de ni btsam ma thag tu gos mchog 'thog/ lngas byung
134b2(mdo sde): 'phags dar gos rab bzang rnyed// btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde// gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod rten dang // 'dren pa mtshungs med rnams la mchod byed pa// de 'dir
134b3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa'i lus 'thob ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// lag mthil nas ni mu tig phreng mdzes pa// sna tshogs
134b4(mdo sde): ngag dang seng ge'i phreng ba dang // gser skud rab mdzes pas/ la pa mtha' yas 'byung // bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am lto 'phye
134b5(mdo sde): che su yang de la ma dang skyed mi byed// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyod// bcom ldan mchod rtem gos kyis du/ sa byas na// sbyong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil
134b6(mdo sde): gnon te// 'dzam gling gser gyis gser ni zil mnan bzhin// skye dgu'i don ni dpag tu med pa byed// gal te rin chen rab mchog sna bdun gyis// stong gi zhing kun rab tu bkang ba yi/ 
134b7(mdo sde): de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi// rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba min// nor bu rin chen zla ba'i 'od rnams kyis// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhing bkang ba// de 'dra'i
134b8(mdo sde): dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi// rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba min// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de// bcom ldan mchod rten pa ngan phul byas na// 
135a1(mdo sde): de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur// byang chub mchog spyod dam pazhi ba spyod// bcom ldan mchod rten pa ngan phul byas na// dag cing mchog gi lus ni 'thob 'gyu
135a2(mdo sde): tedaper na gser ltar shin tu dkar 'gyur zhing // lha yis bsngags la mchod cing bla mar byed// de yis lus ni gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur// ras kyi gos dang la ba bzang rab dang / 
135a3(mdo sde): du gu sa dang ka shi ba rnams dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling na rigs mchog dam pa gang // phyug cing che nyid bdag dbang nor mang ba// de dag tu ni rtag
135a4(mdo sde): tu de skye ste/ dman zhing mchog tu dbul ba rnam par spangs// de la sems can su yang phrag dog med// sems can ga/ nod par sems pa gzhan mi 'byung // gzhan gyi sdig
135a5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las la de smod de// rtag tu bag yod tshul khrims rnam dag 'gyur// 'dzin pa med cing ser sna med par 'ong // gtong ba rab btang mya ngan med pa 'thob// de ni srog phyir
135a6(mdo sde): gzhan la sbyin mi byed// phongs pa med byed rtag tu bag yod 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs bcu deng dpon mthong nas ni// dga' ba'i sems kyis gdugs dang ba dan dang // mar me
135a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod// byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni rtag par spyod// mi yi 'jig rten bla mar bsnyen bkur byed// lha nang lha yi ngag dang mi yi gtso// yid 'ong spos
135a8(mdo sde): mdzes blta na sdug pa dang // nor bu shel 'dra sna tshogs ldan pa 'thob// ri rab rtse mor lha nang rab tu gsal// lha kun slob mar gyur nas mngon du 'dud// chos kyis de dag yid bde
135b1(mdo sde): skyed par byed// de la dang mchog gzha' gsang thob par 'gyur// de nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten du// rgyal po dam pa stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur// de la sems can su yang sdig mi
135b2(mdo sde): skye ba skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid 'ong 'gyur// rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul// ring por mi thogs nor mang rnyed par 'gyur// shes rab mtha' yas mdzod ni mang
135b3(mdo sde): ldan 'ong // sems cung mi 'gyur dman pa'i sems mi 'gyur// longs spyod rnyed nas bged cing bdag kyang spyod// de ni 'jigs med yid mi bde ba med// rgyal po dga' nas grong dang
135b4(mdo sde): yul 'khor bged// de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed// gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa mdzod mang zhing // khyim bdag rin chen sna tshogs lus brgyan 'gyur// rgyal po'i bu 'am
135b5(mdo sde): de bzhin blon por 'ong // rgyal por gyur na stobs ldan rdzib med// brnyas pa'i rigs dman thams cad yongasu spong // longs spyod khyad 'phags rigs mchog rnyed nas ni// 
135b6(mdo sde): rtag tu bag yod sems ni zhum mi 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams ni ngan skyugs khung ltar spong // khyad 'phags gzugs dang mtshan rnams rab tu 'thob// khyad 'phags rigs dang de
135b7(mdo sde): bzhin dbang phyug nyid// de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mi phyed 'gyur// skye bo mang pos mdun du bdar bar 'ong // de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed// sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag/ 
135b8(mdo sde): yod ldan// de la me dang dug dang mtshon mi tshugs// skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur// rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la spyod// shes bzhin ldan nas yid bde skyed par
136a1(mdo sde): byed// 'dzin pa med cing chags med sems dang ldan// chags med gyur nas de la mi 'thun med// de yi lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs med// rnam dag sem/ 
136a2(mdo sde): ldan de ni bden par smra// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yid bde skyed// sems can rnams kyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur// de ni bdag don rgya chen byas nas su// gzhan yang
136a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god// shing dbang shing mchog dam pa'i drung song nas// mtshungs med mchog zhi byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul
136a4(mdo sde): na/ 'di nas bzung ste srid partse mo'i bar// sangs rgyas ni dang ni 'dzam gling gser gyis gang // de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus// bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul
136a5(mdo sde): byas na// de yi lus ni mdog ngan yong mi 'gyur// gzugs mchog sra zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra// snang ba thob nas 'jin/ rten kun tu rgyu// gal te rgyal ba dam par byung gyur na/ 
136a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur// nye dur 'gyur ram yang na bur yang 'gyur// de ni ye shes phung po myur du 'thob// gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing / 
136a7(mdo sde): yungs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang gyur pa// bgrang ba dang ni gzhal zhing brjod par nus// bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lta min// sangs rgyas dam pa mtshungs med sbyin pa'i gnas
136a8(mdo sde): spyod pa mchog spyad khyad par brnyes gyur pa// mi mchog de la mchod pa 'dir byas pa// rnam par smin pa dam pa gzhal yas 'gyur// gal te mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di kun// nor
136b1(mdo sde): bu rin chen bai DUR+Yas gang ba// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// kar sha pa nes mi mjed 'jig rten khams// 'og nas srid
136b2(mdo sde): pa'i rtse mo bar gang pa// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan+dan gyis// 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo
136b3(mdo sde): khar gang ba// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i lha ras kyi// gos kyi sangs rgyas zhing stong
136b4(mdo sde): gang gyur pa// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// klu dang lha min mi dang lto 'phye che// lha yi lha rdzas nor bu rin chen mang // zang
136b5(mdo sde): par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten yod pa'i lha yi spos// de dag mi mjed 'di kun gang gyur pa/ 
136b6(mdo sde): zad pa bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tshad ni shes par nus// nam mkha'i khams 'di'i tshad kyang shes
136b7(mdo sde): par nus// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul ba'i// de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus// sangs rgyas dam pa mi mchog bzhud pa'i tshe// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med la dad
136b8(mdo sde): byas te// ston pa'i sku la nyi zer mi 'bab par// me tog ma li ka gdugs bcom ldan phul// des ni las mdzes dam pa gus byas pas// lha dbang brgya byin du ni lan 'bum
137a1(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'jig rten kun tu tshangs pa'i bdag por gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni 'bum phul nas// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stobs ldan gyur// stong phrag
137a2(mdo sde): bcu la dbang bar nga gyur te// nor chen rab tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur// khyim bdag blo ldan bsod nams ldan par gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog bye ba nyi shu dag/ ngas ni mnyes
