137a3(mdo sde): byas gzims chan bza' yis// mi mchog dag la bla mar sti stang byas// de dag gtsug lag khang la spos kyis bkus// nga yi kha dog ngan pa kun med gyur// ngas ni tsha dang grang dang
137a4(mdo sde): ngal ba spangs// sangs rgyas spyan sngar dman med sems gyur cing // de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod// rgyan gyis ba rgyan pa'i gdugs mdzes lta sdug pa// su zhig
137a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa// de 'dir lus ni ma chungs pa med 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis sgo/ char 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i sku ni rab
137a6(mdo sde): 'bar zhing // khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang sems 'dra dang // 'dzam gling gser ltar rab mdzes blta na sdug/ mtshan gyis me tog rgyas pas mngon tu gang // mngon par/ 
137a7(mdo sde): shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags// byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod// de ni nams kyang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur// lhas kyang sti stang bya zhing mchod par 'ong // brtan
137a8(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dka'// tshul khrims rnam dag rab mkhas tshangs par spyod// yi dam bcas nas nags dang nags mdab song // mngon shes 'thob cing khyad pa
137b1(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'bul ba// ji lta bur yang byang chub sems mi 'dor// byams la gnas shing mi dman sems 'gyur// de/ 
137b2(mdo sde): ye shes pa nams kyang nyams pa med// rol mo'i sgra yis mi mchog mchod byas na// mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong // mi yi 'jig rten yid 'ong sgra ldan 'gyur// 
137b3(mdo sde): de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par 'ong // bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// shes bzhin ldan zhing mig ni dag par 'gyur// rna ba rnam par dag cing sems kyang dga'// 
137b4(mdo sde): sna yi dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// de yi lce ni rab mdzes blta na sdug/ thog mar rab mnyen mdzes shing sgra yid 'ong // dper na lha yi rin chen byu ru 'dra// sgra skad yan
137b5(mdo sde): lag bye ba dpag med 'byin// bcom ldan mchod rten rol/ mo sgra byas na// nams kyang sbrul du mi 'gyur lce med min zhar ba sgur po ya yo can mi 'gyur// lus ni
137b6(mdo sde): khyad par 'phags shing shin tu mdzes// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am lto 'phye che// su yang de la ma dang skye mi 'gyur// dbugs phyin
137b7(mdo sde): thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo sgra byas na// de ni ma ning za mar gzhar mi 'gyur// nams kyang mdze dang sha bkra mi 'byung zhing // bsngags par 'os
137b8(mdo sde): ba'i lus ni thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// lce ring 'gyur zhing lus kyang che bar 'gyur// gser gyi gzugs ltar kha dog 'bar bar 'ong // ting
138a1(mdo sde): 'dzin brtan zhing shin tu rtogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// lha nang bdag por 'gyur zhing dbang phyug 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten/ 
138a2(mdo sde): skyes na dga' bar 'ong // brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod 'bar bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// de la su yang yid mi bde mi skyed// de la su yang tshig rtsug
138a3(mdo sde): smra ba med// phra ma thams cad spangs shing yang dag smra// bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig phyags thogs te// bcom ldan mchod rten gus par 'phyag byed pa// de ni smad cing mi gtsang
138a4(mdo sde): lus mi 'gyur// ba spu khung nas tsan+dan dri ngang 'byung // bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du// yan lag ma smad khyad
138a5(mdo sde): 'phags lus 'thob cing // mdzes la mtshan gyis go cha ra byas par 'gyur// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ma chod rten phyags// lha yi tsan dan khyad 'phags rab
138a6(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i// gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob// de ni de la gzhar yang sred mi skyed// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// yid 'ong dri ldan mchog
138a7(mdo sde): tu blta sdug pa'i// lha yi bu mo bye ba stong 'thob cing // de ni de la nams kyang phyags mi skyed// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// bskyed mos tshal mchog yod
138a8(mdo sde): pa'i rdzing bu ni// yan lag brgyad ldan chu gtsang mdzes gyur pa// me tog ut+pal las ni rgyas pa 'thob// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// de yi g.yog 'khon
138b1(mdo sde): rtag tu 'thun 'gyur zhing // mi dman sems can lha yi sgra yang thos// lha mo rnams kyi glu dbyangs snyan sgra thob// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// 'jig rten
138b2(mdo sde): kun tu skyes che bdag nyid kyis// 'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // mi yi 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong bar shes// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags
138b3(mdo sde): de ni lha la snyan pa'i gtam byas te// sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la lha bkod nas// shi ba'i dus byas 'dzam+bu'i gling du skye// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ 
138b4(mdo sde): bcas ma thag tu bskal pa mtha' yas dran// sngon gyi sangs rgyas gtso rnams bkur ba dang // de dag mtshan dang yon chos kyang dran// 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji
138b5(mdo sde): ltar 'gyur zhes te// mos pa bskyed nas mchod rten rtswa skyes sel// de yi phan yon de dag ngas bshad kyis// tha ba dri sol dang ba'i sems kyis nyon// mthu chen skyes bu
138b6(mdo sde): dam pa khyad 'phags pa// rgyal ba dam pa ma 'ongs dus na mthong // de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod// de ni gzha' gsang dad pa dam pa 'thob// sangs rgyas stobs/ 
138b7(mdo sde): bcu ded dpon des mthong nas// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med pa mchod pa byed// mtshan gyis go char byas pa'i sangs rgyas su// 'gyur zhes thugs dgyes de dag lung yang ston// 
138b8(mdo sde): grong khyer yangs pa nyams dga' mchog gnas shing // nga ni chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa// de dag phyi dus rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshe// rgyal mchog mya ngan 'das pa'i chos
139a1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'gyur// mchod rten rtsa skyes sel bar byed pa ni// rgyal ba dam pa mi thul mthong 'dod pa'i// rgyu dang sa bon 'gyur ba 'di yin no// 'dod dang dmyal dang du / 
139a2(mdo sde): 'gro skye gnas spong // byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mdo mchog 'di// phyi ma rab 'jig dus na 'dzin byed pa// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas lha yi lha// bsod nams khyad 'phags
139a3(mdo sde): mtshungs med zhing du 'gyur// 'di bshad tshe na gang dag 'dir mchod dang // tshul 'di bshad pa gang dag thos pa dang // gang dag mdo mchog 'di ni 'dir bzung ba// de dag phyi ma'i
139a4(mdo sde): dus na 'dir 'di 'dzin// gang dag phyin cad mdo mchog la di 'dzin pa// de dag rtag tu nga dang 'thun pa'i sras// sangs rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags brjod kyang // de
139a5(mdo sde): ngag bsngags pa mthar ni phyin mi 'gyur// gang dag phyi dus rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtho' yas// bskal pa bye bar bzhugs te de dag gi// bsngag
139a6(mdo sde): pa brjod kyang mtha' mar phyin mi nus// dri zhim yid 'ong spos kyi cho ga bzhin// sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni su skud pa// de ni 'thob rnyed 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de ni sa 'dir snying por
139a7(mdo sde): blangs par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tshe// 'dzam+bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // de ni de tshe mtho ris
139a8(mdo sde): bdag por 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang smad pa rnams// rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung por gnas// de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod/ 
139b1(mdo sde): mchog 'dir spyod// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris lha dbang 'gyur// ring por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog/ lha rnams la ni
139b2(mdo sde): rgya chen don kyang byed// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// gang gi tshe na mi'i 'jig rten na// zhe sdang med sems 'jam zhing mnyen gyur pa// de tshe de na 'dzam+bu'i gling
139b3(mdo sde): du gnas// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// khyad 'phags tshig ldan sgra dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur// skye bo mang po yid 'ong dga' zhing bkur// de yi kha bzhin
139b4(mdo sde): rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// de ni ngan song sa rnams ma lus spong // de bzhin gshegs dang nye bar thob par 'gyur// dad pa
139b5(mdo sde): thob cing rtag tu bde la dga'// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos dbyug phul byas na// rgyal po stobs ldan 'khor lo sa sbyar bar 'gyur// blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag
139b6(mdo sde): bsod nams ldan// chos rje 'od mdzad sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// dga' ba'i sems kyis mgu ba'i shugs pa skyed de// bcom ldan mchod rten nor bu'i dra ba 'bul// 
139b7(mdo sde): de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go cha can// mthu che bla ma 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// blta 'os mtshan gyi go cha ldan gyur nas// gzhal med khang chen rab mdzes blta sdug pa// kha
139b8(mdo sde): dog sna tshogs dpag med ldan pa dang // rin chen khang bzangs che 'os dag pa 'thob// rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par 'phags gyur pa// skyes pa bud med dag gis gang ba dang // 
140a1(mdo sde): mnyam zhing legs byas rab mdzes palta sdug pa// dra bas sna tshogs bde byed pa de 'jug 'thob// rgyal mtshan pa dan gsal bas mdzes byas shing // gdugs/ 
140a2(mdo sde): bres shin tu mdzes la blta sdug dang // mu tig dra ba phreng ba de 'dra ba'i// rgyal srid yon tan khyad 'phags gzhan yang 'thob// de yi yul na gzhan nor 'jig byed pa// chom kun g.yo
140a3(mdo sde): ldan g.yo can gnas mi 'gyur// sems can rgya chen blo mchog ldan pa dang // phan byed byams sems ldan pa de ni gnas// shi 'phros bag yod de ni lhar 'gro ste// dkar nag gang yin
140a4(mdo sde): bdag cag ji ltar gnas// 'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar mir skye zhes// blo ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas 'gyur// sangs rgyas sbyin gnas myur du mthong 'gyur te// mthong nas mchod
140a5(mdo sde): cing mtshungs med sti stang byed// sangs rgyas mthong nas/ byang chub mos skyed cing // rdul bral rnams la phyir ni sti stang byed// ye shes mtha' yas ldan dang mthu chen
140a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// khyad par sa gnas 'phags pa'i sems can 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems bskyed nas// 'di 'dra'i dpal 'di phyir zhing myong bar 'gyur// nga yi bya ba 'di ni/ 
140a7(mdo sde): brjod par bya// ngas brjod 'di la the tshom ma skyed cig/ sangs rgyas bka' spangs mnar med 'gror 'gyur zhing // phyin chad sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur ta re// 'jig rten sgron ma mtshungs
140a8(mdo sde): med bsod nams zhing // de yi mchod rten brgya su sel ba// bag yod gyur nas de ni bdud rgya 'dral// dus rnams kun tu ngan song sa yang spong // rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral sti stang
140b1(mdo sde): khyed// rtag tu stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes na bsod nams ldan// rgyal po kun gyis mchod pa'i gnasu 'gyur// lha nang lha yi dbang po mchod gnas/ 
140b2(mdo sde): 'gyur// der ni myur du lha yi tshe yang 'thob// dpal ldan gser gyi gzhal med khang pa rnyed// lha yi bde ba mtshungs med dbang phyug nyid// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rab ro mchog dang // 
140b3(mdo sde): reg bya dpal ldan lha yi 'jig rten 'thob// mthu chen zhing blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// lha mi rnams la 'dod pa'i sred mi skyed// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bas la byas na// 'di
140b4(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos mi'i 'jig rten 'gro// yan lag legs/ gnas khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur// nam yang bstan bcos mi nyung mang po 'thob// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bas
140b5(mdo sde): byas na// de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong zhing // de ni dang 'gyur de bzhin khyad par 'phags// de ni sangs rgyas ma tshungs med mchod pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya
140b6(mdo sde): bsal byas na// bag yod blo gros brtan la dpa' bor 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi skyed// mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod
140b7(mdo sde): rten brgya bsal byas na// de ni nams kyang byang chub sems mi 'dor// tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur// rnam dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos kyang 'thob// bcom
140b8(mdo sde): ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// de yi mdog ngan dus rnams kun tu spong // 'chal ba'i shes rab ma lus rnam par spong // shes rab rgya chen gyur nas spyod la gnas// bcom/ 
141a1(mdo sde): ldan mchod rten brgyabs la byas na// kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur la// khyad 'phags kha ton ldan zhing blta sdug la// reg dang ldan zhing rab mdzes gos rnams
141a2(mdo sde): 'thob/ dad pa'i shugs bskyed bcom ldan mchod rten la// me tog skam po nyal nyil phyags byas na// 'dod pa smad pa sdug bsngal byed pa spong // stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ded dpon mnyes
141a3(mdo sde): par byed// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur// skye bo mang pos mchod 'os blta 'os 'gyur// de la rgyal po gnod par sems mi 'gyur// 
141a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan mchod rten dag la snga rabs mis// me tog phul rape skam po phyags byas na// ngan song sa yi las ngan thams cad gcod// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas/ 
141a5(mdo sde): mchod rten me tog rnaMs pa su 'phyag pa// bag yod mya ngan rnams dang skyon rnams spong // nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam par spong // bskal pa mtha' yas rnamasu dbugs phyin
141a6(mdo sde): thob// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// sbyin gnas mtshungs med sangs rgyas thob par 'ong // mtshungs med thob cing lha mis mchod 'os 'gyur// rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis brgya
141a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur// lha yi me tog rab mdzes man da ra// mtshungs med pa ta la yang su 'bul dang // mchod rten me tog nyal nyil su 'phyag pa// de dag rnam smin 'dra ste mchog tu 'gyur// mchod
141a8(mdo sde): rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// de lus dug gis mi tshugs mtshon mi tshugs// me 'bar 'od 'phro phung po ches mi tshugs// nor gyi phung po rkun pos brku mi 'gyur// mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba'i
141b1(mdo sde): shugs bskyed de// bcom ldan mchod rten me tog skam phyags na// de yi bsod nams bzung bar gang gyur pa// grangs sam cha yang brjod par sla ma yin// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su
141b2(mdo sde): 'phyag pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten na ni rtag tu dga'// mthu dang ldan zhing yid 'ong sgra skad 'byung // mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// chos
141b3(mdo sde): mchog rab mdzes yang dag spyod byed cing // de lus rnam par dag pa chen por 'ong // ring por mi thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur byar mos bskyed de// 
141b4(mdo sde): ston pa'i mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// 'jig rten dgra na bla mar bkur bsti bya// de ni mdzes shing blta na sdug par 'gyur// de 'dir rgyal srid thob nas lha klu mi// lto 'phye che dang / 
141b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad 'dud// stong gi 'jig rten khams kun rgyas par 'gyur// dbang phyug nyid du dbang thob rgyas srid ston// de yi yul na sems can gang gnas pa// de kun
141b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god// de ni ngan songs yang rnam par spong // de dag rnams kyi don mchog dam pa byed// bsod nams blo gros dran ldan mchod 'os 'gyur// dbugs phyin
141b7(mdo sde): thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de yi g.yog 'khor yid 'ong sgra skad ldan// bsam pa ji bzhin de dag dga' ba skyed// sems can rnams la mi lhong zhi tshig ston// de la su yang dbang
141b8(mdo sde): phyug med mi byed// skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur// de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs yan lag dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// sbyin dang snyan par sgra
142a1(mdo sde): don spyod dang // don 'thun pa dang skye bo mang la byed// spyos shing brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos mi skyed// sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// mtho ris 'chi/ 
142a2(mdo sde): rten gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur// mir gyur na yang mi yi rgyal por 'ong // de ni gzhar yang yongasu nyams mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// de ni gzhar yang
142a3(mdo sde): ngan song phyis mi ltung // 'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spong // nor can nang na phyug cing mdzod mang 'gyur// ston ldan la tshig gcig su sme ba// da ni mi rigs sngags la gzhar mi spyod
142a4(mdo sde): mi yi 'jig rten gnas min spyod mi 'gyur// de la sems can mi ngoms dga' bar 'gyur// yid 'ongs dbyangs ldan po brang 'khor gshegs shing // 'jig rten mgon po sgo gtan
142a5(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i tshe// su zhig shugs bskyed me tog blangs te ga/ tor// de ni brgyan nas rgyal ba dam pa mthong // rang gi/ khyim du stobs bcu bsnyen bkur byed// de yi bshos
142a6(mdo sde): gsol chos bzang ston pa mdzad// dad pa skyes nas mi mchog bsnyen bkur byed// gos kyang thogs te rnam par 'dren la 'bul// sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med mchog thob nas// 
142a7(mdo sde): stobs bcu ldan zhing g.yo ba med gyur la// byang chub sangs rgyas sdug bsngal skye bo 'grol// 'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med sangs rgyas shog/ de yi smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dang ni// sangs
142a8(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes de sems dga' mkhyen nas// stobs bcu 'dzum mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du// mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes lung ston to// skyes bu dam pa mchog gi gsung
142b1(mdo sde): 'os ras// bde gshegs mchog gsung gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ dag ni rgyal ba mchog 'gyur ngogs med ceg// dga' zhing mgunas par sngang kur tu rgyu// 'jig rten lha yi lngar gyur sapa/ 
142b2(mdo sde): rgyas su// khyad 'phags mtshungs med sbyin gnas 'gyur ba dang // de sems spyod dang dga' bar gnas mkhyen nas// de la stobs bcu mnga' bas bzhes par gyur// bde gshegs mchog
142b3(mdo sde): gis gos ni bzhes rig nas// de ni shugs skyes rab dga' sems mgu ste// mtshungs med 'jig rten mgon la bltas nas ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos pa skyed// skye
142b4(mdo sde): shi pha rol sems can bsgral bar bya// grol nas skye bo mang/ po 'dus byas dgrol// 'jig rten kun na long ba'i me da bdag gyur// snang ba thob nas mun pa rab rib bsam
142b5(mdo sde): de ltar phan yon dam pa 'di thos nas// me tog 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan gos mchog dang // rol mo sgra dang gdugs dang byug bdug gis// mgon po mchog la sangs rgyas
142b6(mdo sde): 'gyur bas gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / blo gros rnam par dag pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi
142b7(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs shes bya
142b8(mdo sde): ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rngog s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dran shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad
143a1(mdo sde): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya radan lo ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
143a2(mdo sde): dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs shes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis
143a3(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos yongasu rdzogs pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/ 
143a4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag gi dge 'dud chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
143a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che/ dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
143a6(mdo sde): rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston gyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams mngon bsgrags dang / byang chub sems
143a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / byang
143a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon chadang
143b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi blo gros
143b2(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
143b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song spong / dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya
143b5(mdo sde): ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par ga non pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
143b6(mdo sde): chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po can ngan snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems
143b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung dka' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' 'byung dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub
143b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
144a1(mdo sde): byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro
144a2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin gyis nges par byung ba/ dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa/ rjesu chags pa/ 
144a3(mdo sde): dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ khams gsum la ma chags pa g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par
144a4(mdo sde): skyes pa/ ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ re ba thams cad yongasu skong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ lus dang ngag pa
144a5(mdo sde): yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la mos pa/ thams ca/ de mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/ ting 'dzin dang / spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mi
144a6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma mod pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
144a7(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
144a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos
144b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ni namakha' dang mtshungs pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / ma smos pa dang / blang ba byed pa dang / dror ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnas pa med pa ste/ de ltar rma/ 
144b2(mdo sde): par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
144b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ste/ dngos po/ 
144b4(mdo sde): gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/ 
144b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chu ba kyi rnam pa ni tshad med de/ de ni tshad dang ldan par bstan par mi nuso// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang / 
144b6(mdo sde): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog par bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi/ 
144b7(mdo sde): rtog go// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog
144b8(mdo sde): par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa las byung ba'o// byang chub
145a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
145a2(mdo sde): par rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad spros pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa 'khor de
145a3(mdo sde): nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog
145a4(mdo sde): ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med
145a5(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la dris shig dang / 'di khyo de la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs te 'dug
145a6(mdo sde): nas/ sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/ 
145a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang na byang chub sems dpa' ston 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams btang snyomasu bzhug so// 
145a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang snyomasu bzhugs pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni
145b1(mdo sde): / sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de/ 
145b2(mdo sde): nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol
145b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
145b4(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na/ bdag gis skyes bu dam pa
145b5(mdo sde): 'di la dri bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ting 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thob pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol
145b6(mdo sde): ba gdab ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal ba dang ldan pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas
145b7(mdo sde): kyi chos gang dag kun tu bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ 
145b8(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras te/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis/ khyod byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
146a1(mdo sde): bo la dris shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po
146a2(mdo sde): 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi
146a3(mdo sde): rgyal po yin gyis bdag la ma srung shig/ yang rigs kyi bu khyod ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
146a4(mdo sde): pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal te phyag 'tshal nas/ byang nga chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smraso// 
146a5(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ khyod de la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shig 'dri'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i
146a6(mdo sde): dus la dbab par shes na dris shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i
146a7(mdo sde): sras sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i gzhi'i don gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i
146a8(mdo sde): don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
146b1(mdo sde): pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni ma spros pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i don to// sangs
146b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du med pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu
146b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi
146b4(mdo sde): chos rnams shes ji skad bstan/ byang chub sems da pa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa 'di ni bstan tu med pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye
146b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras bstan tu med na ci zhig bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bstan tu med pa ni btags te bstan to// 'jam
146b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras btags pas ci zhig 'dogs par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal btags pas ni dngos po yang mi
146b7(mdo sde): 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dog so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te btags pas dngos po yang mi 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs na
146b8(mdo sde): theg pa gsum po dag ji ltar bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa la chags par ma byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
147a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/ gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/ phung po lnga mi dmigs
147a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ byang chub spros pa dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te spros pa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
147a3(mdo sde): byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub dang spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa de ni gnyi su med de gnyisu dbyer
147a4(mdo sde): med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ rigs kyi bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di leg so legaso
147a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin no// gtam 'di brjod pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa
147a6(mdo sde): 'di lta bu yi rnam par 'tshal bar mi rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal
147a7(mdo sde): gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
147a8(mdo sde): de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'din
147b1(mdo sde): mos par bgyi dka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo
147b2(mdo sde): gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par smras lag so// bcom ldan
147b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa yin no// 'di ni chos kyi char chen po
147b4(mdo sde): yino// de nas shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam
147b5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa lags te/ de la yi ge mi dmigs tshig 'bru mi dmig so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/ stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ chos kyi dbyings la
147b6(mdo sde): tshig 'bru mi snang don kyang mi snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa gang
147b7(mdo sde): lags/ rnam pa gang lags/ rtags gang lags/ mtshan ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med
147b8(mdo sde): ba ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o// stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o// stong pa nyid de ni
148a1(mdo sde): bstad du med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
148a2(mdo sde): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/ 
148a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni
148a4(mdo sde): de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba'i
148a5(mdo sde): phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di/ skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ba
148a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal pa ltar na/ nyan thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
148a7(mdo sde): kyi bu nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa 'am/ spyod pa'i byin gyis
148a8(mdo sde): brlab par bya ba'i nus pa dang mthu ga la yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
148b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
148b2(mdo sde): dpal ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi
148b3(mdo sde): chos rnams thob bam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci
148b4(mdo sde): slob pa 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'on khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis
148b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na/ de nyid khyod dmigs pa
148b6(mdo sde): can du 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
148b7(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rgan rabs thubo mchog yin gyis/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos po ni ci
148b8(mdo sde): yang thob par mi 'gyur/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ngan ngon
149a1(mdo sde): // gyis kyang brag chen po rnam par 'jig go// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi spu'i khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab
149a2(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do// rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bal glang glang po che shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang
149a3(mdo sde): mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung ngus dul bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyed
149a4(mdo sde): ga la nus/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas pa rtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ mi dmus long gis ni shul du ma
149a5(mdo sde): ba 'am/ grong khyer mthong bar yang rngo mi thog na/ khyim nas khyim khyim du mchi bzhi rdo lta ga la thog ste de ni gnas ma yin no// de bzhin du glang po che chen po 'di lta bu 'di
149a6(mdo sde): dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang mtshungs par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lag so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/ 
149a7(mdo sde): da ci bgyir yang ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis sems
149a8(mdo sde): can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob
149b1(mdo sde): pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu las sems can dgu khri nyis stong gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to// de nas byang chub
149b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo
149b3(mdo sde): gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
149b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phrag kyi rdul snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar
149b5(mdo sde): 'thun pa sha stag go// phyogs gcig ji lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bco/ ma ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
149b6(mdo sde): chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
149b7(mdo sde): ba rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyi brlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / 
149b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyingasu 'jug par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol
150a1(mdo sde): ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang / kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad rjod par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
150a2(mdo sde): ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad yongasu shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs
150a3(mdo sde): bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun par 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis rlob kyis/ rigs
150a4(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las rtsom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa
150a5(mdo sde): skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la thog pa med/ pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / 
150a6(mdo sde): chod pa med pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid dang tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dang / khwa na ma tho ba med pa dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / zhum pa med pa dang / 'phrogs pa med
150a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tinge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
150a8(mdo sde): ngag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la nyug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
150b1(mdo sde): blo gros la reg ma thag tu/ de nas ti 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'jim
150b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pas rgya che ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
150b3(mdo sde): rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye bo yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
150b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye ba yin no// de nas bya byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems dang / da' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal
150b5(mdo sde): ba'i sras/ gang dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
150b6(mdo sde): po de dag ni gang yin/ gang las bsam te de skad smra/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod
150b7(mdo sde): cig de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'
150b8(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
151a1(mdo sde): gsung so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyuraro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang / las dang po pa dang / 
151a2(mdo sde): rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye bar skyes pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzho nur gyur pa dang / rgyal 'tshab dang / 
151a3(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu
151a4(mdo sde): po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsung so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyuraro// kye rgyal ba'i sras
151a5(mdo sde): dag de la sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rna ma par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
151a6(mdo sde): dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba 'am/ mdzes pa 'am/ kha dog bzang po rgyas po 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul
151a7(mdo sde): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ kun rjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ rjesu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngam/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs
151a8(mdo sde): pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod cing / thog ma nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 
151b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed ma thag tu de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongasu bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa
151b2(mdo sde): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang / 
151b3(mdo sde): mos pa dang rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par
151b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi shes pa dang / zag pa
151b5(mdo sde): zad pa'i shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongasu bzung bar 'gyu ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub
151b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems
151b7(mdo sde): dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang / 'phrad pa
151b8(mdo sde): dang / rab tu zhi ba'i tingange 'dzin la rnal 'byor tu bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / sems can sdug
152a1(mdo sde): bsngal ba yongasu bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis/ shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la/ 
152a2(mdo sde): sbyor zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po
152a3(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
152a4(mdo sde): dag 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan
152a5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i sems dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang / kun tu
152a6(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag skyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang
152a7(mdo sde): po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung gnod pa dang / kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o// mang du thos nas rab tu dbyen pa
152a8(mdo sde): la sbyar bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde
152b1(mdo sde): ba la sbyar bar bya'o// bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// dus shes par gyur nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas don
152b2(mdo sde): shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// don shes par gyur nas/ chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi rjesu 'brang bar gyur nas/ rjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// 
152b3(mdo sde): rmongs pa med par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
152b4(mdo sde): mngon par brtson par byed cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 
152b5(mdo sde): 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rna/ la 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
152b6(mdo sde): gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
152b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad la mi rtags par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / dbugs 'byin
152b8(mdo sde): ba med pa nyid dang / gnas med pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang / rtsol ba med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi rjes
153a1(mdo sde): 'brang bar gyur pa'i phyir sbyor ba yang mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye
153a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi dbyings brtags pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 
153a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang
153a4(mdo sde): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas
153a5(mdo sde): gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
153a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal po'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la skye bar
153a7(mdo sde): skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongasu sbyang ba byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos nyid las phyir mi zlog pa dang / 
153a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur ba yongasu grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems can la rnam par dpyod pa dang / zhing la rnam par
153b1(mdo sde): dpyod pa dang / 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang / las la rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang / mya ngan
153b2(mdo sde): las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongasu sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i
153b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 
153b4(mdo sde): ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam pa dar dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar
153b5(mdo sde): bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub par dpyad pa la sbyar
153b6(mdo sde): bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho sla yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par
153b7(mdo sde): dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu 'grub pa mnyam
153b8(mdo sde): pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyor bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
154a1(mdo sde): kyi chos yongasu 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongasu 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa
154a2(mdo sde): la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtog par byed cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid
154a3(mdo sde): sbyor gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sbyor ba
154a4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gan ga pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i
154a5(mdo sde): las gang ci rtsom yang de thams cad sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la pha na par 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams
154a6(mdo sde): cad la bde bar sbyar bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med
154a7(mdo sde): par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs
154a8(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir rtsom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
154b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can mtha' yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa dang / 
154b2(mdo sde): sems can grangs med pa dang / sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can mtshungs pa med pa dang / sems can gzhal du med dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / sen
154b3(mdo sde): g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog
154b4(mdo sde): cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun
154b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzha ga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bsam pa phun/ sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
154b6(mdo sde): gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thob pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa
154b7(mdo sde): nges pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos
154b8(mdo sde): kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
155a1(mdo sde): ga rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
155a2(mdo sde): la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung zhes 'chad pa 'am/ sems can gyi khams rgya che zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhe 'am/ 
155a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul sla zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings
155a4(mdo sde): chung zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jig ce 'am/ mi 'jig ce 'am/ chosakyi dbyings yod ce 'am/ chos kyi dbyings med ces
155a5(mdo sde): 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye
155a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjesu 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
155a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad mtshan ma med du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / 
155a8(mdo sde): med pa nyid dang / brdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / rmi lam lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du yang
155b1(mdo sde): dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i chos can du gyur cing / gong du gnas gang dag
155b2(mdo sde): thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sem/ 
155b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la phyir mi
155b4(mdo sde): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa bcu thos na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yod do zhe 'am/ med do
155b5(mdo sde): zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir/ mi ldog pa dang / chos yod do zhe 'am/ med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhe 'am/ med
155b6(mdo sde): do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe 'am/ med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhe
155b7(mdo sde): 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'daso zhe 'am/ ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byon to zhe 'am/ ma byon pa
155b8(mdo sde): ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o zhe 'am/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe 'am/ mi zad do/ 
156a1(mdo sde): / zhes bya ba 'am/ dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ce 'am/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog sa
156a2(mdo sde): ste kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang
156a3(mdo sde): dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// mang ba dang gcig pa nyid dang / 
156a4(mdo sde): yi ge la don sgro btags pa dang / don la yi ge sgro btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa dang / dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas
156a5(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan ma med pa/ das mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyi da med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid med pas mtshan
156a6(mdo sde): nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de kyi 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongasu smin pa'i tshul la nges par 'byung zhing / gong du
156a7(mdo sde): gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
156a8(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la gzho nur gyur pa'i byang
156b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ nga
156b2(mdo sde): kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par sgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing
156b3(mdo sde): mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ 
156b4(mdo sde): gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yi/ na/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa sbyar ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzho nur
156b5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gzho nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par sgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
156b6(mdo sde): lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang / 
156b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang / dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad
156b8(mdo sde): med pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongasu 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shas cher mngon par sgrub pa mkhas
157a1(mdo sde): ba la sbyor zhing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di/ 
157a2(mdo sde): ni gzho nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rgyal 'tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
157a3(mdo sde): dag/ 'di la rgyal 'chab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 
157a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ pag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas// 
157a5(mdo sde): pa yin/ chos nyid rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa
157a6(mdo sde): yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa
157a7(mdo sde): yin don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rgyal 'chab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal 'tshab kyi
157a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dngapa'adi la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i/ 
157b1(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor du kun tu spyad pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i
157b2(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rol gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
157b3(mdo sde): ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par sgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid bsgrub kyi gzhan gyi dring la mi
157b4(mdo sde): 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rgyal 'chab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang
157b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kyergyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i bya nga chub sems dpa' ni/ shes pa mngon par sgrub pa
157b6(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis rlob pa
157b7(mdo sde): mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems cig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongasu sbyang ba byed pa mang ba yin/ sems
157b8(mdo sde): can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig par byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i
158a1(mdo sde): sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed pa la/ 
158a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa yin no// kye
158a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal 'chab kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man cad gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi las shes par
158a4(mdo sde): mi nus ngag gi las shes par mi nus/ yid kyi las shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ 'das pa'i dus la rnam par
158a5(mdo sde): lta ba shes mi nus/ zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes pa/ ra mi nus/ blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ sems kyi yul shes par mi nus/ ye shes kyi spyod yul/ 
158a6(mdo sde): shes par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de
158a7(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par mdzad de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang / 
158a8(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thang / 
158b1(mdo sde): snang bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu shes pa dang / chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / sangs
158b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' yas parjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 
158b3(mdo sde): 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ches kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
158b4(mdo sde): kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu pa nad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong
158b5(mdo sde): phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg
158b6(mdo sde): rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem mo/ 9/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu
158b7(mdo sde): 'khrug so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab po// lha'i bdug po'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i spos kyi
158b8(mdo sde): sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab po// lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang / lho'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i
159a1(mdo sde): / pad+ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan 'phreng gi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar
159a2(mdo sde): sgra byung ngo // lha'i sdang ba yang rab tu byung ngo // lha'i nga ro yang grag go// gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lnga'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams hA
159a3(mdo sde): du yang chos bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste lhag chad med do// tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don nyid ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i
159a4(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/ phyogs bcu
159a5(mdo sde): rgyas par bkang nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// kye rgyu ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa leg so// leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bangs
159a6(mdo sde): cag kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha
159a7(mdo sde): stag gi thad nas 'dir phyir to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis de dag thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis
159a8(mdo sde): don 'di nyid ston te lhag chad med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to// bdag cag ji ltar
159b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnamasu
159b2(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyin par gyur to// / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byung
159b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par bltas nas/ de'i tshe
159b4(mdo sde): tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// rang byung shin tu rnam drag bro mnga' ba// mdzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang lha na gyur pa// stengad dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mcho
159b5(mdo sde): gyur nas// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog bye // do zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun rdzo da bzang dang rjesu bstan pa dang // sdug bsngal bzang
159b6(mdo sde): rlag 'jig rten 'gro 'thong nas// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// ston kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po'i ston thos gyur nas// nem
159b7(mdo sde): mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang // rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams
159b8(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang // gzhan min dngos por rnam par rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na// dge dang
160a1(mdo sde): mi dge las rnams gang yod pa// de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// ting 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang // 
160a2(mdo sde): de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa// de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang
160a3(mdo sde): po rnams// ci 'dra ci 'dra de yi de dang der// rim pa de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten kun gyis mos pa ci 'dra dang // lhag pa'i
160a4(mdo sde): bsam pa tha dad rnam gsum nas// bstan bcos dum rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems la rdog byed// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i khams// gang
160a5(mdo sde): ngag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi// khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems de 'jog/ chos 'dir kun tu 'gro bar gang
160a6(mdo sde): gyur cing // dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa// yang dag rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar
160a7(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang // sems can ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes// chags med mig ni rab tu dbye ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung / 
160a8(mdo sde): dus na// sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rtog par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ ji ltar 'gro bar sems
160b1(mdo sde): can 'ching byed pa// kun tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i// nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum na
160b2(mdo sde): tha snyad gang brtags dang // ngag lam sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa// brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ chos rnams
160b3(mdo sde): brjod du med pa ste// stong pa mig yor rang bzhin po bo nyid// don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams ngag tu sa g.yo
160b4(mdo sde): bstan pa dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'od zer rtse mo ra
160b5(mdo sde): las 'od zer rnams// de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'gyed// de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyi ra// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing
160b6(mdo sde): mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa// de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul te// sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams
160b7(mdo sde): ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun// gnod pa med par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas// chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'ja
160b8(mdo sde): rgya mtsho rnams ni ji snyed chu yod pa// skra rtse'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed// ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 
161a1(mdo sde): // zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi bag/ gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed cing // phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems
161a2(mdo sde): 'jog byed// 'jig rten 'din 'das pa de bzhin du/ ma 'ongs sreg pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa rnams// bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du btan pa sems
161a3(mdo sde): 'di 'jog/ dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan
161a4(mdo sde): pa sems 'di 'jog/ brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// sgra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'deb sa// dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// 
161a5(mdo sde): byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// rags dang phra ba rtogs par
161a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnamasu// skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed// dbyangs kyi yan lag dag
161a7(mdo sde): pa bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba// skad cig gcig la skad cig brjod byed cing // zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par
161a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed// sems can kun gyis rab tu rnam par shes// lce yangs rgya chen rtogs
161b1(mdo sde): par bya ba'i byer/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// shing rnams kun tu brjod dang 'dra bar yang // gang cig gcig la sa gyur sel bar byed// rnam ts+tsha/ 
161b2(mdo sde): rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhig rang byung gi/ 
161b3(mdo sde): chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams// rnam pa kun tu mngon par sprul
161b4(mdo sde): byed cing // yid las byung ba de dag rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang de ba zhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams// ji snyed gang dag
161b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten bzhug so cog/ sems kyis skad cig gcig/ la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// tshig cig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi
161b6(mdo sde): khyab pa'i// bskal pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med// tshig rab dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'od 'jog/ phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten// 
161b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi// 'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba// sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'jog byed// phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro
161b8(mdo sde): yang lus kyis sam// ngag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa med// dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ byang chub
162a1(mdo sde): sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin// gzhal yas bskal par phyogasu rgyu byed cing // sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan
162a2(mdo sde): pa yin// phyogs bcu dag ni 'jig rten tha dad par// 'jig rten bdag por rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur ba// gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrogs par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi
162a3(mdo sde): bstan pa yin// byang chub don tu srid par spyad spyod tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyar gang yin pa// de yi bsngags pa rtag tu rjod par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams
162a4(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa yin// chos mchog chos rab phul du phyin pa drang // khyad par 'phags chos bla med gang yod pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston// 
162a5(mdo sde): ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi// tshe nyid 'di na yod kyi gzhan med pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bar byed
162a6(mdo sde): 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad 'gyur ci 'dra ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston
162a7(mdo sde): bar byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang // de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa rnams// de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod/ 
162a8(mdo sde): par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang // dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu
162b1(mdo sde): ma bskor ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya// shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang // ngan song sa rnams dag tu gnod gyur pa'i// gnas dang skyabs/ 
162b2(mdo sde): dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya// gang zhig byang chub don tu sems 'jog pa// de ni dang po'i byang chub sems dpar bstan// 
162b3(mdo sde): bslabs pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges byas pa// ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin// nung bral rnams kyi bstan pa ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir/ 
162b4(mdo sde): de ltar thog ma su zhig sems skyed pa// 'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no// phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde// gnyen dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang // kun
162b5(mdo sde): tu srung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems// slob dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems// de 'dra drag lasems gnas gyur pa de// lung nod kha ton
162b6(mdo sde): byed par sbyar bar bya// mang du thos nas dgon par gan su bzhug/ dben par gyur nas dge bshes sten tu gzhug/ dge bshes rnams la bka' blo bde bar bya// dus tshong
162b7(mdo sde): shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya// dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya// 'jigs med pa nas don la brtson par bya// don shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya// 
162b8(mdo sde): chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya// rmongs pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras// legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya// 'di ni dang po'i las can
163a1(mdo sde): brjod pa ste// byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin// 'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste// 'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras// byang chub sem
163a2(mdo sde): dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa rab tu sbyor// mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang // bdag med pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang // de bzhin chos 'di
163a3(mdo sde): thams cad bdag min dang // mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang // 'di dag thams cad rtog pa med yin par// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rtog par byed// sems
163a4(mdo sde): can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang // brtag par bya/ phyir de ni gzeng yang bstod// 'jig rten khams ni mtha'// yas mu med ces// de ltar de ni dpyod du gzhug
163a5(mdo sde): par bya// 'di ni sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang na mkha 'ji snyed yod pa dang // phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa// de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug
163a6(mdo sde): rgya chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi// rang bzhin ma lus mthar thugs brtag bya ba// de ni sangs rgyas sras po sbyor byed la// phan par bya phyir rjesu bstan pa yin// 
163a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa// bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed// blo ldan de ni dngos med dngos po rtogs// dam chos gnasu skyes te legs par skyes// 
163a8(mdo sde): de ni rang gi sa las yong mi ldog/ sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa skye// rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan// sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod// 
163b1(mdo sde): las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang // rnam par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// rnam par dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes// de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems
163b2(mdo sde): dpar brjod// thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang // ma byon dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas// grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang // rang byung
163b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas dam pa de dag dus gsum mnyam nyid rje su zhugs pas shes// nam yang mnyam nyid bye brag 'byed mi byed// de ni dus gsum tha dad
163b4(mdo sde): med par 'jug/ gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba// de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ste// 'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub den tu nges par
