163b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur// de lhag byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin// thab/ sa la mkhas pa'i rjesu zhugs pa ste// bsod
163b6(mdo sde): nams las dag brtsams pas mthar phyin byed// de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang // 'jig rten kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang // phan par 'dod dang bde ba thob byed dang // 
163b7(mdo sde): snying brtse ba dang skye dgu dgrol 'gyur byed// 'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dren par byed cing rab tu dang bar byed// sems can mang po thams cad gdul
163b8(mdo sde): 'dod dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che// 'jig rten thams cad mtha' ma med pa dang // de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang // mtshungs med
164a1(mdo sde): bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang // stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun tshogs/ 
164a2(mdo sde): phan dang snying brtser ldan// de la rjesu bstan pa 'di 'dra ste// yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan// de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang // chos kyi ngo bo
164a3(mdo sde): nyid la rmongs pa med// shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phyed// sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // spyod pa'i/ 
164a4(mdo sde): bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang // sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes// thos par gyur kyang bsam lta sa nur ba med// sems can nyon mongs can nam
164a5(mdo sde): rnam dag gam// gdul sla zhe 'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am// chos dbyings chung zhe 'am yang na rgya che zhe 'am// 'jig par 'gyur zhe 'am 'chags par 'gyur zhe
164a6(mdo sde): 'am/ chos dbyings yod ce 'am med ces thos gyur kyang // dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de// sangs rgyas chos
164a7(mdo sde): 'dir bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang // dngos med rang bzhin brdzun zhing dben pa dang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mig yor 'dra ba yi// chos mchog/ 
164a8(mdo sde): zhi ba 'di 'dra nyan par byed// de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // spyod pa yod dam med ces nges par dpyod// byung ngam
164b1(mdo sde): mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhes 'am ma 'das zhe 'am/ ma byon ce 'am ma byon ma yin zhe 'am/ byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad dam// de bzhin
164b2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid med// gcig dang tha dad rnam pa mang po dang // don dang tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa// thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du// mi
164b3(mdo sde): ldog byang chub sems dpa' yid ces byed// mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang // mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang // rnam par phye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams// 
164b4(mdo sde): thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed// gzhonur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // 'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed
164b5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ste// na// pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byed cing // de dag/ rnams kyi mos pa dpyod par byed// sems can spyod
164b6(mdo sde): dang rjesu 'thun chos dang // zhing rnams 'jig dang 'i tshags pa rnams kyang shes// ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur du mngon shos thob// phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug par byed/ 
164b7(mdo sde): bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams thos nas kyang // de la de nur bar 'gyur ba med// yongasu shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang // de bzhin byin gyis brlab dang rnam dpyod dang
164b8(mdo sde): ji ltar skad cig grangs med 'gro 'gyur ba// shing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya// de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed// lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston// de la sgra skad
165a1(mdo sde): / sbyor ba 'jam klas dang // sems gcig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshar gang yin pa// sems can rnams kyi 'jug
165a2(mdo sde): ba ji bzhin shes// de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang // spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang // tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang // 'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon
165a3(mdo sde): mtha' dang // brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag/ ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin// pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshar 'byin te// de yang ji ltar kun tu spyad pa dang / 
165a4(mdo sde): gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba dang // pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang // dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang // byin gyi brlabs dang gzhan gnod ci 'dra dang / cho
165a5(mdo sde): la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste// 'di ni rgyal la tshabs la 'jug pa yin// de tsam gyis na de'i mthar thu/ ga ste// ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba med
165a6(mdo sde): tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na// tshul ldan rgyal 'tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs// dbang bskur gang yin bde gshi gas sras gcig ste// thu bo khyad 'phags mthar
165a7(mdo sde): phyin bdag nyid can// skra thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung // 'di ni bsam pa bgrangs pas rtogs ma yin// rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra ste// 'di na sems can la
165a8(mdo sde): las zhing rnams kun// phra rab rdul du grags nas ma lus bgrang // grangs med 'di snyed cig ces gcod byed pa// de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas shes// 'das dang de bzhi/ 
165b1(mdo sde): ma byon sangs rgyas dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang ka rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi kha bor gyur pa byang chub sems de bye/ thog mar byang chub/ 
165b2(mdo sde): sems shes gang brjod pa// de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de// 'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na// de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod// de nas byang chub sems
165b3(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par smras so// 
165b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsamadagyis mi khyab ste// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming / thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mkhyen pa
165b5(mdo sde): nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grang sa 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 
165b6(mdo sde): de dag nges par sangs rgyasu 'gyur ro// chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin
165b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rna lam du 'di lta
165b8(mdo sde): bu'i chos 'di dag grag par gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis lag
166a1(mdo sde): // tu thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btso/ 
166a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gzigasu gsol/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas/ bdag ni dmus long dang 'dra lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta
166a3(mdo sde): bur gyur pa yang ma bas kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta bur gyur pa lag so// bcom
166a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid ba
166a5(mdo sde): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ ga shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad skul cig/ de bzhin ga
166a6(mdo sde): pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor daMr sgrogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
166a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongasu skom pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la
166a8(mdo sde): don 'di skabs brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston
166b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig/ khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'thung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o// de nas
166b2(mdo sde): skad cig de nyid la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
166b3(mdo sde): 'khod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la lnga'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
166b4(mdo sde): cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// dbargya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams / cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab na
166b5(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyurato// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon
166b6(mdo sde): mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ 
166b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang la la dag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag
166b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuro zhes/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
167a1(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu khyod song la/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la gsol ba thob
167a2(mdo sde): shig/ de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa/ shing blag sha dang sA la'i drung gzhan zhig na/ skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya
167a3(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis blta/ 
167a4(mdo sde): nas 'dug par gyur te/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dpal gyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa ga
167a5(mdo sde): la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu de bzhin/ gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'deb
167a6(mdo sde): so// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don
167a7(mdo sde): 'di gang yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ kho bo ni khyod dang 'gyed mi nuso// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod snying las chu ngur 'dug
167a8(mdo sde): shig dang / khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan gyis khyod kyis shod cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhonu
167b1(mdo sde): gyur pas ting 'dzin de las langs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
167b2(mdo sde): gyur pas ting 'dzin de las langs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
167b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khong pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang
167b4(mdo sde): g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// chos 'dod
167b5(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang za'o/ ga rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// lha'i bu mo mang po yang 'dus par gyur to// dge slong gi 'khor dang / dge slong
167b6(mdo sde): ma'i 'khor dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang / 'thab bral gyi 'khor dang / dga' ldan
167b7(mdo sde): gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus
167b8(mdo sde): par gyur to// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la
167b9(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya yi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang
168a1(mdo sde): ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran brtan dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas dang / 
168a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de
168a3(mdo sde): ngag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to// khams kyi rgyal po dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dag
168a4(mdo sde): kyang 'dus par gyur to// rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
168a5(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom nga ldan 'das deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags/ de ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom
168a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dA ti 'i bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin pa no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
168a7(mdo sde): dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
168a8(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po la gsol ba thob shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting 'dzin rin po/ 
168b1(mdo sde): tshe bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gon mchog ta la la'i ga rgyas 'di nyan par 'gyur ba su yin/ 
168b2(mdo sde): che bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di nyan par 'gyur ba su yin/ shA rang
168b3(mdo sde): ti'i bus smras pa/ 'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ste/ kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ong so// de nas 'jam
168b4(mdo sde): dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos nyan pa 'di dag ni sgyu ma byung ba sha stag na kho bos su la chos
168b5(mdo sde): bshad/ nyan pa ni su yin/ 'chad pa ni su yin/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod cig/ kho bos mnyan to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
168b6(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig blo dgas yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni steng pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
168b7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni tshig med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te stong pa nyid
168b8(mdo sde): tshig med pa yin na/ ci zhig bshad par bya/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bstan tu med pa yin te/ de dag ni bstan tu med cing mnyan du med do// gnas brtan
168b9(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bu bstan pa de thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/ mtshan ma med pa bstan pa/ smon pa med pa bstan pa/ blang ba med pa bstan pa/ 
169a1(mdo sde): dor ba med pa bstan pa/ spros pa med pa bstan pa ste/ ma spros pa bstan pa yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / 
169a2(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga' nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus dkon
169a3(mdo sde): mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do// zhes leg so// zhes bya ba byin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad
169a4(mdo sde): ces smraso// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' dko na mchog ta la la'i gzungs ji ltar gzung bar bya/ kla/ theg par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la
169a5(mdo sde): yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/ 'jam dang la gyis smras pa/ rab 'byor gzungs 'di ni skye ba med par yod la bya'o// dngos po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med
169a6(mdo sde): pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / dor ba med par yid la bya'o// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems
169a7(mdo sde): dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur to// lha dang mi drug cu rtsa gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub
169a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad/ 
169b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ji 'dra ba zhig lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
169b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum pa yongasu mi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yino// gang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu
169b3(mdo sde): ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin// gang sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yong su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yino// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni snang
169b4(mdo sde): rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog yongasu gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yi no// gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams
169b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yino// gang sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
169b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi snying rje chen po yi no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thamasacad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems bya'o// 'dre ba
169b7(mdo sde): med pa mang du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 
169b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la
170a1(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / thugs brtse ba mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas/ 
170a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam
170a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par spo ba su yod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
170a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems/ dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa'
170a5(mdo sde): ngan song spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon
170a6(mdo sde): 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ze ba ldan dang / byang chub
170a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' nor bu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' bltar mi mthong dang / 
170a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lta dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phung po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung
170b1(mdo sde): / gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tog dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nam/ 
170b2(mdo sde): dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa
170b3(mdo sde): bsam yas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang // byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis
170b4(mdo sde): brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdol pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems
170b5(mdo sde): dpa' spobs pa mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa la 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur
170b6(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa
170b7(mdo sde): zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gnyi gdugs snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun
170b8(mdo sde): po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
171a1(mdo sde): pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das
171a2(mdo sde): slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i
171a3(mdo sde): gzungs yang dag par bshad par spro lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni bya dka' ba ste/ go cha 'di/ 
171a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba 'di ni shin tu bya dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la phan
171a5(mdo sde): ba dang / skye bo mang po bde bar 'gyur ba dkon mchogata la la'i gzungs nyon cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs
171a6(mdo sde): te sngags bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams ca de la phyag 'tshalo// tad ya thA/ oM maM/ b+ha ra Ta/ 
171a7(mdo sde): b+ha ra Te/ b+ha ra b+ha ran te swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos shes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa
171a8(mdo sde): mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos chos shes bgyi ba 'di'i don gang lags
171b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don
171b2(mdo sde): to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni namakha'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med
171b3(mdo sde): pa'i gzhi'i don to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
171b4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ mi ga dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid da/ ting / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched
171b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong
171b6(mdo sde): pa'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di ji
171b7(mdo sde): ltar gzung bar bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang / skye
171b8(mdo sde): ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / na mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
172a1(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dkon mchog ta la la'i/ 
172a2(mdo sde): gzungs 'di gzung bzung ba dang / kun tu gzung ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par
172a3(mdo sde): dbye ba dang / gsal bar bya ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par brtag pa'i don to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAr/ 
172a4(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon
172a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod chag/ sa dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 
172a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas
172a7(mdo sde): zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rig pa dang ma rig pa yun
172a8(mdo sde): ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rig pa dang ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
172b1(mdo sde): na mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal na mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
172b2(mdo sde): pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur
172b3(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi dang byi la thams cad dam/ wa
172b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nuso// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i bstan
172b5(mdo sde): pa gcig gi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/ 'dza ma dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lta ci smos/ de nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam
172b6(mdo sde): dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag la kun tu bsrung ba dang / 
172b7(mdo sde): yongasu bskyang ba mdzad par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas rang rang gis chos kyi bstan las langs nas/ bcom
172b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par
173a1(mdo sde): ston par bgyid pa/ chos smra ba de dag gi ston gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i
173a2(mdo sde): rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyuraro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
173a3(mdo sde): la nye bar 'gyuraro// de dag la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba rnams kyis glegs mi rnyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smra ba'i dge slong de la se gol/ 
173a4(mdo sde): gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig mi byams pa'i se/ rnams bskyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur ba las kyang ring du gyu/ pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang
173a5(mdo sde): ci dgos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag mdo sde 'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sem sa skyed pa de dag ni so thags ngan par 'gyur// lce dang
173a6(mdo sde): sna med par 'gyur/ rka lag phyi phyogasu 'gyur/ lus nad bu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 
173a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di dag ni mi gti mug pa de dag gi skyon du 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal mdor bshad na/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang sems can
173a8(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'jug go// gal te mir skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce med par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi
173b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la lus mdze can du 'gyur/ mdu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur lus zhom par 'gyur/ lus gcer bur 'gyuraro// lus
173b2(mdo sde): skam por 'gyur/ yi dwags 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
173b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ 
173b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig 'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur
173b5(mdo sde): rab tu dngang par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal gyis ga/ sol pa/ sems can 'di dag gis 'di lta bu thos nas/ slan cad nam yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi 'gyur
173b6(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sa'i 'og na sems
173b7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba yod pa'i ming la 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / thig nag dang / kun tu 'bar dang / reg dka' dang / drag po dang / mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi thu
173b8(mdo sde): lum dang / lcags kyi be con dang / mun khung dang / mgo bstod dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / spre'u gdong dang / rtag tu rab 'bar dang / rul ba dang / rtag tu dring dang / rab 'a
174a1(mdo sde): dang / nges 'jom dang / shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal mi gti mug pa de gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni 'di dag go// de nas/ 
174a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom
174a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po khyod kyis zhu ba de legs par zhus so// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi bu mo chos smra ba de 'di nas shi
174a4(mdo sde): 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ dpa spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar 'gyur te/ 
174a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon du
174a6(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med/ dpag tu med de/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nuso// byang chub sems dpa' kun
174a7(mdo sde): tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad me'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
174a8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po 'di lta bu chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ste/ 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan
174b1(mdo sde): dngags sbyar ba yin gyi/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin no// 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dmyal
174b2(mdo sde): bkun tu 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur// skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems can dmyal ba kun tu
174b3(mdo sde): 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyuraro// skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los mi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la ltung bar 'gyu ro// de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa
174b4(mdo sde): brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro// gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das nas myir skye bar gyur na yang tshe rabs thams cad du dmus long
174b5(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang / gdong phyin phyog/ su 'dug pa dang / ltag skur dang 'jing pa nub pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang / rtag tu bkres
174b6(mdo sde): shing skom pas nyen pa dang / lus skams pa dang / kha mnam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam/ thos na yang yid du mi 'ong bar rtse bar 'gyu'o// de nas thams cad dang
174b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la khros pa'i sems kyis
174b8(mdo sde): bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par chag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar shes rab
175a1(mdo sde): 'chal bar gyur pa dang / ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongasu gsol/ de nas nyan thos chen po/ 
175a2(mdo sde): de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag sngangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
175a3(mdo sde): bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu sngangs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ khyed kyis
175a4(mdo sde): skrag par bya ba'i rig so// grogs po dag nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin na/ nga nyid kyang skrag na/ gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos
175a5(mdo sde): 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'am/ lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze
175a6(mdo sde): gzhan dag gis lta ga la nus te ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dge chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi dag dper ma dkon
175a7(mdo sde): mchog za ma tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
175a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni legs par gsungs pa leg so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag gi dad pas stsal pa ji ltar yongasu 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
175b1(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang / chos smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ se gol gtogs pa gcig
175b2(mdo sde): srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongasu spyad pa 'am/ tha na dge 'dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal cig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
175b3(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam ring ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
175b4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams/ med pa lnga po dag ni bla'i/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
175b5(mdo sde): spas pa ni nam yang de lta ma yino// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa lnga po dge myur du zad par byas nas mir skye bar 'gyuraro// dam
175b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
175b7(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad snga na ngu zhing 'di skad ces smraso// e ma'o dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsnga'o// las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag
175b8(mdo sde): gi rmi lam na yang mngon par ma gyur cig// bam po gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
176a1(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu de snyam du ma sems shig/ ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na/ 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ rang gi las kyi bgog
176a2(mdo sde): la spyod pa/ rang gi las bstan par bya ba ste/ sems can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma ldan no// shA
176a3(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni dge leg su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba med par
176a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis te/ sa par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang
176a5(mdo sde): ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa da nga / log par lta ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas/ shi
176a6(mdo sde): ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can thams cad la nga'i
176a7(mdo sde): snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ngas sems can gcig gi don tu yang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i// sems can
176a8(mdo sde): gcig po ni yongasu gtang bar mi bya'o snyam ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig la bu gcig
176b1(mdo sde): pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod la/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi de bu/ 
176b2(mdo sde): la sems pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te ngu zhing smre sngags 'don to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
176b3(mdo sde): kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu cig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa ni ma yin no// shA ra dwa
176b4(mdo sde): ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro drang lhan cig mi gnaso// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa drag kyang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa ni/ 
176b5(mdo sde): ma yino// shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas la/ ma po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par
176b6(mdo sde): sprul te/ bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/ ma skyes ma 'gags 'gag par mi 'gyuraro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin ga sh+ye
176b7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongasu smin par mdzad cing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yi no// dper na na mkha'i khams
176b8(mdo sde): ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// 'on kyang sems can rnams dang
177a1(mdo sde): // mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par mdzad de/ sems can ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par 'dzu/ 
177a2(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba mi mnga'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
177a3(mdo sde): nga ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog dang / phul dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin
177a4(mdo sde): teshA ra dwa ti'i bu tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'o// ra/ ba tu byung ba 'am/ khyim pa 'am rung ste/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams
177a5(mdo sde): cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ 
177a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag
177a7(mdo sde): gi lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dag gi lce ni dpag tshad 'bum par 'gyur te/ de la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba
177a8(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bye ba phrag lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ngag ma
177b1(mdo sde): srungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor mi gti mug pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyuraro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gtse/ 
177b2(mdo sde): bas bstan pa ni rmad du 'byung ba chen po lag so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
177b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o// 
177b4(mdo sde): gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// sti stang bgyi'o// bla mar bgyi'o// ri mor bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// rjed pa bgyi'o// gsol
177b5(mdo sde): ba bgyi'o// sti stang bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / dgus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras te chos kyi sku las nges pa
177b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dpe ra na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bur gyur pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa
177b7(mdo sde): deni 'og ma thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lag so// de bzhin du chos smra ba de de kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os
177b8(mdo sde): lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos smra ba'i dge
178a1(mdo sde): grong de dag snying las chung ngur bya ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / kun tu bsrung ba dang / brgyab pa'i phyir tshig 'di legs par smra'o// byang chub sems dpa'/ 
178a2(mdo sde): kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / 
178a3(mdo sde): zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// dpag tshad brgya 'khor yug tu yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la
178a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu tshig 'di legs par smras pa leg so leg/ so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi das tshig su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// gzhan la
178a5(mdo sde): phan dang bde ba byed pa bsags pa po// rnam pa sna tshog/ sa rab mdzes mchog rab tshig ldan pa// shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog/ ston rin chen
178a6(mdo sde): mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshig legs smras// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
178a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
178a8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs thob bo// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la kho/ 
178b1(mdo sde): khro ba med pa'o// kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog med pa dang / rlom sems med pa/ 
178b2(mdo sde): ste/ kun tu bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis chos gnyis so// kun tu bzang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
178b3(mdo sde): po ni sems can thams cad la dbang po gnod par mi 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam
178b4(mdo sde): par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang / dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongasu brjod pa
178b5(mdo sde): bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu las sems can dpag tu/ med pas gzungs thob par gyur to// / dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi
178b6(mdo sde): yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i le'u'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
178b7(mdo sde): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
178b8(mdo sde): ni zab lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ gzugs zab pa'i phyir zab bo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
179a1(mdo sde): shes pa zab pa'i phyir zab bo// stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo// na mkha' zab pa'i phyir zab bo// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
179a2(mdo sde): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du thos nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nam yang ma thos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
179a3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yino// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sems/ 
179a4(mdo sde): can mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'a 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
179a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thu ba pa ngas chos smra ba de dag kyang byin gyis brlab so// 
179a6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba de ni mig na bar mi 'gyur/ lcen par mi 'gyur/ sman par mi 'gyur/ so na bar mi 'gyur/ lag pa dang
179a7(mdo sde): rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur/ klad pa na bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyur/ lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed
179a8(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur// de la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad srung bar 'gyuraro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongasu spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten
179b1(mdo sde): du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud par chad mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ 
179b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad byed mi nus te/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe/ bdud sdig can 'di snyam du
179b3(mdo sde): bdag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad pa la bar chad byed du 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can gyis rang gi khyim kun tu 'bar bar mthong ste/ 
179b4(mdo sde): kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo// kun dga' bos phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur/ phyag bya 'gyur/ phyag
179b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyuraro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa sa phyogs gang na ba/ zhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnam grangs
179b6(mdo sde): 'di yang gnas par gyur la/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i slad du mchis shing mchis nas kyang / sngar de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas slad kyis chos kyi
179b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na nongs pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos gang gi tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu dkol to nga la phyag
179b8(mdo sde): 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyuro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa yin mong/ 
180a1(mdo sde): kyi kun dga' bo ngas sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 
180a2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang las ting 'dzin rin po che dkon mchog ta la la bstan pa 'di gsan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gong na su mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
180a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ma'i 'jig rten dang / lha'i 'jig rten dang / dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang med de/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ngas
180a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs/ dpa brtsegs pa'i snying po gser bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab raba'i 'od zer du ma'i lte ba rgyas pa las mngon du
180a5(mdo sde): thos te/ kun dga' bo bya dka' ba chen po bye ba khrag khrigabargya stong du ma myong nas/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des nga lung
180a6(mdo sde): bstan to// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag gyis la phyis nga la phyag 'tshol cig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
180a7(mdo sde): ba de dag thams cad kyi mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smraso// a la la chos/ a la la chos/ chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa a la la'o// sems can gang dag chos kyi
180a8(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa de dag kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par
180b1(mdo sde): rab tu ston pa lta ci smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong / 
180b2(mdo sde): pa de dag la kye grogs po dag khyed kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legaso leg so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ stong/ 
180b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos snang bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ sems can
180b4(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi thos pa de dag ni ji ltar ming dmus long gis nyi ma'i sdang ba mi mthong ba dang / ji ltar rkyong pa thabs mi shes pa dang ji ltar mi dbul po gzha
180b5(mdo sde): gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra ste/ de dag gi don du ngas dpe 'di dag byas na ci nas sems can rnams chos rin po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba las ring du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i
180b6(mdo sde): phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang / sems can thams cad kyi don tu khyod la gsol ba 'debs na rigs kyi bu khyod spro 'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
180b7(mdo sde): bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud
180b8(mdo sde): nas/ ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rang gi chos kyi stan las langs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
181a1(mdo sde): pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yo so// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'ur/ 
181a2(mdo sde): 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'u ro// chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem che mo// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug so// 'jig rten du
181a3(mdo sde): snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
181a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag spro lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spro lag so// bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par
181a5(mdo sde): bzhed pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags kyi steng du/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa/ lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
181a6(mdo sde): bka' ltar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid
181a7(mdo sde): pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchis bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi/ byas pa mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lagaso// de nas bcom ldan
181a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras leg so leg so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
181b1(mdo sde): kyi sras thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa dang / phul yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongasu gtad do// 'di ni nga'i ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung
181b2(mdo sde): bar bya'o// dus dus su sti stang gyis shig/ rin po che'i snod du chug la phrag la thogs shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig pa can de dag la yid ma rton cig/ rigs kyi bu
181b3(mdo sde): 'di ni khyod la rje su bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
181b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol ba sems can mang po la sman par bgyid par 'gyur lags
181b5(mdo sde): na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde b.ragashegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis be ka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'khor rgya
181b6(mdo sde): mtsho lta bu 'di lta bu dang / 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la
181b7(mdo sde): byed pa gzhan mthong la/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyon cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
181b8(mdo sde): bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// kun tu bzang po rab tu byung ba/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa/ rnyed pa la chags pa/ gtsug lag khang la chags pa
182a1(mdo sde): // gnas la chags pa dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ de dag 'byung ste/ kun tu bzang po mi
182a2(mdo sde): gti mug pa de lta bu dag gi dom tu ngas mdo 'di yongasu gtad kyis mdo 'di nub par gyur ta re/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad lhags te/ 
182a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing 'tshogs te/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas
182a4(mdo sde): kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba'i dge slong de la yang yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// sti stang du bgyi'o// btsun par bgyi'o// rim
182a5(mdo sde): gro bgyi'o// mchod pa bgyi'o// rjed par bgyi'o// gsol pa bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang / chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang
182a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa de dag la yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// yon tan pha rol phyin pa de dag gi/ yon tan
182a7(mdo sde): kun bshad thams cad nga la nyon// nga rgyal rgyags dang bag med spang byos la// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis// ma ga d+ha 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung // rang
182a8(mdo sde): byung mi yi seng ge bzhugs shes grag/ ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa mchog la gnas// shing rgyal chen po de yi drung na bzhugs// phyogs bcu zhing rdul snyed dang de thabs gcig
182b1(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dpa' bo bskor// sangs rgyas phal chen zhes bya'i tingange 'dzin// ting 'dzin de la mi dbang po gnas// mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas// 'jam/ 
182b2(mdo sde): dpal gzho nu shar gyi phyogs logs nas// sangs rgyas zhing bcu'i rdul snyed lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung 'ongs// de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun
182b3(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas sras po dpal zhes bya ba kun// phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed dang lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang lhags par gyur// der 'dus gyur nas 'jig
182b4(mdo sde): rten phan 'dod pa// 'jam dpal grags pa ma/ tha' yas ldan rnams la// sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal gyis dris// sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang ston ci// 
182b5(mdo sde): de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba// rnyog po med pas byang chub ston dang // bden yangs yon tan ldan gyi spyod yul gtsang // sems can dam pa bzang po'i
182b6(mdo sde): dpal la dris// sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang // rgyal bas bsten pa bdag gis 'dir smras kyis// khyod kyang sangs rgyas sras kyi yon tan dang // spyod pa
182b7(mdo sde): gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon// yon tan mtha' yas ldan de'i yon tan las// dpe chul cung zad tsam zhig brjod par
182b8(mdo sde): byang rgya mtsho'i thigs pa bzhin du shin tu chung // byang chub gzhir 'gyur ba yi rang byung sems// thog ma nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa// de yi yon tan bsngags pa mthal
183a1(mdo sde): /  sa mas s+ho// rgyas kyi mas na sa//  // rgyus
183a2(mdo sde): rgyal bkun gyis de dag gi/ yon tan chu bo zad par mdzad mi spyod// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las// dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod bya ste/ ma
183a3(mdo sde): mabyas dra bar chung ba dang // ma tshan rnams las rgyal phran gcig dang margya sa/ byung chub yod tun gnas kyi sems bye ga/ d+hU med ma yin gyi pa sa
183a4(mdo sde): dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la// dang dang dang banyid daskyed nas sems skye te// de ni 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal ni dang // bdag la bde dang sma dang grags
183a5(mdo sde): phyir min// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi ba'i phyira'ajig rten phan pa byed pa'i sems skye'o// rtag tu sems/ can phan pa bya phyir dang // zhing rnams sbyang
183a6(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang ma/ chos yongs gzungs dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang // ye shes rnam par sbyang phyir sems de skye// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du// 
183a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i tshogs la rtag tu dad pa dang // dang zhing mos dang gus pa rab bskyed nas// bla ma gus par mchod phyir sems de skye// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad
183a8(mdo sde): gyur cing // sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dang byed la// byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas// skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag
183b1(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams// bsam yas rgya chen mchod pas mchod byas shing // chos dang de bzhin mi byed dge 'dun la// bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o// dang pa
183b2(mdo sde): sngon 'dren ma ltar skyed pa ste// yon tan thams cad srung zhing 'phel bar byed// dogs pa sel cing chu bo rnams las sgrol// dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin// dang
183b3(mdo sde): pa rnyog pa med cing sems dang byed// nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin// dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog/ lag pa bzhin du dge sdang rtsa ba yin// dad pa
183b4(mdo sde): yongasu gtong la dga' bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed// dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed// sangs rgyas go 'phang ston cing thob par byed/ 
183b5(mdo sde): dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar byed// dad pa'i stong/ sa la gzhan gyis mi rdzi zhing // nyon mongs rnam par sel/ pa'i gzhi rten yin// dad pa rang 'byung ston
183b6(mdo sde): rnams kyang tshol// dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags pa med// mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog cig yin// dad pa bdud kyi dam las 'da' byed cing // thar pa'i lam
183b7(mdo sde): mchog ston par byed pa yin// yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul ba// dad pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed// ye shes khyad par yon tan 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba tham
183b8(mdo sde): cad ston pa yin// dad pas mos pa'i khyad par dga' rnams kyi// de la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya// 'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te// rgya mtsho'i nang na rin// 
184a1(mdo sde): / chen rgyal po bzhin// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang gus pa// de dag tshul khrims bslab pa yongs mi 'dor// gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi 'dor ba// ston/ 
184a2(mdo sde): ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod// tshul khrims byang chub sems stong byed pa ste// slob pa'i sa yi ston rnams la sbyor// tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa// de dag rgyal
184a3(mdo sde): bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang gus pa// de dag rgyal la mchod pa rgya chen byed// gang dag rgyal la mchod pa che byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas dang / 
184a4(mdo sde): pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag rtag tu chos la dang gu sa pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan ngoms pa med// gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa// de dag chos la
184a5(mdo sde): mos pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dang gus pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dad pa yin// gang dag mi ldog dge 'dun rab dad pa// de dag dad pa'i stobs
184a6(mdo sde): kyis mi ldog 'gyur// gang dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal// gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsal ba// de dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam
184a7(mdo sde): par spangs// gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yong su bzung // gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen
184a8(mdo sde): sogs par byed// gang dag dge ba rgya chen sogs byed pa// bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan// bdag nyid chen po rgyu stongs gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par gyu
184b1(mdo sde): chen 'gyur// gang dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin brlabs// gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa// de dag byang chub don du sems
184b2(mdo sde): kyang skye// gang dag byang chub don tu sems skye ba// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa// de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigasu/ 
184b3(mdo sde): skye// gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa// de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs// mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa// de dag dad dang bsam pa rnam
184b4(mdo sde): par dag/ gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog/ gang dag lhag bas ma dam pa mchog ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin
184b5(mdo sde): pa spyod// gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa// de/ ngag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs// gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir zhugs pa// de dag sangs rgyas rnams la
184b6(mdo sde): sgrub pas mchod// gang dag sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas rjesu dran mi phyed// gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas
184b7(mdo sde): bsam yas mthong // gang dag sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba// de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min// gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min// de
184b8(mdo sde): dag par skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur// gang dag par skabs chos las mi nyams pa// de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur// gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur
185a1(mdo sde): pa/ de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur// gang dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa// de dag 'gro la byams shing phan par 'dod// gang dag 'gro la
185a2(mdo sde): byams shing phan 'dod pa// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// gang dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa brtan pa// de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur// gang dag chos dga'
185a3(mdo sde): dga' ba'i dbang po can// de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor// gang dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bor ba// de dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min// gang dag pa
185a4(mdo sde): rgyal rgyags med bag med min// de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson pa// de dag 'khor bar yongasu skyo ba med// gang dag 'kho
185a5(mdo sde): bar yongasu mi skyo ba// de dag tun pa dam pa mchog dang ldan// gang dag tun pa dam pa mchog ldan pa// de dag mngon shes rnam par dag pa skyes// gang dag mngon
185a6(mdo sde): shes rnam par dag skyes pa// de dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs// gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa// de dag 'gro ba yongasu smin byed mkhas// 'gro ba yongasu smin
185a7(mdo sde): byed gang mkhas pa// de dag 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas// 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// gang dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir
185a8(mdo sde): brtson pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed// gang dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa// de dag shes rab thabs la rten pa yin// gang dag shes rab thabs la rten gyur
185b1(mdo sde): lung rnams kyis so mi tshun ga/ nang ga nga lung mas
185b2(mdo sde): pa/ dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas// dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa// de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs// gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis
185b3(mdo sde): mi tshugs pa// de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das// gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa// de dag mi ldogs ni rjesu thob// gang dag mi ldog sa ni thob gyur par// de
185b4(mdo sde): dag mi skye bzod pa thob pa yin// gang dag mi skye bzod pa thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron te rgyal bas lung bstan te// 'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag
185b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum gnas// rgyal kun dang mngon du su gnas pa// de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga mkhas// rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga su mkhas pa// de dag
185b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin// gang dag rgyal ba/ kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag ston kun gyis leg/ sa par brgyan// gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs
185b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa// de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs// bsod nams mchog stobs rnams kyis lus sbyangs pa// de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo
185b8(mdo sde): 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams rdzogs// gang dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa// de dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang pos spras// gang
185b9(mdo sde): dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang spras pa// de dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas so// gang dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa// de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab// gang
186a1(mdo sde): // ngag 'od bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag 'od las pad+ma rnams kyang 'byung // gang dag 'od las pad+ma rnams byung ba// de dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan
186a2(mdo sde): 'khod par// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul bar byed// gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i bdun 'khod par// phyogs bcu'i
186a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yaso// gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// 
186a4(mdo sde): de dag bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyu zhing // bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston par byed// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim par byed// gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab
186a5(mdo sde): chos ston cing // sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim/ byed pa// de dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis// bcoM ma pa de bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang
186a6(mdo sde): ngag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid// ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang // gang
186a7(mdo sde): ngag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid// ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang ba// de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed// gang dag
186a8(mdo sde): smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston byed pa// de dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ngo // 
186b1(mdo sde): gang dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba// de dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam par/ 
186b2(mdo sde): shes/ gang dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa// de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye mi 'gyur// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar
186b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ma yin// gang dag nam yang mi 'chi mi skye zhing // nyon mongs rgyu ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab tu phye bas 'jig
186b4(mdo sde): rten rgyu// gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa// de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang // pha rol phyin dang rnam
186b5(mdo sde): thar mchog la gnas// gang dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang // pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog ga/ nus pa// de dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam
186b6(mdo sde): 'phrul dang // ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjesu thob// gang dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang // ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa// de dag phyogs
186b7(mdo sde): bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod
186b8(mdo sde): byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur to// gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil
187a1(mdo sde): // bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba// mthu brtan de dag na mkha' lta bur ni// ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun na gnas// mthu brtan gang dag na mkha' lta bur ni// 
187a2(mdo sde): ma lus khyab phyogs rnams kun gnas pa// mtshungs med de dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi// 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par yong mi nus// mtshungs med gang dag spyod yul lhar
187a3(mdo sde): bcas kyi// 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa// de dag rtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang // ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod do// gang dag rtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang // ming
187a4(mdo sde): thos pa dang spobs pa don yod pa// skyes che/ na de dag sbyin pa sbyid byed kyi// sbyin pa thams cad don yoda'agyur ba yin// skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus// 
187a5(mdo sde): chos kyang gnas shing byams pa nyams mi 'gyur// dge ba'i las lam rab tu spyod 'gyur te// dkon mchog mthu yang dam pa mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje 'khregs pa'i rin chen mchog
187a6(mdo sde): yod pa// de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor rin chen rnams// mi zad mi 'grib 'phel bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas ston chu// gang na sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur pa// 
187a7(mdo sde): der ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang na chos kyang med gyur pa// phyogs der chos kyi gter ni ston par byed// de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtog cing // 
187a8(mdo sde): de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun tu// zla ba lta bur snang ba rab ston cing // thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi// 'jig
187b1(mdo sde): rten kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// 'khor lo sor dang mya ngan 'das ni dang // ring zel rab tu rgyas pa'ang dpa' bstod// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rna las// 
187b2(mdo sde): rgyas bkod pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// bskal pa bsam mi khyab par ston byed cing // theg gsum sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed// mos pa kun gyi bsgrub pa shes pa
187b3(mdo sde): rnams// khye'u bu mo bud med lus rnams dang // lha mi lha min klu dang gnod sbyin dang // grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs rnams ston// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyi sgos
187b4(mdo sde): dpa' bo de dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang // rtags dang spyod dang sgra skad 'jug pa dag/ ji snyed thams cad ma lus ston par byed// de dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas// 
187b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod pa bye da// gang dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs/ bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod byed pa// de dag 'od zer bkod
187b6(mdo sde): pa bsam yas shing // sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' ya so// gang dag 'od zer bkod pa bsamayas shing // sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yas pa
187b7(mdo sde): de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang // yid kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang // yid kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de
187b8(mdo sde): dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul pasam mi khyab/ gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang // bzod brtson rnam 'phrul pas
188a1(mdo sde): // gyis mi khyab pa// de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos// bsam gtan rnam par 'phrul dang shes rab dang // thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam/ 
188a2(mdo sde): mi khyab// ston kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag phra rab rdul 'jug ting 'dzin// rdul rnams kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // rdul cig steng na zhing rnams
188a3(mdo sde): babasam mi khyab// ston par byed kyang rdul la 'brel ba med// rdul de'i steng du sangs rgyas bcas zhing dang // sangs rgyas med pa'i zhong yang kha cig ston// nyon mongs rnam
188a4(mdo sde): ngag dog pa kha cig dang // yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig dang // 'chags pa dang // la la steng g.yogs med dang 'thun// 
188a5(mdo sde): pab dang // la la tshol pa smig rgyu lta bu dang // la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams// ji ltar rdul gcig steng du ston byed pa// de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston// 
188a6(mdo sde): drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// grags pa mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra'o// de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed
188a7(mdo sde): cing / lag pa'i mthil du stong gsum rgyas bkang ste// skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu dag na me tog 'phreng ba dang // spos byug rin chen rin chen ji snyed
188a8(mdo sde): pa/ de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi// rgyal rnams mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'byin// gos dang phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs
188b1(mdo sde): mchog sna tshogs dang // gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen bla re rnams// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'bebs// phyogs bcu dag na yo byad mtha' yas gang // drang / 
188b2(mdo sde): srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os pa// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char 'bebs shing // byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchod// phyogs rnams dag na rol mo ji
188b3(mdo sde): snyed pa// rnga dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi wang dang // sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs// phyogs bcu kun gyi dpe zla med rnams kyi/ 
188b4(mdo sde): yang dag yon bsngags pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrub pa sna tshogs pa// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs// 'od zer gang dag las dges
188b5(mdo sde): yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas na sa yongasu 'gyed byed cing // spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams / thams cad du// 'debs shing 'jig rten sgron ma rnams
188b6(mdo sde): la mchod// 'od zer bkod dang ldan pa me dzes pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyan 'phreng bsam yas rab 'chang ba// pad+ma mtshan rab gzugs can du ma dag/ lag nas rgyal ba
188b7(mdo sde): rnams la mchod pa byed// me tog phal chen me tog bla re dang // me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bskye ste// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po
188b8(mdo sde): de dag rgyal ba mchod// bdug pa phal chen bdug pa'i bla re dang // bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// bdug pa sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid
189a1(mdo sde): // chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phal tshon spos dang spos kyi bla re dang // spos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// sna tshogs spos rnams kun tu bkram byas/ 
189a2(mdo sde): shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phreng ba phal chen phreng ba'i bla re dang // phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // 
189a3(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla re dang // phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// phye ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen
189a4(mdo sde): po de dag rgyal ba mchod// na bza' phal chen na bza'i bla re drang // na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// na bza' sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen
189a5(mdo sde): po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phan chen gdugs dang gdug/ sa kyi bla re dang // gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab ba kye ste// sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun tu
189a6(mdo sde): bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rin chen phal chen rin chen bla re dang // rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu
189a7(mdo sde): bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// pad+ma phal chen pad+ma'i bla re dang // pad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// pad+ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas
189a8(mdo sde): shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rgyan 'phreng phal chen rgyan 'phreng bla re dang // rgyan 'phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs kun
189b1(mdo sde): tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rgyal mtshan mchog dkod 'od zer rab bkye ste// de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sngo dang rgyal
189b2(mdo sde): mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa// du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan par byed// nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i bdugs// dar gyi lda ldi ba dan rab sbyangs shing // dril
189b3(mdo sde): g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi dbu la de dag 'dzin// lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams// rgyal ba gcig la de dag byed pa
189b4(mdo sde): ltar/ rgyal ba ma lus kun la de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba sdud pa'i/ ye shes kyis// rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'jim
189b5(mdo sde): mchog sgrubs shing // bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo// thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang // sbyin pa bas
189b6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang // sbyangs pa'i yon tshul khrims kun sgo dang // bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang // kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang // bsam
189b7(mdo sde): gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang // don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang // spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu
189b8(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po phan par 'dod sgo dang // bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang // bden dang brten dang rnam par thar sgo dang // kha cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo
190a1(mdo sde): / dang / nyan thos theg pas rnam par sgrol sgo dang // rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang // theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang // kha cig mi rtag nyid
190a2(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal sgo// kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang // mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang // zhi 'gog ting 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul// 'gro ba'i spyod pa'i
190a3(mdo sde): sgo rnams ji snyed pa// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te// de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag kun tu
190a4(mdo sde): rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsams bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o// de dag dgal
190a5(mdo sde): ba bkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad/ yongs smin 'thun byed pa// dga' bde spro ba rab dga'/ kun ldan pas// bsams pa bstan nas sems can
190a6(mdo sde): 'dul bar byed// gang du lo nyes 'jig rten yo byad gang // bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa// der ni kun gyi bsams bzhin bya ba yis// sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don
190a7(mdo sde): rnams byed// de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang // gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro
190a8(mdo sde): ba 'dul bar byed// brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing // gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te// phreng bas spud cing spros kyis bskus pa yi// gzugs rnams
190b1(mdo sde): bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la// blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba// gzugs kyi dam pa yongasu stor byed
190b2(mdo sde): cing / gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag ka la bing ka'i sgra snyan dang // khu byug kun la ngang pa'i sgra sad dang // rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci'i sgras// mos pa
190b3(mdo sde): kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas// rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin
190b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed// bya ba kun la grog su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi
