190b5(mdo sde): sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed// sdug bsngal ga/ nod pa 'dus byas skyod kyi rnams// grogs kyi don tu/ de dag bzod byed cing // 'gro ba kun la phan don bde
190b6(mdo sde): don tu// de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len// gang na mngon 'byung med cing chos med de// dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa// der ni rgyal srid 'byor pa rab spangs te/ 
190b7(mdo sde): zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim dang 'ching dang sred pa'i gnas// 'gro ba thams cad yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gan+da
190b8(mdo sde): par/ mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing // skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang // drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus
191a1(mdo sde): // par// yongasu rjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// gang na sems can dpag med tshe ldan zhing // bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa// der ni nabs nyen cing nang bu
191a2(mdo sde): can// bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la// 'jig rten gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing // rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab
191a3(mdo sde): ba'i/ 'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// de ngag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang // chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas che
191a4(mdo sde): ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing // sangs rgyas ston rnams kyis 'gro don byed// de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas rang gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams
191a5(mdo sde): cad du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing // rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten rgyu
191a6(mdo sde): zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin// dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu// de dag snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor// gar mkhan
191a7(mdo sde): rnga mkhan gyang dang rol mo kha na// bzhags mdzes rgyan 'phreng thogs shing gar byed dang // rgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun tu ston// grong ba grong dpon kha lo smra ba 'gyur// de bzhin
191a8(mdo sde): ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag 'gyur// rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang // sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos cho ga mkhas// de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur// 
191b1(mdo sde): klan dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang / yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'byin rdzong po dang // la mgol dong brnangs la lam ston 'gyur// 'ag rten byung nas pa nga shes gyur/ 
191b2(mdo sde): cing sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa// de dag kun la rmos chos tshang thabs dang // sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten rjod par byed// 'tsho med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor
191b3(mdo sde): ba gang // sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags dang // rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun// drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// gang la lhar bcas
191b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba// drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang // brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang // mkhas pa de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// de
191b5(mdo sde): dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can// gdung ba go'u tam dang mi slar spyod// gcer bu gos med lhur len dge sbyong la// mu/ stegs can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston// de
191b6(mdo sde): dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang // bla na yod dang bla na med rnams dang // ral pa ring dang gzho nu'i rtul zhugs can// de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// nyi ma'i rjes
191b7(mdo sde): lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dwags spyod// gle'u can dag mu stegs sum cu pa// de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha yi shes la 'jug pa
191b8(mdo sde): dga' rnams dang // mu stegs nye reg yul du rgyu rnamasu// rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang // bsam yas chos la de dag dam pa mchog/ cog pur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba
192a1(mdo sde): / dang / tsher ma rtsa dang thal bar nyal ba dang // gang dag gtun shing mal can gnas pa dang // de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// pha rol mu stegs can rnams ji
192a2(mdo sde): sbed pa// de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing // bsnyen dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyis// mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul// 'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa/ 
192a3(mdo sde): shes byas nas// lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis// de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed// la lar 'gro lding ba yi sngags
192a4(mdo sde): kyi gzhi// shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis// la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig
192a5(mdo sde): dang // don la rnams nges rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang // rgol ba 'dul ba shes pa'i tshig rnams dang // bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la mi
192a6(mdo sde): skad tshig rnams dang // kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la lha tshig nges tshig dang // klu yis nges tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis// la la srin po 'byung
192a7(mdo sde): po sha za dang // dri za grul bum lto 'phye che tshig dang // mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis// bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren pa byed// de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes
192a8(mdo sde): te/ de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting 'dzin rnams 'phrul de 'dra'o// / 
192b1(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer bkye nas sems
192b2(mdo sde): can 'dul bar byed// mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab stong zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes
192b3(mdo sde): mchog gi rgyu// mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing // chos kyang yongasu bstan te lam bstan cing // rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten brtan byas pas// des na mthong leg
192b4(mdo sde): 'od zer grub par 'gyur// lha yi 'od zer zil kyis gno ngan pa yi// 'od zer 'od byed ces bya ba rab gtong zhing // rdul drang mun pa thams cad bsal byas te// 'jig rten phan/ 
192b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'od de rab tu snang // sems can gang dag 'od des pa skul byas pa// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron bzung bas// 'jig rten
192b6(mdo sde): sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang // rtsa shing mdam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang // spos dang bcud len rin chen sgron ma dag/ rgyal ba rnams
192b7(mdo sde): la phul nas 'od byed thob// sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// de dag sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las// sems can sbrul
192b8(mdo sde): ba'i don tu go cha gyon// gang dag sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las// sems can bsgral ba'i don tu go gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgron// mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong
193a1(mdo sde): khyer ston// stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang // chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru 'byin te// 'dus byas sur byung zhi ba bsngags byas pas// des na sgrol ba'i 'od/ 
193a2(mdo sde): zer grub par 'gyur// skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sengs can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// 'dod pa'i lhan sgom pa rab spangs shing // chos la mos pa'i na/ 
193a3(mdo sde): don tu gnyer// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te// chos mos ro la don tu gnyer gyur pas// bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten sgom pa'i sred
193a4(mdo sde): pa rnam par sel// rdzing dang chu klung khron pa chung ngo dang // mtsho rnams byang chub don tu byed bcud de// 'dod pa smad cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas// des na sred pa sel ba grub/ 
193a5(mdo sde): par gyur// dga' bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// dga'/ pas rgyas shing byang chub mchog tu ni// rang byung
193a6(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa// pad+ma'i bdan la bzhugs pa rnams byas shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams
193a7(mdo sde): brjod pas// de nas dga' byed 'od zer grub par gyur// mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga'
193a8(mdo sde): mgu zhing // tshem la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mthu'o// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing // chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgunas// sangs rgyas chos dang
193b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang // rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med thob// sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la// sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas la/ 
193b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas// des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur// bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od nges bskul
193b3(mdo sde): byas pa// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing // sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed// gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin de byed tshe// slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas te/ 
193b4(mdo sde): bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas// bsod nam sa bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur// ye shes lnga/ na pa'i 'od zer rab gtang nas// sems can
193b5(mdo sde): gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis khong du chud// chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de// don la nges pa'i
193b6(mdo sde): ye shes rnam phye zhing // chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na// des na ye shes ldan de'i 'od zer grub// shes rab sgron ma'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od
193b7(mdo sde): des bskul byas pa// stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing // rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu bla mtshungs/ 
193b8(mdo sde): 'dra zhing // rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dag/ bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo// chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag
194a1(mdo sde): 'od des bskul byas pa// mi zad mdzod kyi gzungs ni thob gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin// chos 'dzin rnams la yongasu pan/ 
194a2(mdo sde): btags te// drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing // 'gro ba chos kyis rjesu gzung byas pas// chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par 'gyur// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od
194a3(mdo sde): zer rab gtong zhing // sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul pa// longs spyod mi rtag mi brtan shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur// ma dul gdul
194a4(mdo sde): dka'i sems can ser sna can// nor rnams rmi lam sprin dang / 'drar shes nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa spel byas rapas// des na gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od 'grub bo// 
194a5(mdo sde): yongasu gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing // khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul pa// tshul khrims rnam par dag la gnas gyur nas// rang byung 'gyur
194a6(mdo sde): bar bya zhes sems skyed do// dge ba'i las lam yongasu dag pa dang // tshul khrims la yang sems can mang 'dzud cing // byang chub sems kyang yang dag 'dzin 'jug pas// 
194a7(mdo sde): yongs gdung med pa'i 'od zer de grub bo// bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // mi bzod sems can gang dag des bskul ba// khro dang thab nga rgyal yongs spangs shing / 
194a8(mdo sde): de dag rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur// sdig ldan rnams kyi nyes byas bzod byas te// byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing // bzod pa'i ston rtag tu bsngags brjod pas/ 
194b1(mdo sde): des na bzod pa bkod pa de grub bo// sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // le lo'i sems can gang dag des bskul pa// rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams
194b2(mdo sde): la sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las
194b3(mdo sde): rab 'das te// byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur// sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug ste// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas// zad pa'i dus na
194b4(mdo sde): dam chos yongs bzung bas// des na sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od thob bo// zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rnam 'khrugs sems can gang dag des bskul pa// de dag cha
194b5(mdo sde): med sdang med rmongs med cing // rtogs par gyur nas ma/ nyam bzhag semasu 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po skyon ldan spyod can dang // 'dre ba yongasu rnam par spang
194b6(mdo sde): byas te// dgon pa rab zhi bsam gtan bsngags brjod pas// des ni zhi bar byed pa'i 'od 'grub bo// shes rab bkod pa 'od zer rab gtong zhing // shes 'chal sems can
194b7(mdo sde): ji snyed des bskul ba// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud 'gyur// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po
194b8(mdo sde): shes pa rtogs par khong chud cing // nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs
195a1(mdo sde): btang ste// byang chub don tu chos gang btsal byas pa// chos de gus par byas nas rab bshad pas// shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer de grub bo// sangs rgyas ldan pa'i
195a2(mdo sde): 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma bsam yas rnams// pad+ma dam pa rnams la bzhugs par mthong // sangs rgyas
195a3(mdo sde): tshe dang sangs rgyas rnam thar dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas brjod byas shing // sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas// des na sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od grub
195a4(mdo sde): bo/ mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 'a gas nyen sems can gang dag des reg pa// 'byung po gza' drang gsang brdeg bcing ba dang // nad 'go 'jigs pa
195a5(mdo sde): kun las thar par 'gyur// mi 'jigs sbyin pas sem/ sa can gang bskyabs dang // srog chags gsod las pa zlog pa byas pa dang // 'jigs pa skyabs tshol rnam
195a6(mdo sde): la skyabs byas pas// mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer des grub po// bde ba kun byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing // nad pa na ba gang dag des reg pa// rnam pa kun tu nad kyi sdug bsngal/ 
195a7(mdo sde): thar// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob// nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang // rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / 
195a8(mdo sde): 'brumar zas nom byed pas de thob bo// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // tshe zang tha mar gang dag des bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong ba
195b1(mdo sde): 'gyur// de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro/ 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te// dga' byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing // 'chi kar sangs rgyas
195b2(mdo sde): skyabasu btang brjod pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer de thob po// chos rab brjod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// chos nyan klog ci
195b3(mdo sde): yi ger 'dri bar byed// de dag rtag tu chos la dga' mos 'gyur// chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de// chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing // 'dun pa bskyed de chos
195b4(mdo sde): la brtson gyis shes// brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob po// sangs rgyas sras rnam yongasu bskul ba'i phyir// da byangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 'jig
195b5(mdo sde): rten gsum na sgra rgyud ji snyed pa// kun kyang de bzhin gshe gas pa'i gsung du thos// gsang bstod sgra yis drang sro nga che bstod de// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don tu sil snyan
195b6(mdo sde): dang / sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la// rab tu bsgrags pas dbyangs ldan 'od grub bo// 'chi med sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul
195b7(mdo sde): byas pa// ngag med spyod pa thams cad rab spas te// ston kun la brtson pa nyam su len// 'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'tsho ba dum pa yong su gang // 'gog pa
195b8(mdo sde): rtag tu bde zhing gi skyid ces// brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo// khyad par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// rgyal ba rnams
196a1(mdo sde): / kyi tshul khrims khyad par dang // ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thos// thub chen rgyal po'i khrims kyi mchog gyur cing // ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab
196a2(mdo sde): mchog gyur ces// byang chub don tu bstod cing bsngags brjod pas// des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo// rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag
196a3(mdo sde): 'od des bskul byas pa// rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas// drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul// skye bo nyon mongs
196a4(mdo sde): rin chen rnams kyis bsdus// rgyal ba rnams la rin chen rab phul bas// rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur// spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 
196a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas// sangs rgyas mo// na tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lha yi
196a6(mdo sde): spos dang byug pa yis// mi yi gtse la mchod pa rab byos te// spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs drang mchod rten dag/ byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo// sna tshogs bkod
196a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang // sil snyan bsgrags shing spos kyis gdugs pa yis// pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog
196a8(mdo sde): bkram// sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing // me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs mchog rnams kyis mchod// des na sna tshogs
196b1(mdo sde): bkod pa grub par gyur// shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed// mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyang byas pas// des na
196b2(mdo sde): shin tu dang byed 'od grub bo// sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun tu gnas// mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyi chus btab pas// sprin
196b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob// lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // gcer bu gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang bgo brgyan 'phreng sna tshogs dag/ 
196b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub bkod pa grub// ro mchogaldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // bkres pa kha zas ro/ mchog thob par 'gyur// zas dang skom dang ro mchog
196b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnams// byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od glu/ ba bo// nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // bul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob// dkon
196b6(mdo sde): mchog gsum la gter bzhi'i mi zad pa// dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob bo// mig rnams skyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // de tshe long ba sna tshogs gzugs rnams
196b7(mdo sde): mthong // rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// mar me phul bas mig skyong 'od zer grub// rna ba rnam skyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par
196b8(mdo sde): 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// sil snyan phul bas rna skyong 'od zer grub// sna rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sngon chad mtshor dri zhim
197a1(mdo sde): tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// spos rab phul bas rna skyong 'od zer grub// lce rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 
197a2(mdo sde): sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod// mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnam spangs te// 'jam par spras pas lce skyong 'od zer grub// lus rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing
197a3(mdo sde): dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus btung byas pas lus rnams sbyong ba thob// sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer
197a4(mdo sde): rab gtong zhing // smos pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na// sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer de grub bo// 
197a5(mdo sde): gzugs rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // mi dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku mthong ste// sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang // mchod rten brgyan byas
197a6(mdo sde): gzugs skyong 'od grub bo// sgra rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes// rkyen las byung bas brag cha 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams bstan pas 'od
197a7(mdo sde): zer de grub bo// dri rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur// spos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub zhing gi
197a8(mdo sde): 'od de yin// ro bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la// ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i
197b1(mdo sde): 'od de yin// reg rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // reg na rtsub pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur// mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char// 'phreng ba 'jam pa pa
197b2(mdo sde): ut+pal 'gyur// bcos bu'i ras mang 'jam zhing reg bde rnams// rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul bting bkram ste// me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam rnams dang // 'phreng ba bla
197b3(mdo sde): re phul ba'i 'od de yin// chos rnams skyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad kyi// spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// byung ba
197b4(mdo sde): thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim// rkyen las byung bas ma skyes ngo bo nyid// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste// chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu gnaso zhes// brjod pas chos rnams
197b5(mdo sde): sbyong ba thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sgo mo de dag la so/ gas pa// drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas// 'o// da zer gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste// kun kyang las
197b6(mdo sde): sbyor tha dad tshul can no// ji ltar de dag spu yi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ba// ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul
197b7(mdo sde): / da pa di spyon da byung ba sa zung ste/  sa phrus su
197b8(mdo sde): de dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la// rje su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang // gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags pas// de dag kun gyis 'od zer de dag shes// gang
198a1(mdo sde): dag bsod nams byas shing dge ba bsags pa dang // gang dag yang yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing // sangs rgyas ston 'dun te don gnyer ba// de dag/ 
198a2(mdo sde): kun la 'od zer de dag skul// dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang // de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char// mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas// kun kyang
198a3(mdo sde): rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun// rab tu 'byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing // mos nyams phal pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste// blo gros
198a4(mdo sde): yangs pa rnams la de dag mod// dper rgyan nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang // bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos// de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi// phongs par
198a5(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams la de dag med// de bzhin skyes/ chen 'od zer de dag mod// de dag yod kyang log par nye/ rten gyur cing // mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong
198a6(mdo sde): ste// blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag med// gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas// dad cing mos la dang ba skyos gyur na// bdag ni yon che rgyur mi 'gyur zhes// de
198a7(mdo sde): dag dogs dang som nyi mi skyed do// de dag g.yog 'khor bkod pa rnam 'phrul pa// ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing // phyogs bcu kun tu do zla med rnams kyi
198a8(mdo sde): zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed// 'od bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs pa// stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas// skyil krung bcas
198b1(mdo sde): pa'i lus kyis kun khyab ston// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o// de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan// 'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlab byas shing // sangs
198b2(mdo sde): rgyas sras kyis thams cad yongasu bskor// de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas// drang srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams// yongasu smin byas sangs rgyas legs
198b3(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa// de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod// gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa// skyes chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin
198b4(mdo sde): te/ rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas// skar ma'i tshogs kyi zla ba bskor ba bzhin// de dag ji ltar/ daphyogs cig rab 'jug cing // zham ring sangs rgyas sras
198b5(mdo sde): rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu ston// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o// de dang ga phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i// ting 'dzin dam pa
198b6(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub byed cing // kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig ldang bar yang // phyogs bcu kun tu rang gi lus ston to// de dag shar gyi phyogasu mnyam bzhag cing // nub kyi phyogs nas
198b7(mdo sde): dpa' bo rnam par ldang // nub kyi phyogasu mnyam par gyur cing // bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang // de bzhin phyogs bcu rnamasu rab tu 'jug/ gzhan gyi phyogasu mnyam par
198b8(mdo sde): bzhag gyur la// ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa// grangs med ma lus
199a1(mdo sde): // dgan rang byung ba// de dag spyad sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa snang // phyogs der mnyam par gnag pa bstan byas nas// dpa
199a2(mdo sde): nub kyi zhing rnams ma lus par// rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang // nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa// grangs med
199a3(mdo sde): ma lus dag na bzhugs sangs rgyas// de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin la gnas par snang // phyogs der mnyam par bzhag par bstan byas nas// 
199a4(mdo sde): dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par// rnam par ldang de zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed/ dpar snang // de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing
199a5(mdo sde): rnamasu// phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu bstan pa 'jug/ kha cig mnyam bzhag kha cog langs gyur cing // 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang // de dag mig
199a6(mdo sde): gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // gzugs kyi lam las bdag nyid chen po ldang // gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na// de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur// 
199a7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de
199a8(mdo sde): dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam gzhag cing // sgra'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// sgra dang skad rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// sgra
199b1(mdo sde): yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag sna yi/ 
199b2(mdo sde): ma la mnyam bzhag cing // dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmong 'gyur ba// dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs// dri yi lam
199b3(mdo sde): la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag lce yi lam
199b4(mdo sde): la mnyam bzhag cing // ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ra ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// bang gra nyid chen po ro mchog rnams dang ldan// ro
199b5(mdo sde): mchog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // lce ni ma skye sa ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par
199b6(mdo sde): ldang / de dag lus kyi lam laM mnyam bzhag cing // reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// 'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i
199b7(mdo sde): reg la zhugs// reg pa'i lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // lus kyi lam nas dran ldan
199b8(mdo sde): rnam par ldang // de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // chos kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// chos la gnas
200a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jug pa rab tu thugs// chos lam rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // sems ni ma skyes mthung rang bzhin te// tong pa byed pa med par ra
200a2(mdo sde): cing sems kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing // lang tso shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang // yang rtso shugs gnas
200a3(mdo sde): rnams la mnyam gzhag cing // nas shing 'khogs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang // rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing // dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma'i lus las
200a4(mdo sde): ldang // dge bsnyen dang ma'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing // dad dpa'i dge bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang // dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus la mnyam gzhag cing // dge
200a5(mdo sde): slong ma'i lus las rnam par ldang // dge slong ma'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus/ las ldang // dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam
200a6(mdo sde): bzhag cing // slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang // slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam bzhag cing // rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang // rkyen gyi sangs rgyas
200a7(mdo sde): lus la mnyam bzhag cing // sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldang // sangs rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam bzhag cing // lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par
200a8(mdo sde): ldang / lha yi lus gzugs la ni mnyam bzhag cing // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu yi lus las ldang // rdzu 'phrul che klu'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing // 'phrul chen gnod
200b1(mdo sde): sbyin lus las rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam bzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyi lus las rnam par ldang // 'byung po kun gyi lus la mnyam ban
200b2(mdo sde): tsong na spu yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang // spu sgo gcig la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // spu sgo thams cad nas ni rnam par ldang // sku sgo kun la mnyam par bzhag byed
200b3(mdo sde): cing na skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang // skra rtse gcig gis khyon la mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse kun gyi khyon las rnam par ldang // skra rtse kun gyi khyon la mnyam bzhag
200b4(mdo sde): cing / phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang // rdul gcig la ni mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // ma lus rdul rnams kun lus rnam par ldang // rdul rnams ma lus kun
200b5(mdo sde): la mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang // rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam gzhag cing / nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam par ldang // 
200b6(mdo sde): shing rtog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang // rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mtsho'i chu'i chu klung rnams las/ 
200b7(mdo sde): ldang na rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid chen po me'i lam las ldang // me'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // rlung gi lam las dran ldan rnam
200b8(mdo sde): bar ldang // rlung gi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // bdag nyid chen po sa yi gzhi las ldang // sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // lha klu gzhal med kha
201a1(mdo sde): las rnam par ldang // lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam bzhag cing // dran ldan de dag mkha' las rnam par ldang // ston bsam yas bsags pa de dag
201a2(mdo sde): gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su// bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod// 'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi
201a3(mdo sde): khyab ste// rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni// klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang // bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpe
201a4(mdo sde): bstan brjod par bya// de dag 'dra ba'i dpe lta cang med de/ mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis// bstan na myur du don rnams shes par 'gyur// rnam thar brgyad
201a5(mdo sde): kyi dbang la gnas pa yi// nyan thos gcig tu gyur nas ma nga por 'gyur// mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig gyur te/ mkha' la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar
201a6(mdo sde): byed// slad nas me 'bar stong nas chu yi rgyun// stong nas me 'bar smad nas chu yi rgyun// 'gro dang 'greng dang 'dug pa dang // lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab// 
201a7(mdo sde): de ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing // byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yang 'dor yang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na// 'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed// 
201a8(mdo sde): zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dod cing // phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dong dag dang // mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snod dang rin chen dang // rgya mtsho nu klung rnamasu gzugs brnyan ston// 
201b1(mdo sde): / de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun tu ston// ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas// de la de bzhin gshegs par
201b2(mdo sde): byung dbang // dang ba'i mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag/ de dag so so rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong // ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang // go gyon bzhon dang theg
201b3(mdo sde): par bcas su mthong // gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang // de dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong // 'on kyang tshul byams sdang rnam rtog med// drang srong ting 'dzin
201b4(mdo sde): rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra snyan zhes bya ba// sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyed rnams kyi// sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te// rang gi skad kyis
201b5(mdo sde): skad kun tshim par byed// sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug ca na de yang // skad rnams kun gyi sgra yi tshul mkhas na// gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob
201b6(mdo sde): rnams// lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu mi byed// tum bu ru'i chung ma dbyangs ldan ma// tshangs pa'i bu mo yid la byung ba de// bden dang dam bcas mi tshe dga' rnams kyi// 
201b7(mdo sde): sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste// dbyangs ldan tshogs bcas zhe sdang can de yang // brtul zhugs grub 'thun dbyangs kyi yan lag gis// de yid skad kyis 'jig rten/ 
201b8(mdo sde): mgu byed na// ye shes ston phyug rnams cis mi byed// rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni// sna tshogs gzugs mang mthara' yas ston pa byed// nyin mtshan yung
202a1(mdo sde): dang zla ba lo brgya dang // khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston// 'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/ 
202a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan mngon shes rnam thar rab bslabs pa// spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu mi byed// lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe// rgyal ldan lha yis lha min pham
202a3(mdo sde): byas na// de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas bzhon bcas shing // theg bcas dmag bcas go gyon bzhin du 'byer// 'dod chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang ka lus kyi
202a4(mdo sde): rnam 'phrul bas ma las ston byed na// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' bo rnams// lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed// rdo rje 'chang ba'i glang pos srung ba/ 
202a5(mdo sde): dpa' bo'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de// ma go bo sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul cing // mgo rnams ku/ na la'ang mche ba drug drug ste// mche ba de dag so so re re la
202a6(mdo sde): 'ang / rdzing bu chus gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed// rdzing de la'ang pad+ma sna tshogs pa// rnam par bko ba bdun bdun sprul pa byed// pad+ma de la'ang lha yi bu mo dag/ sgyu rtsal kun shes/ 
202a7(mdo sde): bdun bdun sprul pa byed// de dag rtsed mo gru gar tshul la mkhas// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse// glang po de yang lus ni bsgyur byas te// lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing / 
202a8(mdo sde): 'dre bar byed// spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun yang 'thun// glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul de ltar snang // glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang // 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrug
202b1(mdo sde): rab tu ston byed na// shes rab thabs kyi stobs la sbyangs pa rnams// ting 'dzin brgya yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed// sgra can ji ltar brjod bzhin lus 'phrul te// rdo rje'i
202b2(mdo sde): gzhi la rkang pa 'jog byed cing // rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du ston// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom// sgra gcan chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang // 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul
202b3(mdo sde): rab tu ston byed na// 'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams rab 'joms pa// rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rab ston mi byed// brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas rab snang ste// lha dang lha
202b4(mdo sde): min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe// lha min bye ba Sha phyes pa ji snyed pa// de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus las sprul / da lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis// brgya byin rang gi/ 
202b5(mdo sde): mdun na 'dug par shes// de ni rdo rje 'chang bas/ bzung ngo zhes// lha min dbang po kun yang mgo myos gyur/ 'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te// rdo rje me
202b6(mdo sde): lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing // lus la go bgos gzi brjid bsnyen dka' ba'i// brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer// de yang bsod nams phal pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ 
202b7(mdo sde): lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur pa// bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul// lha la srul ma 'debs pa lha yi rnga// lha las/ 
202b8(mdo sde): rnam par smin pas grub gyur pa// lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas// rnga de na mkha' yas ni sgra sgrog ste// 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min// tha shal mi
203a1(mdo sde): brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs shing 'dra// srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin dang mtshungs// bag med thams cad dgra bcas mya ngan can/ 
203a2(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi'i lam ma yin// ji snyed su dag bag med gnas gyur pa// de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin// sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad
203a3(mdo sde): yin// skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis smad// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis yul la rmongs// chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis shes skul// rnga des skul nas brgya
203a4(mdo sde): byin lha rnams dang // lha yi mdun sa chos bzang 'dug gnas su// gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bral 'thun pa// chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la rjod// rnga de gzugs
203a5(mdo sde): med bstan tu mi rung yang // de ltar rnga smras rdo/ rkyen chen rab byed na// bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs ni yong/ ston rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis mi byed// lha dang
203a6(mdo sde): lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe// lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyi// lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i rnga'i sgra// lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te// rnga
203a7(mdo sde): yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing // skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par gyur// lha min dbang po skrag pas nyen pa rnams// 'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod
203a8(mdo sde): la 'byer// de ltar sgra skad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba// 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen po// nyon mongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams// zhi ba'i sgra sgrags nyon mongs
203b1(mdo sde): sel bar byed// dbang po'i lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis// dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes// gcig ltar lha mo
203b2(mdo sde): kun kyang de bzhin no// lha mo kun dang dga' bar snang ba yang // chos bzangs 'dun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug/ lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing // brgya byin skad cig
203b3(mdo sde): gcig la rnam par 'phrul// brgya byin chag sdang gti mug ldan pa yang // sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na// 'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir// rdzu 'phrul
203b4(mdo sde): stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed// bdud kyi/ dkrugs mi 'gro ba'i dbang sgru ba// de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong // las dang nyon mongs kun tu zhugs pa yis// 
203b5(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings// chags sdang gti mug ldan pa'i bdud de yang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur byed na// dbang bcu dbang thob
203b6(mdo sde): rnams lta ci smos te// 'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog/ stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang // stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na// de dag kun
203b7(mdo sde): na 'dug par rab snang zhing // tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ongs sgrogs// tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi// bsam gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul
203b8(mdo sde): byed na// 'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yis// bsam gtan rnam par gnas pa cis mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul stos// rgya mtsho'i sprid kyis
204a1(mdo sde): char tshogs rab bkye ba// skad cig gcig la thams cad 'grang ba byed// thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na// bslab pa bskal pa bsam yas rab bsrab
204a2(mdo sde): te/ byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams// ci phyir skad cig gcig la sems kyis ni// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems mi shes// sems can las smin bsam gyis mi
204a3(mdo sde): khyab pas// 'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongasu byung // rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med khang // rin chen rnam phye sa bon bkram pa'ang byung // rlung las sprin byung char pa'ang
204a4(mdo sde): kun tu 'bab// rlung gis sprin kyang rab tu zhi bar byed// 'ji ga rten lo tog 'phel ba'ang rlung byed de// rlung ni 'gro ba kun la phan pa skyed// rlung de pha rol phyin la ma
204a5(mdo sde): brlabs shing // sangs rgyas yon rnams la ma bslabs kyang // 'jig rten rnam smin bsam yas ston byed na//  ma pa thob nas ci phyir ston mi byed// rgya mtsho'i
204a6(mdo sde): 'brug smra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni// bya skad ri dwags skad dang skyes pa dang // bud med bu mo khye'u skang ci snyed pa// kun gyi sgra snyan sems can rnams la sgrog/ de ltar sgra bskam
204a7(mdo sde): rang bzhin med shes nas// sgrib pa med pa'i stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba kun la sgra bstan brjod byas nas// yid 'ong sgra yi 'jig rten mgu bar byed// rgya mtsho 'di
204a8(mdo sde): la ngo mtshar rmad kyis chos// 'gro kun rgya dang mtshungs pas rgya mtsho ste// chu dang 'byung po rin chen yong mi zad// chu rnams bzung bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med// de bzhin de/ 
204b1(mdo sde): dag 'gro kun rgya 'dra ste// bsod nams bsam gtan rnam par thar rnams dang // shes rab ye shes yon tan kun mi zad// bsod nams yon tan sogs pas ngoms pa/ 
204b2(mdo sde): med// rgya mtsho klu ni rnam par rtse ba na// sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas 'gengs te// de dag kun kyang sna tshogs bkod pa mang
204b3(mdo sde): de ni dbang sgyur gnasu 'dzam gling gi/ gser gyi mdog gi sprin rnams rnam par sgrug/ 'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu// dga' ldan gnasu kha ba ba mo'i mdog/ 
204b4(mdo sde): 'thab bral gan su mthon ting bre DUR+Ya// sum cu gsum du/ rdo'i snying po 'dra// skyong ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bya// rgya mtshor rdo rje mi phyed 'khregs 'dra ba// mi tsi
204b5(mdo sde): gnas su spos mchog 'khrigs lta bu// klu'i gnas paN+Di/ mdog 'dra ba// gsang ba'i gnasu ngang pa'i byi gar mdog/ lha min gnesu ri brag mdog 'dra ba// byang du
204b6(mdo sde): gser gyi 'od zer mdog ston te// gling rnams gzhan du sna tshogs bkod pa ston// 'dzam bu'i gling du ri sngon 'dra ba ste// gang na ci mtho sprin rnams de bzhin no// dbang sgyur
204b7(mdo sde): gnas su gser sprin des bstan nas// nyi ma'i mdog 'dra klog kyang rab tu 'gyed// 'phrul dga'i gnasu zla 'od bzang 'dra dang // dga' ldan gnasu 'dzam bu'i gser mdog
204b8(mdo sde): 'dra/ 'thab bral gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog/ sum cu gsum du gser gyi 'od zer 'dra// skyong ba'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ rgya mtshor mu tig dmar po'i
205a1(mdo sde): mdog 'dra bkod// mi ci gnasu mthon ting bai DUR+Yakaklu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ gsang ba'i gnas shel gyi mdog 'dra ga/ lha min gnasu rdo/ 
205a2(mdo sde): yi snying po 'dra// byang du nor bu skar mdog kha dog 'dra// gling gzhan rnams na'ang bkod pa gzhan dang gzhan// 'dzam bu'i gling du zla ba'i nor bu 'bar// sprin gyi mtshan nyid
205a3(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i glog kyang 'gyed// de ni dbang sgyur gnasu tshangs sgra sgrogs// 'phrul dga'i gnas rnga sgra sgrog par byed// dga' ldan gnas sil snyan rol mo'i sgra// 'thab bral
205a4(mdo sde): gnas su lha'i bu mo'i sgra// sum cu gsum du mi ci mang po'i skad// skyong ba'i gnasu dri za'i skad du ste// rgya mtshor rita thab sgra skad 'dra ba'o// mi ci gnasu gling bu/ 
205a5(mdo sde): kun la sgra// klu yi gan su ka la ling ka'i sgra// gsang ba'i/ gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra// lha min gnasu lha yi rdza 'i sgra// mi yi gnasu rgya mtsho gling bu'i sgra// de/ 
205a6(mdo sde): ni dbang sgyur gnasu lha spos zhim// me tog sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'char yang 'bebs// 'phrul dga' zla ba zla bzangs 'dra ba yi// me tog man dar 'phreng dang byug pa
205a7(mdo sde): 'bebs// dga' ldan gan su nor bu chen po mdog/ rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang // gtsug gi nor bu zla ba 'dra ba dang // gser mdog 'dra ba'i dar la'i char yang
205a8(mdo sde): 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan sna tshogs dang // 'phreng ba rnams dang rgyan dang byug pa dang // mu tig dmar dang ser dang dar la dang // sil snyan yid 'ong
205b1(mdo sde): 'thab bral gnas su 'bebs// sum cu gsum du yid bzhin nor bu mchog/ skyong ba'i gnas su tsan dan snying po'i mchog/ gur kum sil ma lha shing ta ma la// spos chu'i/ 
205b2(mdo sde): rgyan dang me tog rab tu 'bebs// skyong ba'i gnas klu yi dbang po de// nyams stobs skye ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams// kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang // de min rin chen
205b3(mdo sde): bsam yas char yang 'bebs// de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun tu yang // char rgyun mi 'chad gnya' shing tsam dag dang // rnam rgyal chen po mdzod rnams mi zad pa ka rin
205b4(mdo sde): chen bkod pa mtha' yas char yang 'bebs// mi ci gnas su rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs dang // pad+ma ud pa la ras dang rin chen dang // me tog par sha ma li phye ma spos// 
205b5(mdo sde): bi wang gling bu sgra snyan rdza rnga 'bebs// klu yi gnas su mu/ tig dmar po ste// gsang bar nor bu rin chen skar mdo/ ga 'dra/ ka/ lha min gnasu ral gri mda' chen
205b6(mdo sde): dang / dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char pa 'bebs// byang du de ni rgyan 'phreng rin chen dang // me tog par sha ma li'i tsam pa'i 'phreng // ku ran gtsang dang a ti mug ta
205b7(mdo sde): 'bebs// gling gzhan rnams na'ang sna tshogs char pa 'bebs// 'dzam+bu'i gling du chugasal dang ba yi// char rnams chos bzhin phra ba'i rgyun tu 'bebs// me tog 'bras bu
205b8(mdo sde): sman dang spos dang shing // lo tog bde byed 'jig rten rnamasu skyed// de ltar sprin bkod bsam gyis mi khyab dang // glog 'byin 'brug sgrog bkod pa'i char 'bebs kyang
206a1(mdo sde): gnas nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med// klu yi rnam 'phrul de ltar bsam mi khyab// rgya mtsho'i chun gnas pa de ltar yang // klu yi rnam 'phrul bas ma las
206a2(mdo sde): ston byed na// chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan phyug/ rnam 'phrul mtha' yas ci phyir ston mi byed// bag tsam smos pa'i dpe tshul 'di dag gis// skyes chen de dag rnams
206a3(mdo sde): kyi brjod bya byas// dpa' bo de dag dpe rnams kun dang bral// de dag 'di 'dra'i rnam thar dbang sgyur ro// blo gros dam pa blo gros rgya chen ldan// ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros
206a4(mdo sde): can/ ye shes mtsho ldan khyad par blo can gyi// rnam thar mchog rnams 'di lta rnams kyis spyad// rnam thar dam pa 'di dag sus thos nas// yid ces 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog
206a5(mdo sde): byed pa// de dag ngo mtshar rmad byung chos ldan te// de dag da ka' byed mi yi 'jig rten na// 'di 'dra chos 'dir gang da/ ga dad gyur pa// sems can so so'i skye bo'i
206a6(mdo sde): tshogs na dkon// gang dag dge bsags bsod nams bya sa gyur pa// de dag rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la dang // gang dag nyan thos theg pa'ang yid ches pa'i// mi dag mi yi
206a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams na nyung // de bas rkyen gyi theg par rab tu nyung // theg pa chen por de dag de bas nyung / theg pa che la zhugs pa de dkon te// gang dag chos 'dir dad pa'ang rab
206a8(mdo sde): dkon na// 'jug cing 'dzin pa smos kyang ci dgos te// gang dag de bzhin sgrub pa smos ci dgos// gang dag stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// phyi ma'i bskal par mgo bos
206b1(mdo sde): 'deg byed kyang // chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba// de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin// la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can la// bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen
206b2(mdo sde): bkur yang // chos 'di dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med// la la zhing bcu ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// lag pa'i mthil du bskal par
206b3(mdo sde): mkhar 'dzin kyang // chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba// de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la// bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen
206b4(mdo sde): bkur kyang // chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ tebasod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med// la las zhing / bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams / bde ba kun
206b5(mdo sde): gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur bas// gang gis chos kyi le'u 'di bzung byas pa// bsod nams de ni de bas khyad par 'phags rnam thar de dag rab tu bstan pa'i tshe// phyogs
206b6(mdo sde): bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur// bdud kyi gnas rnams mog mog byas gyur cing // sgra rab phyung bas ngan song rab tu zhi// phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge
206b7(mdo sde): rnams// de dag kun gyis mngon par zhal bstun te// phyag brkyang mdzad nas yon tan mtha' yas pa// bzang po dpal gyi mgo la gzhag par gyur// phyag gi mthil gyis
206b8(mdo sde): mgo la byug mdzad de// rnam thar 'di dag legs par bshad pa legs// khyod kyis legs bstan rje su nged dgyes zhes// sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsung brjod do// 
207a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bka' stsal nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
207a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag 'khod pa'i lha thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di lags par bka' stsal
207a3(mdo sde): to/ kye ma de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa 'di mdzad do// chos bstan pa 'di sngon ma thos so// sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam
207a4(mdo sde): grangs 'di snyed par 'gyur ba de dag ni shin tu dkon te/ sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yi no// sems can de dag ni sangs
207a5(mdo sde): rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// sems can de dag ni lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la mchod rten lta
207a6(mdo sde): bur 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ rab tu byung ba rnams sam/ khyim na gnas pa rnams sam/ de bzhin du rgyal po rnams sam/ blon po
207a7(mdo sde): chen po rnams sam/ khyim bdag rnams kyis gtse bar mi nus so zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces
207a8(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde dkon mchog 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba lags te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos 'di
207b1(mdo sde): lta bu dag 'jig rten du byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu nyid kyis sems can de dag gis kyang thos lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas/ 
207b2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan
207b3(mdo sde): ba kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/ slan
207b4(mdo sde): tshad mi bskyud par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'
207b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur rgyu ra ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / 
207b6(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ @/ 
207b7(mdo sde): ba sangs rgyas phal po che las/ dkon mchog tA la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / bu chen/ 
207b8(mdo sde): gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kar mra a ba ra Na bi shud d+hi nA ma ma hA yA sU tra bong
208a1(mdo sde): skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
208a2(mdo sde): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
208a3(mdo sde): po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri nyis stong la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga rgyal rnam
208a4(mdo sde): par 'joms dang / 'od kyis rnam par rtse rab mngon par shes pa dang / me tog pad+ma lta bu dang 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyal po dang / rtag tu don ltar bris pa'i
208a5(mdo sde): lus can dang / som nyi thams cad mgu byed dang / rin chen bkod pa'i rgya mtsho blo gros dang / me tog sna tsho gas gnas dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po
208a6(mdo sde): dang / 'od zer rgyal po'i sgron ma dang / dpal gyi snying po gser 'od dang / dbang po dang yul thams cad rab tu 'dul ba dang / sgra dbyangs mngon par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang / 
208a7(mdo sde): gzi brjid yid 'ong kun bsdus dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208a8(mdo sde): chen po sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas de'i tshe dge slong dri med 'od ces bya ba yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ste/ mthar chags
208b1(mdo sde): su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ khyim gyi rgyus mi shes pas slad 'tshong ma'i khyim zhig tu song ngo // dge slong de smang 'tshong ma'i khyim gyi nang du song ma thag tu/ smad 'tshong ma des
208b2(mdo sde): bdag dge slong 'di dang mi nyal du mi gtang ngo // gal te ma grub na ni bdag 'chi bar 'gyuraro// snyam du de la 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed de/ des dge slong nang du 'ongs ma
208b3(mdo sde): thag tu sgo bcad nas/ dge slong de la 'di skad ces smraso// bdag dang lhan cig mi nyal du mi rung ngo // gal te ma nyal na ni kho mo 'chi bar 'gyu ro zhes smra so// de nas dge slong
208b4(mdo sde): dri med 'od kyis smad 'tshong ma de la 'di skad ces smraso// sru mo kho bos ni sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa chen po bcas pa la bslab dgos te/ 'khrig pa'i chos byed mi phod kyis
208b5(mdo sde): thong shig/ kho bo ni shi yang bla'i 'khrig pa'i chos ni mi byed do zhes byas so// de nas smad 'tshong ma de nyid 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gsang sngags dang / 
208b6(mdo sde): sman gang gis dge slong 'di 'dug nas/ gdon mi za bar bdag dang lhan cig tu dga' ba nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags dang sman dag dge slong 'di la sbyin gor ma
208b7(mdo sde): chag go snyam mo// de nas des dge slong de la smras pa/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa bzhig pa 'am nyams par ni bgyi bar mi 'tshal gyis/ thugs rtse
208b8(mdo sde): ba'i slad du bsod snyoms bzhes shig ces byas nas de nang du song ste/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags stobs bskyed pa dag gis zas de la bsngags nas/ dge slong de'i
209a1(mdo sde): lhung bzed gyi nang du blug so// zas blugs ma thag tu/ dge slong de de'i mod la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes te/ de kun tu rtog cing shas cher gdung ba/ 
209a2(mdo sde): skyed do// de nas smad 'tshong ma des dge slong de'i bzhin gyi mdog gyur par mthong nas/ lag pa g.yas pas dge slong de bzung ste/ mal du khrid nas de dang lhan cig tu nyal po
209a3(mdo sde): byed do// de nas dge slong de smad 'tshong ma de dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i rtsed mo de nyam su myong nas/ bsod snyoms de blangs te/ gtsug lag khang du song nas/ kye ma bdag ni tshul
209a4(mdo sde): khrims kyi phung po chen po las nyams par gyur gyis/ bdag tshul khrims nyams pas dad pas byin pa longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin te/ bdag ni sems can dmyal ba chen por
209a5(mdo sde): ltung bar 'gyur snyam nas/ de dge slong grogs po rnams/ kyi thad du 'ongs nas/ bdag ni tshul khrims 'chal par gyur/ te/ dge slong ma yin par gyur pas/ bdag ni
209a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes smraso// dge slong grogs po de dag gis de la 'di skad ces smraso// khyod ci'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal par gyur/ des kyang de dag la ji
209a7(mdo sde): ltar gyur pa bzhin du bsnyad do// de nas dge slong grogs po de dag gis dge slong dri med 'od de la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa dri med 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems
209a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa zhes bya ba/ nyes pa thams cad las 'byin pa la mkhas pa/ sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la mkhas pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
209b1(mdo sde): ba thob pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bstod cing bsngags la snyan par brjod pa yod kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog/ 'ob bu cag 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa ga la ba der
209b2(mdo sde): 'dong ngo // des ni khyod kyi 'gyod du bsul nus so// de nas dge slong dri med 'od de/ zas de ma zos par dge slong grogs po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa / 
209b3(mdo sde): la der dong ste/ lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu mngon du yang dag par mgu ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs
209b4(mdo sde): byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la ji ltar gyur pa dade bsnyad do// de skad smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur ra bas/ dge slong dri med 'od de la 'di skad ces
209b5(mdo sde): smraso// dge slong khyod zas 'di ji zo shig dang / zas zos zin pa'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa'i don
209b6(mdo sde): bzhin du gzung bar bya'o// de nas dge slong dri med 'od dang / dge slong de dag zan zos pa'i 'og tu/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
209b7(mdo sde): der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas
209b8(mdo sde): dge slong dri med 'ong ngon te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ma nu'o//  nas 'jam dpal gzhodur gyur pa stan las langs te/ thogs phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ dus mo// 
210a1(mdo sde): // g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar gyur pa de thams cad gsol to// des
210a2(mdo sde): ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dri 'od de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong khyod kyis de lta bu byas pa bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags
210a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod kyis ci bdag gis 'dod chags spyad do snyam du snga nas bsams sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// 
210a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'dod chags yid la byed pa ma skyes par khyod kyis 'dod chags ji ltar spyad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi
210a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi sems ni slad kyis skyes la gso/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong sems des khyod kyi 'dod chags spyad dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lag so// 
210a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ci sems kun nas nyon mongs pas sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs can du 'gyur la/ sems rnam par dag pas rnam par
210a7(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur zhes ngas chos ma bstan tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci khyod
210a8(mdo sde): kyis gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na/ kun tu rtog pa'i tshe 'dod chags spyad pa myong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
210b1(mdo sde): slong sems kyis 'dod chags spyad pa khyod kyis mi shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ci khyod kyis
210b2(mdo sde): rmi lam gyi sems dang / gnyid ma log pa'i sems 'di la bye brag dang tha dad du dbye ba zhig yod par mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rmi lam gyi
210b3(mdo sde): sems sam/ gnyid log pa'i sems la tha dad du bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di snyam du sems/ chos thams
210b4(mdo sde): cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o zhes ngas ma bstan tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems
210b5(mdo sde): ci rmi lam de yang dag pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci
210b6(mdo sde): rmi lam gyi sems gang yin pa dang / gnyid ma log pa'i sems gang yin pa 'di gnyis med pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lag so// bde
210b7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci med pa de gzhig na yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
210b8(mdo sde): 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci med pa gang yin pa de la skye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
211a1(mdo sde): 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci skye ba med pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas/ 
211a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa can nam/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ji snyam
211a3(mdo sde): du sems/ ci skye ba med pa'i chos rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ 
211a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa nyid kyang ma mchis pa lags na/ ngan 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
211a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni de ltar 'od gsal ba yin na/ byis pa// so so'i skye bo rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rna// mas la brtags/ phyin ci log la brtags// 
211a6(mdo sde): gsob dang / gsog lta bu'i chos thams cad la brtags pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dge slong
211a7(mdo sde): gzhan yang chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/ rnam par bsgrub nas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do// dge slong chos thams cad ni sbyar ba ste/ 'dod chags dang / 
211a8(mdo sde): rdzang dang / gti mug rnams kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag gis kun nas bskyed pa yino// dge slong chos thams cad ni brtags pa ste/ phyin ci log las byung ba yin no// 
211b1(mdo sde): / dge slong chos thams cad ni med pa ste/ smig rgyu lta bu'i ngo bo nyid yin no// dge slong chos thams cad ni ya ma bla ste na mkha' dang 'dra ba'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni dngos po dang
211b2(mdo sde): bral ba'i phyir dngos po med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni na mkha' ltar zab pa'i phyir zab pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o// 
211b3(mdo sde): dge slong chos thams cad ni shin tu dben pa'i phyir/ mi gnas pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni yul thams cad gsog yin pa'i phyir mi rten pa'o// dge slong chos thad
211b4(mdo sde): ni shin tu gsog yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ kun nas dkris pa med pa'o// dge slong chos
211b5(mdo sde): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir yongasu gdung ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni dben pa'i phyir slob pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni
211b6(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis sdang ba med pa'i phyir zhe sdang med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir gti mug med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad
211b7(mdo sde): ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par smin pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni log par snang ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu
211b8(mdo sde): brtags pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mang bzhin du sgro btags pa'i phyir rnam par spongs par byed pa'o// dge
212a1(mdo sde): slong chos thams cad ni rkyen phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni lam chad pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad
212a2(mdo sde): ni nyon mongs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar yongasu dag pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad
212a3(mdo sde): ni ci las kyang dben pa'i phyir ci yang ma yin no// dge slong chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa'i phyir dul ba'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
212a4(mdo sde): mtha' dang / dbus yongasu spyad pa'i phyir mi bden pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni gcig la gcig rgyur 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir grol ba'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni rtswa
212a5(mdo sde): dang / shing dang / sdig pa dang / bong ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir bems po yin no// dge slong chos thams cad ni na/ kha' dang tshul 'dra ba'i phyir ngo bo med pa'o// dge slong chos
212a6(mdo sde): thams cad ni chags pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lus dang chang ba stong pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir gzung du med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad
212a7(mdo sde): ni ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongasu btsal ba'i phyir thob pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni dus gsum yongasu dag pa'i phyir dus med pa'o// dge slong chos thang
212a8(mdo sde): ni mun par chags pa med pa'i phyir sbyor ba med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni sgrib pa las dben pa'i phyir zugs rngu med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni mya ngan las
212b1(mdo sde): 'das pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir bde ba'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni tshu rol mi dmigs
212b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir pha rol ma yino// dge slong chos thams cad ni grangasu bgrang ba med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni mtshan ma gsob yin pa'i phyir mtshan
212b3(mdo sde): ma med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i phyir smon pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni 'du shes brdzun pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon par 'du
212b4(mdo sde): byed pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni gnas dang bral ba'i phyir gnas med
212b5(mdo sde): pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni rtag tu da ba'i phyir rnyog pa med pa'o// dge slong chos thams cad ni skye/ ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba gsob yin pa dang / skye ba
212b6(mdo sde): gsog yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa yin pa dang / skye ba zhi ba yin pa'i phyir yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'o// dge slong de'i phyir chos 'di dag ni ji skad bstan pa de kho na
212b7(mdo sde): bzhin te/ dge slong nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pas ni/ chos gang gi skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ sgrib pa 'am/ kun
212b8(mdo sde): nas dkris pa 'am/ 'gyod pa 'am/ yid la gcags pa'i chos rdul tsam yang mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong chos thams cad ni rtag tu kun nas nyon mongs pa
213a1(mdo sde): can ma yin pas rang bzhin gyis yong su dag pa'i phyiraro// de nas dge slong dri med 'od kyis chos kyi rang bzhin 'di thos tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu
213a2(mdo sde): dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ sgrib pa med par shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
213a3(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ kye ma kye ma sangs rgyas mthu che ba// lhar bcas 'jig rten skyabs ni khyod lags te// ma bslabs bzhin du yon tan kun gyis 'phags// sdug
213a4(mdo sde): bsngal kun 'grel khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs khyod mdzod// 'dren pa ma mchis pa rnams kyi 'dren khyen mdzod// zhir gyur bde ba'i lam la gar+b+ha
213a5(mdo sde): pa po// sangs rgyas mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni 'jig rten long ba'i sgron ma lags// mig ma mchis pa rnams la mig stsol khyod// sems can ma
213a6(mdo sde): sbrel rab tu sgrol mdzad khyod// dpa' bo mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// chags dang sdang la khyod ni chags mi mnga'// sred la chags rnams sdug bsngal 'grel pa khyod// 'khor
213a7(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor bar mi bden thugasu chud// ye shes stobs 'phags khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rtog dang rnam rtog rnams kyis rtag mi chags// ye shes bsam mi khyab pas grol ba po
213a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum mchog dri med nyon mongs grol// dri med dag pa'i sems can khyod phyag 'tshal// byang chub la ni bdag kyang zhugs bgyis la// sems can sdug bsngal
213b1(mdo sde): skyabs ma mchis rnam dgrol// 'di 'dra'i ye shes bdag gis thob gyur cing // theg pa dman pas zag pa bsam 'gyur// brgal ba bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas kyis/ 
213b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bas bgyi byang chub yong mi spong // skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na dgung zla ltar// 'jig rten mgon po bdag gis de 'drar mthong // ji ltar bsam pa dman pa'i mi
213b3(mdo sde): 'ga' zhig/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du phyin gyur kyang // rin chen mang po mi len spong bgyid cing // mching bu'i nor bu grangs nas mchi bar bgyid// de bzhin gang dag sangs
213b4(mdo sde): rgyas rnam 'phrul stobs// thos kyang 'dir ni byang chub sems mi skyed// byang chub spangs nas nyan thos 'tshal ba gang // de dag ye shes yangs la 'jug mi 'gyur// 
213b5(mdo sde): 'di ni mi zhig byis pa'i rang bzhin can// rgyal po 'ab ngas kyis bskor ba mthong gyur kyang // de ni blon po'i thabs la sems bskyed na// de yi shes pa yangs par
213b6(mdo sde): mi 'jug ltar// de ltar sangs rgyas ston che nyid dang // ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa thos gyur kyang // shes pa dman pa la ni 'dun skyed pa// de ni le lo can te sems kyang zhum/ 
213b7(mdo sde): theg pa dman pas 'jig rten ma chags pa// mtshan mo srin bu me khyer snang ba 'dra// nyi ma'i gzi brjid kyis ni las bgyid pa// snang ba thob nas mun dang bral bar 'gyur// sangs
213b8(mdo sde): rgyas smras ni bzang 'gror mchi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na sangs rgyas sgron mo'i mchog/ lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di ni sdang bar mdzad// wa yi khrod na seng ge mthong
214a1(mdo sde): // gyur na/ wa yi skad la 'dun pa skyed pa dang // seng ge'i rnam par 'phrul pa spong bgyid cing // wa yi chos kyis dga' ba skyed pa ltar// de bzhin gang dag nyan thos
214a2(mdo sde): khrod dag tu// skyes bu khyu mchog seng ge rnam 'phrul mthong // theg pa dman la dga' ba skyed pa ni// de dag phyogs gcig pa yi rdzu 'phrul lags// ye shes 'tshal ba'i mis ni
214a3(mdo sde): dus kun tu// 'jig rten don tu sdug bsngal mang 'grel pa// nyan thos mang po'i sa min gang lags pa'i// ye shes dam pa mchog ni btsal bar bgyi// de nas dge slong dri med
214a4(mdo sde): 'od kyi tshig su bcad pa spobs pa smras pa 'di thos nas/ lha'i bu ba ni khri nyi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag gis
214a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa dang / dge slong dri med 'od la me tog man dAr dag gis gtor to// tshig 'di skad ces smra so// dge slong leg so le
214a6(mdo sde): so// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjesu 'dzin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa bzo ba nyid yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di
214a7(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid de/ nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar
214a8(mdo sde): po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu kha du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med
214b1(mdo sde): ba dag 'od kyi khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mog mog por byas nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas
214b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa cig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas
214b3(mdo sde): bi'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
214b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rno gras pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags// 
214b5(mdo sde): rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong dri med 'od 'dis lha/ ga pa'i bsam pa de lta bus byang chub tu sems skyed de/ 
214b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir ngas dge slong dri med 'od 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ste/ kun dga' bo dge slong dri med 'od 'di ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus bska
214b7(mdo sde): pa bcu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams
214b8(mdo sde): ba las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu mngon
215a1(mdo sde): / par byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad+ma rnam par grags spyod seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shes bya bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
215a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan pad+ma rnam par grags spyod seng ge'i sgra sgrogs de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las grub par 'gyur/ 
215a3(mdo sde): la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med de/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig 'du bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i chos ston
215a4(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// de dag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang ye shes
215a5(mdo sde): kyi khyad par gyis yongasu sbyong bar 'gyuraro// 'jig te/ na gyi khams de yang rnam grangs mtha' yas ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
215a6(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar pa na mun pa thams cad med par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo de bzhin du/ 
215a7(mdo sde): gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag gis ni kun nas snang ba thob par 'gyur te/ chos thams cad la yang sgrib pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
215a8(mdo sde): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na sgrib pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
215b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo thong shig/ gnas ni 'di 'dri bas khyed la ci zhig bya/ kun dga' bo gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sgrib pa dang / sgrib pa med pa
215b2(mdo sde): thams cad bshad zin/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btso
215b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sgrib pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa gang thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lnga brgya pa tha ma la babs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la 'dod pa
215b4(mdo sde): skyed par mi 'gyur ba de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa zhe/ so bya ba la/ 'dod chags ni sgrib pa'o// zhe sdang
215b5(mdo sde): ni sgrib pa'o// gti mug ni sgrib pa'o// sbyin pa ni smras pa'o// tshul khrims ni sgrib pa'o// bzod pa ni sgrib pa'o// brtson 'grus ni sgrib pa'o// bsam gtan ni sgrib
215b6(mdo sde): pa'o// shes rab ni sgrib pa'o// sangs rgyas 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// chos su 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// dge 'dun du 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa ni
215b7(mdo sde): sgrib pa'o// mtshan ma med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// smon pa med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// skye ba med par
215b8(mdo sde): 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// byang chub tu 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o// 'jam dpal mdor na kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs pa de dag thams cad ni del
216a1(mdo sde): sgrib pa yin par blta bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa ji ltar sgrib pa legs/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / 
216a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab ji ltar sgrib pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad la ni sgrib pa med mod
216a3(mdo sde): kyi 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis rang gang gi rtog pas sbyin pa yang sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
216a4(mdo sde): dang / shes rab kyang sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni/ sbyin pa sbyin phra na sems can ser sna can rnams la ma dad par
216a5(mdo sde): byed de/ de dag ma dad pa des khong khro ba dang / tha ba'i nyes pa skyed par byed do// khong khro ba dang / tha ba'i nyes pa/ sa sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyuraro// de
216a6(mdo sde): dag tshul khrims bsrung ba na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la smod cing bsnyas par byed la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod do// de dag las de dag gi bsngags pa ma yin pa thob pas so so'i
216a7(mdo sde): skye bo mang po dag ma dad par byed de/ de dag ma dad pa des ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de dag bzod pa sgom pa na/ bdag cag ni bzod par smra ba yin gyi gzhan 'di dag ni gnod
216a8(mdo sde): sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yino// zhes bzod pa'i rgyags pas myos pa de dag bag med pa'i gzhi las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnams skyed par 'gyuraro// de dag brtson 'grus brtson
216b1(mdo sde): ba na bdag sgrogs shing / dge slong dag 'di dag ni le lo can du gnas pa yin te/ brtson pa med par dad pas sbyin pa longs spyod par byed do// de dag gis ni nu ra'i chu yang
216b2(mdo sde): longs spyad mi 'os so snyam te/ de dag brtson 'grus brtson pas/ bdag la ni stod par byed/ gzhan la ni smod par byed de/ de dag ni byis pa yin zhes nga smra'o// de dag bsam
216b3(mdo sde): gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa na/ bsam gtan gyi dga' ba de la chags pa skyed par byed cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni mnyam par bzhag pas gnas pa
216b4(mdo sde): yin gyi/ dge slong dag gzhan 'di dag ni sems g.yengs dbas gnas pa yin te/ 'du 'dzi la dga' bas gnas pa yi no// 'du 'dzi la dga' bas 'di dag sangs rgyas
216b5(mdo sde): ga la 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las ring ngo snyam mo// de dag 'du shes yid la byed pa des ji tsam du brnyas par gyur pa'i sems bskyed par
216b6(mdo sde): byed pa de snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// phyis de dag gis gang du byang chub spyod pa na gal te de dag mang du thos pa yin du zin kyang de dag gis chos
216b7(mdo sde): thams cad ni yi ge med pa la rnam par shes pa yod par brtags te/ shes rab tu dmigs nas pha rol khyad du gsod par byed pa/ de dag ni mi shes pa'o zhes nga smra'o// mi
216b8(mdo sde): shes bzhin du smra ba'o zhes nga smra'o// skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'o zhes nga smra'o// rnam par rtog pas nyams pa'o zhes nga smra'o// gal te de dag theg pa chen po la zhugs
217a1(mdo sde): par gyur na yang / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin no// bdag cag ni 'jig rten na phul yin no// bdag cag ni 'jig rten na/ 
217a2(mdo sde): mchog yino snyam mo// gal te de dag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag mthong na/ de dag las dad pa skyed cing smod pa dang / 'phya ba dang / bsngags pa ma yin no brjod par byed de/ khas/ 
217a3(mdo sde): ba ngan pa dang / nyes par brjod pa des na/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
217a4(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la dga' bzhin du blta ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i nga rang bzhin bskyed par mi bya 'am/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol
217a5(mdo sde): pa bci ci byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la dga' bzhin du blta ba dang / phan pa'i nga sa po rang bzhin bskyed par mi bya 'am 'jam dpal gyis
217a6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can nyan thos
217a7(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ theg pa chen po pa 'ga' tsam yang yongasu spangs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag
217a8(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'ga' yang yongasu ma gtang lag so// bcom ldan
217b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pas ni rgyal po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gam/ mi dbul po 'am/ sems can 'ga' tsam yang
217b2(mdo sde): yongasu spangs pa med do// sman pa de ni 'di ltar sems snyoms pas nye bar gnas pa yin te/ ji ltar byas na sems can 'di dag nad dang bral bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// / 
217b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la snying rje 'jug cing sems snyoms pas nye bar gnas pa yin te/ 'di snyam du/ 
217b4(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag thams cad ji ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa ni
217b5(mdo sde): sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgyun mi chad na dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi
217b6(mdo sde): gdung rgyud ma chad na dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal sems can thams cad ni sman pa dang 'dra ba ma yino// 'jam dpal gso bar byed pa'i sman pa ni
