328b3(mdo sde): lo grangs med par gyur rin po che sna bdun dang bcaso// gser gyi 'khor lo de gcig cing yang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po khri phrag brgya snyed do// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
328b4(mdo sde): rgyal po de re re la yang bu stong stong dang dmag rnams bzhi dang bcaso// rin po che sna bdun de las 'od zer chen po 'byung ba ni/ dud pa 'am sprin lta bu ste/ 'od de
328b5(mdo sde): re re la yang pad+mo chen po re re yod do// pad+mo da yang gcig la gcig mtshams 'brel to// pad+mo'i mtshams dang bar kun nas nyi ma lta bu'i 'od chen
328b6(mdo sde): po 'byung ste/ nyi ma lta bu'i 'od re re la yang gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i bal glang re re yod de/ de la sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' re re bcib so// bal glang de dag
328b7(mdo sde): la bcibs pa'i tshe na brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa'i mtshan dang / dpe byang mang po 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od zer 'dus pa las sangs
328b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku gcig tu gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog kyang gser btso ma lta bu sku'i tshad kyang dpag tu med gzhal du med pa'o// de dag kyang sku'i lte ba'i
329a1(mdo sde): mtshan ston te/ de'i 'od zes bzang po yang gong du bshad pa bzhin no// 'od kyi nang nas snang bar gyur pa thams cad kyang / khrims lnga dang dge
329a2(mdo sde): ba bcu bstod pa dang / chos dang 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjesu dran pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba
329a3(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams kyang lag na gser gyi 'khor lo thogs te/ dge ba bcu'i chos sgrog so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la de ltar brtsa
329a4(mdo sde): bar bya'o// gang gis de lta bur mthong ba de ni yang dag par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yin par mthong ba de ni log par mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas yongasu mya
329a5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi nye gan su gyur pa/ ngag 'di ltar sems shing 'du shes pa 'am/ yid la byed cing chos 'di rjesu dran par byed na// 
329a6(mdo sde): bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'byang zhing rtag tu mtho risu skyes te/ dge ba bcu'i chos thos par 'gyuraro// 'od 'bum phrag gcig gis ni lho
329a7(mdo sde): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten snang bar byas te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snyed/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna
329a8(mdo sde): tshogasu gyur to// nor bu de re re yang 'od zer stong stong 'bar ro// 'od zer de dag 'dus pa las rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tu med par gyur to// khang pa/ 
329b1(mdo sde): brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhin yang rin po che'i ri rab gling bzhi pa la gnyi zla gza' skar dang bcas pa gling phran bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba 'od zer mang po dang / bcas
329b2(mdo sde): pa re re yod do// ri rab lhun po de re re la yang rin po che'i brag phug 'od 'bar ba grangs med pa snyed do// brag phug de re re'i nang na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas tshad
329b3(mdo sde): med grangs med pa snyed bzhug so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de re re la yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa grangs med pa snyed do// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
329b4(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i chos ston cing bsngagaso// de la de ltar blta bar bya'o// gang gis de lta bur mthong ba de ni yang
329b5(mdo sde): dag par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yin par mtho nga ba de ni log par mthong ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ sangs
329b6(mdo sde): rgyas yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi nye gan su gyur pa dag/ 'di ltar sems shing 'du shes pa dang / yid la byed pa 'am/ chos 'di rjesu dran par
329b7(mdo sde): byas na/ bskal pa khri phrag bcu gnyis snyed kyi 'khor ba'i nyes pa yongasu spong bar 'gyur zhing yongasu dag pa'i 'jig rten du bsams pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro// 
329b8(mdo sde): 'od 'bum phrag gcig gis ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten snang bar byas nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa/ 
330a1(mdo sde): // snyed de dag 'od des shel sna tshogs kyi kha dog du gyur te/ shel leb rgan dang dkar po dang / ljang khu la gser dang bai DUR+Ya dang pad+ma rags kyang mdzes
330a2(mdo sde): par brgyan cing spraso// shel dang rin po che de dag gi 'od zer las rin po che'i shing rta khri phrag du ma snyed byung ngo rin po che'i shing rta rnams kyi kha dog ji lta ba de bzhin
330a3(mdo sde): du 'bar ro// shing rta de dag gi srog shing ni gser btso ma'i kha dog go// de lta bu'i shing rta de dag gi steng na rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dang / rgyal mtshan chen po/ 
330a4(mdo sde): yad de/ mchod rten dang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la rin po che'i gdugs chen po yod do// gdugs de yang rim pa bcu snyed do// gdugs de las 'od zer stong stong snyed
330a5(mdo sde): 'bar ro// rin po che'i 'phreng ba mang pos kyang shin tu ma/ dzes par brgyan te/ 'od zer kyang de'i rje su 'dzu ga go// de nas yang phyir byung ba dang / de las
330a6(mdo sde): sprul pa'i sangs rgyas mang po byung ste/ sangs rgyas de dag gi sku'i tshad kyang dpag tshad 'bum phrag khri snyed do// sangs rgyas de dag re re'i sku'i lte ba nas kyang 'od grangs
330a7(mdo sde): med pa byung ste/ 'od des kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad snang bar byaso// sems can gang zhig la 'od zer 'dis reg par
330a8(mdo sde): gyur pa de yang ngan song gsum las yongasu thar te/ ngan song gsum gyi nyes pas mi 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// 'od zer de dag 'khyil cing 'dus pa las 'od kyi khang pa
330b1(mdo sde): brtsegs pa lta bur gyur te/ sprin ltar steng gi bar snang la 'phags te 'od de'i nang nas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma snyed snang ngo // sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de re
330b2(mdo sde): re la yang nye gnas kyi 'khor khri phrag brgya snyed de/ 'od srungs chen po ltar sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la dka' thub tu spyod cing / sems ci la yang ma chags te/ 
330b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten las yongasu 'da' ba sha dag go// de la de ltar blta bar bya'o// gang gis de lta bur mthong ba de ni yang dag par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yin par
330b4(mdo sde): mthong ba de ni log par mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas yongasu mya dran las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi nye gnasu gyur pa dag 'di ltar 'du shes pa 'am/ sems
330b5(mdo sde): shing yid la byed pa 'am/ chos 'di rjesu dran par byas na/ gang zag des rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhing myur du theg pa chen po'i chos kyi don rtogs pa
330b6(mdo sde): dang / bskal pa khri phrag bcu snyed kyi 'khor ba'i nyes pa yongasu spong bar rig par bya'o// 'od 'bum phrag gcig gis ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams snang bar
330b7(mdo sde): byas te/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snyed 'od kyis yongasu dag cing rnyog pa 'am/ dri ma med pa ni shel gyi sgo nga'i me long
330b8(mdo sde): ltar phyi nang kun gsal bar byaso// 'od de dag gi nang nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun kyang sku lte ba'i mtshan ston par snang ngo // sangs rgyas de dag re re'i
331a1(mdo sde): // sku lte ba'i 'od zer gyis kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa snyed snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
331a2(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed bzhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas de re re la yang rdul phra rab snyed kyang byang chub sems dpa' ngag zhabs 'bring 'khor du gyur te/ de ltar byang
331a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dag kyang lte ba'i mtshan ston to/ 'od zer las gser gyi ka ba dang / rin po che'i gdung ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bur bres te/ de las rin
331a4(mdo sde): po che'i yang thog dang spros ma dang sgrom bu dang / rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng tshad brjod du med pa snyed de/ sprin ltar steng gi na mkha' la 'phags te/ 'od rab tu
331a5(mdo sde): 'bar ro// rin po che'i cha rkyen de dag kun las 'od ze ra so so nas 'bum phrag khri khri yod par gyur to// 'od zer 'bum phrag de re re la yang sangs rgyas
331a6(mdo sde): kyi sku de snyed gcig tu gyur te snang ngo // sangs rgyas de re re'i sku la yang sprul pa'i 'od zer rdul phra rab snyed 'byung zhing / 'od de'i thog ma la yang sprul pa'i sangs
331a7(mdo sde): rgyas sku yungs kar gyi 'bras bu tsam sha stag yod par gyur to// sangs rgyas su phra mo de dag gi lte ba'i mtshan ston pa yang gong du bshad pa bzhin no// de ltar
331a8(mdo sde): sku lte ba'i 'od zer rnams phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byas nas/ phyir yang sangs rgyas kyi lte bar zhug so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi lte ba nas/ byang chub sems
331b1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi snying kar zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying kha nas phyir byung nas nyan thos rnams kyi spyi bor zhug so// nyan thos rnams kyi spyi bo nas phyir byung
331b2(mdo sde): nas 'od kyi sprin chen po tshad med par gyur te/ de gser gyi kha dog rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pas spras shing brgyan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi mthil du zhug so// sangs
331b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhabs kyi mthil tu zhugs nas/ zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo brtsibs stong deng ldan pa'i mtshan las kyang 'od zer chen po byung bar gyur to// 'od zer de yang bad+mo/ 
331b4(mdo sde): chen po lta bu ste/ pad+mo de 'dab chagasu gyur te/ sangs rgyas la lan stong phrag bcu bskor nas zangs kyi kha do/ ga lta bu'i zhabs kyi sen mo dang / zhabs kyi sor
331b5(mdo sde): mo'i gong nas dbu'i gtsug tor la thug gi bar du yongasu brgyan te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga'i mtshan na mas pad+mo kha bye ba lta bur gyur nas/ ba spu'i bu ga
331b6(mdo sde): gcig gi nang na yang pad+mo brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod par gyur to// pad+mo de gcig gi steng na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed bzhug so// sprul pa'i
331b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de re re'i zhabs 'bring na yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re'i smin mtshams kyi 'od zer gyi rnam
331b8(mdo sde): ba las sgra dbyangs sna tshogs byung ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yon tan dang mtshan dang / dpe byad bstod cing bsngags pa'i sgra'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
332a1(mdo sde): / pas 'od zer dang / sprul pa de dag bstan nas/ rgyal po yab la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang mtshan gyi
332a2(mdo sde): khyad par ni 'di dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni ma gtogs kyi/ spyod yul gzhan ni gong du bshad pa dag go bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa dang / de'i tshe
332a3(mdo sde): rgyal po yab 'dug pa las langs te gos tshags bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar
332a4(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/  to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang / mam na ni thams cad du khyab par bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
332a5(mdo sde): kyi thugs kyi mtshan dang / spyod yul ji lta ba dang / mtshan ci 'dra ba dang / nan tan ci mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu dang / thugs kyi
332a6(mdo sde): 'od zer ji lta bu lags pa bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ ljags kyi mtshan gyi 'od zer yang sngar bshad
332a7(mdo sde): pa bzhin du sangs rgyas la lan bdun bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tu nub bo// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms pa
332a8(mdo sde): shugs nas/ rgyal po yab kyis 'di lta bur mthong bar byaso// bai DUR+Ya'i srub su gser btso ma gzugs mdzes pa bzhag pa ltar shin tu mdzes par snang bar byas te/ 
332b1(mdo sde): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdzes pa gser btso ma lta bu'i thugs kha nas mgur du bai DUR+Ya'i sbubs nas zil dngar gyi ro dang 'od zer rgyu zhing 'bab te/ de bzhin gshegs
332b2(mdo sde): pa'i thugs pad mo leb rgan lta bu la gser gyi pad mos shin tu brgyan par mthong ngo // thugs pad mo leb rgan lta bu de pad mo kha bye ba yang ma yin pa ma bye ba yang ma yin
332b3(mdo sde): te/ dpal gyi be'u la rtsa brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod de/ rtsa de'i ri mo yang lha'i ri mo lta bu dang g.yung drung khyil pa lta bu ste/ ri mo'i bar mtshams kun na 'od zer brgyad khri
332b4(mdo sde): bzhi stong snyed yod do// 'od zer de re re la yang kha dog brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed dang ldan no// kha dog gi rnam pa dri re re la yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas sku tshad med pa rdul pa
332b5(mdo sde): rab kyi grangs snyed bzhug so// sprul pa'i sangs rgya sa de dag kun kyang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhug/ sa par snang ngo // rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa grangs med
332b6(mdo sde): pa de dag las kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od grangs med pa snyed 'byung ste/ rgyas par bshad du bde bar mi nus so// 'od de dag re re'i nang na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
332b7(mdo sde): grangs gong du smos pa bzhin du bzhug so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis kyang ljags che zhing ring ba'i mtshan byung nas dbu 'dab la thug gi bar du yog ste/ 'od
332b8(mdo sde): rab tu 'gyed do// sangs rgyas kyi ljags de re re la yang 'od zer khri phrag bcu snyed do// 'od zer de dag kyang spyir tshom bu rnam pa stong phrag bcur gyur nas/ 'od zer de re re la
333a1(mdo sde): // yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya snyed skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas/ sku kun khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// phyogs
333a2(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku'i gzugs dam pa yang tingange 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho 'dir snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das tingange 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe na/ grong
333a3(mdo sde): khyer ser skya dang / n+ya gro da'i gzhal med khang dang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che'i pad+mo lta bur gyur to// pad+mo khang pa brtsegs par gyur pa'i steng na shel gyi rgyal mtshan chen
333a4(mdo sde): po yod do// shel gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dbu rtse la shel gyi me long yod de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa tshad med pa snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag
333a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang der snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba/ ra gyur te/ la las ni sangs rgyas kyi sku na mkha' tshang
333a6(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa gser gyi kha dog can du mthong ngo // la las ni su ri rab lhun po dang 'dra ba rin po che sna bzhi las byas par mthong ngo // la las ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bai DUR+Ya'i
333a7(mdo sde): kha dog lta bu la tshad kyang mtho brgya par mthong ngo // la las ni sangs rgyas kyi sku dngul gyi kha dog lta bu la khru brgyad stong snyed du ring bar mthong ngo // la las ni sku gdung gi/ 
333a8(mdo sde): mdog gam zla ba dri ma med pa lta bu la sku chag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu par mthong ngo // sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sku ni tshad bzhin du mtho bcu drug par mthong ngo // la las/ 
333b1(mdo sde): ni mtho bdun par mthong ngo // la las ni mtho gsum pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug gi bar du yongasu gang bar mthong ngo // la las ni sor bdun pas 'jig rten gang bar
333b2(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de dag kun kyang 'od zer dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad kyis yongasu brgyan pa'o// la las ni yungs kar gyi 'brum bu tsam du mthong ngo // la las ni gser gyi khre'i
333b3(mdo sde): 'bras bu tsam du mthong ngo // yi dwags rnams kyis ni rdul phra mo tsam du mthong ste/ yi dwags rnams kyis de lta bur mthong ba dang / yi dwags lus chung ngun ma'i rnams rab tu
333b4(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur to// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjes dran pa rtogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho
333b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i mdo// bam po lnga pa// de'i tshe sangs rgya sa kyi thugs pad+mo leb rgan lta bu las/ pad+mo'i 'ang ba ma'i bar dang / mtshams kun nas 'od zer kha dog
333b6(mdo sde): dkar po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed byung ste/ 'od des rgyud lnga 'i sems can kun mtha' yas par thams cad snang bar byaso// 'od zer 'di dag byung ba'i tshe na/ sdug
333b7(mdo sde): bsngal gyis gdungs pa sems can mang po mngon du snang bar gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / sems can dmyal ba chu dun bco
333b8(mdo sde): brgyad dang / rab tu grangs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / mun pa nag po'i sems can dmyal chen po bco brgyad dang / rab tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal
334a1(mdo sde): pa chen po bco brgyad dang / mtshon gyi 'khor lo'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / ral gri'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / 
334a2(mdo sde): me'i shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / shin tu dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / chu tshan khol ba'i sems
334a3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / thal chu'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / mtshon gyi nags tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / ral gri'i
334a4(mdo sde): sdong po'i sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / tsher ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / lcags kyi sdong po'i sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya
334a5(mdo sde): dang / lcags kyi thags zangs kyi sems can dmyal ba/ khri phrag lnga brgya dang / lcags kyi dra ba'i sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / lcags kyi khang
334a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / lcags kyi thu lum gyi sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / rdo zur mong gi sems can dmyal ba chen po bco
334a7(mdo sde): brgyad dang / lcags khu 'thung ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / de dag la sogs pa sems can dmyal ba mang po dag yod par gyur to// bcom ldan
334a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ mnar med pa'i tsha grang gis gdungs pa dang mgon dang / skyabs
334b1(mdo sde): med pa'i sgra skad du ni/ a byi zhes 'don te/ a zhes bya ba bya ni med pa'o// byi ni mtsham so// a zhes bya ba ni med pa'o// byi ni skyab so// a zhes bya ba ni mtshams med pa'o// 
334b2(mdo sde): byi ni mi g.yo ba'o// a zhes bya ba ni rab tu tsha ba'o// byi ni rab tu gdung ba'o// a zhes bya ba ni rab tu grang ba'o// byi ni rab tu gdung ba'o// a zhes pa ni mi dal ba'o// byin/ 
334b3(mdo sde): mi sdong ba'o// sdug bsngal chen po las mi dal mi sdod pa'i phyir na mnar med pa zhes bya'o// a zhes pa ni me chen po'o// byi ni rab tu tsha ba'o// rab tu tsha ba'i me 'bar bas
334b4(mdo sde): snying la gdugs pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba
334b5(mdo sde): chen po ni/ chu zheng gab par dpag tshad brgya stong snyed de/ mtha' ma yang lcags kyi mkhar me 'bar ba rim pa bdun gyi bskor to// 'og kyang lcags kyi dra ba me
334b6(mdo sde): 'bar ba rim pa bdun no// 'og na bar chad 'bar ba bco brgyad yod de/ kho ra khor yug tu ral gri'i tshal rim pa bdun yod do// mkhar rim pa bdun gyi bar na yang ral
334b7(mdo sde): gri'i nags tshal rim pa bdun yod do// 'og gi bar chad rim pa bco brgyad la/ bar chad de gcig yang dra mig dang rim pa brgyad khri ban stong yod de/ de'i grwa bzhi
334b8(mdo sde): yang bas kyi gyir yod de// phyi bzhi'i lus kyi chang kyang dngag cad 'ani 'du med do// mig na thog ltar bangar mche ba na ral gr-i kar nar// so rnams ni mtshan
335a1(mdo sde): ri ltar 'dug kyi/ lce ni lcags kyi zem ltar rngub la lus kyi spu thams cad las kyang me rab tu 'bar te/ de las dud pa rab tu dri mi zhim pa ni/ 'jig
335a2(mdo sde): rten gyi dri mi zhim pa gang gis kyang dper mi bzod pa dag 'khrig so// sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs ma bco brgyad yod de/ mgo yang srin po'i mgo lta bu la/ kha yang
335a3(mdo sde): srin po'i kha 'dra ba ste/ mgo la mig drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed yod do// mig nas lcags kyi thu lum dpag tshad phyed pa dag 'beb so// khyi'i mche ba de ring khyad kyang dpag tshad
335a4(mdo sde): bzhi ste/ mche ba de'i thog ma me rab tu 'bar zhing / lcags kyi shing rta yang 'bar bar byed do// lcags kyi shing rta yang 'khor lo re re la yang de ltar 'bar ba'i mtshon gyi
335a5(mdo sde): 'khor lo dang / ral gri'i 'khor lo rab tu rno ba dag/ 'byung ngo // me de snyed kyis mnar med pa'i sems ca/ rkyen dmyal ba bsregs te/ mnar med pa'i sems
335a6(mdo sde): can dmyal ba yongasu gdung so// dmyal ba'i srungs ma'i mgo la glang gi mgo brgyad yod de/ glang gi mgo gcig la yang rwa bco brgyad yod do// rwa'i rtse mo de re re la yang
335a7(mdo sde): me'i phung po re re 'byung ngo // me'i phung po de re re la yang me'i dra ba chad bco brgyad du gyur nas/ shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi me'i ral gri 'khor lor gyur to// 'khor lo
335a8(mdo sde): de'adab chagasu me 'bar ba'i nang nas dkrigs te/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba gsheg cing sreg go// lcags kyi khyi rnams kha gdangs shing lce lcags kyi
335b1(mdo sde): gzem dang 'dra ba phyung nas sa la phab pa'i tshe/ gdugs pa'i lce me 'bar ba grangs med par gyur nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yongasu gang ngo // lcags
335b2(mdo sde): kyi mkhar rim pa bdun gyi bar na lcags kyi rgyal mtshan 'bar ba grangs med pa yod de/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nas lcags tshan gyi khu ba lud cing / chu mig drag po ltar
335b3(mdo sde): 'bab ste/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la yongasu gang ngo // mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la sgo bzhi yod de/ sgo'i them pa na zangs tshan 'bar ba brgyad
335b4(mdo sde): cu snyed yod do// zangs kyi nang nas lcags tshan gyi khu ba lud cing 'bo ste/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la yongasu gang ngo // mnar bcad de re re na
335b5(mdo sde): yang lcags kyi sprul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod de/ kha nas gdugs pa dang me 'byin to// sbrul gdug pa can des sems can dmyal ba'i lus la yongasu
335b6(mdo sde): gang ste/ skad 'byin pa na 'brug ltar skad rab tu che ba sgrogs shing lcags kyi thu lum yang char bzhin du 'bebs pas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar yongasu
335b7(mdo sde): gang ngo // sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'di ni sdug bsngal 'bum phrag brgyad khri snyed kun 'di na tshang bar yod do// sems can dmyal ba'i gnas de na lcags
335b8(mdo sde): kyi srin bu khri phrag lnga brgya snyed yod de/ srin bu gcig la yang kha brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed do// de'i kha nas me char bzhin du 'bebs pas/ mnar med pa'i sems
336a1(mdo sde): / can dmyal bar yongasu gang ngo // srin bu chen po de char bzhin du bab pa'i tshe na/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu cher 'bar te/ 
336a2(mdo sde): me'i 'od kyis dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kho ra khor yug kun snang bar byed do// me des mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba nas/ rgya mtsho dang ri rab tu gdus
336a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba la thug go/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas kyang shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi lcags kyi skung du gyur nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar yongasu gang ngo // 
336a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang slob dpon dang / pha ma bsad pa dang / gnyen gyi drug rgyud la skyo zhing smod pa dang / 
336a5(mdo sde): gshe zhing brgyad pa dang / sems can nyon mongs pa rna mas la snying mi brtse ba dang / g.yo sgyus log pa/ ra 'tsho ba dang / sems can mang po'i srog bcad
336a6(mdo sde): ba dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa'i las byas pa dag/ 'chi 'pho'i dus byed pa na lcags kyi khyi rnams kha gdang sra ba gser lta bu'i shing rta bco brgyad
336a7(mdo sde): du sprul pa la/ steng yang rin po che'i gdugs bres pa ltar sprul te/ me lce thams cad kyang bu mo gzho nur sprul nas/ spro ba bskyed par gyur to// sdig pa can des rgyang nas
336a8(mdo sde): mthong ba dang rab tu dang ba'i sems skyed de/ bdag der 'gro na re dga' snyam nas/ bdag der 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang / de ma thag tu rlung gi mthus rab tu grang bar
336b1(mdo sde): gyur te/ skad chen po phyung nas me tsha ba zhig dang phrad na ci ma rung snyam bsams te brjod nas/ shing d+ha de'i steng na 'dug cing / me che ba zhig dang phrad na re dga' snyam pasam
336b2(mdo sde): pab dang / de ma thag tu nyam thag nas tshe 'phos te/ gser gyi shing rta rta 'bar ba'i steng na 'dug cing / bu mo gzhonu rnams kyang lag na sta re rnon po re re thogs shing lus la
336b3(mdo sde): gcod cing gshegs pa/ shing rta'i 'og na me rab tu 'bar te/ dper na/ stobs po che zhig lag ngar brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi srid du/ mnar med pa'i sems can
336b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo // bar chad lhag ma nas me ma gal bskor ba'i 'khor lo bzhin bar chad nang gi 'og mar phyin te/ bar chad kun tu lus kyis yongasu
336b5(mdo sde): gang ngo // zangs kyi khyis skad chen po phyung nas/ rus pa 'cha' zhing rkang 'jib bo// srungs ma srin pos ni lag na ma dung rtse kha breg pa thogs nas mgo la btsugs te
336b6(mdo sde): phyir bslang ngo // de nyid du lus kun nas me 'bar/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar yongasu gang ngo // lcags kyi dra ba las ral gri 'bar ba char bzhin du 'bab ste/ 
336b7(mdo sde): lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun du zug go// de'i tshe sprul pa'i gshin rje 'ongs nas skad chen pos 'di skad ces smra'o// glen pa gti mug can dmyal ba'i sa bon khyod sangs rgyas dang
336b8(mdo sde): chos dang slob dpon dang pha ma la sri zhu ma byas te/ nga rgyal gyis chos log pa spyad pas khyod kyis skye ba'i gnas 'di ni/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po
337a1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// khyod byas pa mi shes shing drin du mi gzo bas/ ngo tsha ba dang khrel dang gzhung med pas 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa
337a2(mdo sde): 'di la da bde ba ci yod ces smras nas mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe na dmyal ba'i srungs mas sdig pa can de bar chad 'og ma nas bar chad lhag ma'i bar du bar chad
337a3(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kun tu 'das nas/ kun la lus kyis 'gre zhing 'gro ste/ lcags kyi dra ba'i mthar phyin to// nyin zhag gcig gis lan re 'khor ro// mnar
337a4(mdo sde): med pa'i nyin zhag gcig la ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi lo dang zla ba dang / zhag dang nyi mas bgrang ba'i bskal pa chung ngu drug cu snyed de/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chen
337a5(mdo sde): po gcig go// mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i ga/ nga zag sdig pa can de dag 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa/ na rlung gi mtshon cha 'bar ba lcags kyi shing rtangadang
337a6(mdo sde): 'dra ba bco brgyad kyis lus gtub gshegs ste/ me rab tu tsha bas snying la gdungs pas 'di snyam du bdag me tog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsil grib can
337a7(mdo sde): gyi shing chen po zhig gi 'og na rtse na re dga' snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i mtshon gyi nags tshal thams cad rin po
337a8(mdo sde): che'i nags tshal lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rgyas pa lta bur sprul pa rab tu dkrigs par gyur te/ me lce thams cad ni shing rtsa ba nas pad+mo lta bur sprul/ 
337b1(mdo sde): te spo ba bskyed pa dang / sdig pa can des mthong ba dang bdag gi yid la 'dod pa dang phrad do snyams bsams nas/ bu yug drag po bas kyang mgyogs par me'i pad+mo
337b2(mdo sde): steng du 'dug par gyur pa dang / de ma thag tu lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyang me'i nang nas byung ste/ rus pa dang / rkang gi nang du thal byung du song nas/ snying dang glad ma'i
337b3(mdo sde): nang du yang thal byung du song ngo // 'phongs nas shing la 'jug te 'dzegs pa dang / thams cad ral gri 'bar bar gyur te yan lag dang rus pa kun dum bur chad
337b4(mdo sde): de ral gri'i 'khor lo grangs med pa snyed kyang / steng nas bab po/ me'i shing rta dang / lcags tshan la bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi dngos po bco brgyad
337b5(mdo sde): kyang dus gcig tu 'dus na su'o// de ltar gyur pa dang / sa la 'gyel to// bar chad 'og mar lus pad+mo khe bye dang 'dra bar ral zhing gas pas yongasu gang ngo // 
337b6(mdo sde): bar chad 'og ma nas bar chad gong mar rims bzhin du 'phar te/ me rab tu 'bar bas bsregs pas bar chad kun tu lus kyis gang ste/ tsha bas yongasu gdungs pas
337b7(mdo sde): mig dgrang kha gdangs te lce 'byin to// sdig pa can de la sdig pa'i las kyis lcags tshan gyi khu ba khri phrag brgyad stong dang / mtshon gyi 'khor lo brgyad stong snyed
337b8(mdo sde): 'bab cing 'bo ste/ spyi bor phog nas rkang mthil du thal byung du byung ngo // sdug bsngal gyi dngos po rnams ni bshad pa bas kyang brgya stong gis lhag par mi bzod
338a1(mdo sde): do mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa can de ni bskal ba yang lnga tshang bar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro// sems can gang tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba
338a2(mdo sde): bzhi zhig pa dang / sbyin bdag dad pa'i sbyin pa chud gsan pa dang / ngan par lta ba'i sems kyis chos la skur pa 'debs pa dang / las legs nyes kyi 'bras bu mi
338a3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing 'chad pa dang slob pa'i bar chad byed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la dbang bzas pa dang / dge 'dun
338a4(mdo sde): gyi dkor srung la brlabs pa dang / mi rigs pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / dge slong ma dang / ma srid du gyur pa'i gnyen pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / khrel ba dang
338a5(mdo sde): ngo tsha med pa dang / gnyen gyi drug rgyud la spyo zhing ba rgyad de mi rigs pa'i las byas pa'i sdig pa ca na de 'chi 'pho ba'i dus na yang rlung gi mtshon chas lus
338a6(mdo sde): gshegs cing bde bar nyal du yang med de/ lcags mos bcu ba bzhin du nyam thag nas sems kyang myos par gyur te/ rig lam na bdag gi 'khor yul dang / khyim
338a7(mdo sde): dang / gnas dang / nor rdzas dang / za skom la sogs pa thams cad mi gtsang ba dang / ngan skyugs kyis gang bar mthong ste/ de'i tshe sdig pa can de'i skad du ci'i phyir gnas
338a8(mdo sde): 'di dag na gnas bzang po ri dang tshal du ldan pa med dam/ ci ste 'di lta bu'i mi gtsang bas gang ba'i gnas 'dir bzhag ces smra'o// de skad smras ma thag tu srung ma/ 
338b1(mdo sde): srin pos mdung rtse kha brag pa'i kha nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang / ral gri'i tshal dang / me mur dang lcags tshan la sogs pa rnams rin po che'i
338b2(mdo sde): shing dang / bsal ba'i rdzing bur sprul te khyer nas/ me lce rnams kyang gser gyi pad mor sprul te/ srin bu lcags kyi mchu can rnams kyang bya ngur par sprul nas/ dmyal
338b3(mdo sde): ba'i skad a byi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni glu dbyangasu sprul te/ spro ba skyed do// sdig pa can des de lta bu dag mthong zhing thos pa dang / 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i gnas bzang por
338b4(mdo sde): ci'i phyir bdag der mi 'dug snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu me'i pad mo'i stengs du 'dug par gyur to// lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyang ba spu'i bu
338b5(mdo sde): ga kun tu zhugs te/ lus kun nas 'bugs shing za'o// lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba brgya stong snyed kyang mgo'i steng nas char bzhin du bab nas mdung rtse kha/ 
338b6(mdo sde): brag pa grangs med pa mig du 'dzugs shing mig gi 'bras bu 'byin to// sems can dmyal ba'i zangs kyi khyi dang / lcags kyi khyi brgya stong mang po yang 'dus te/ de'i lus
338b7(mdo sde): khams tshad du gshegs cing snying la za ba'o// sdig pa can de'i lus de ma thag tu lcags kyi pad mo lta bur gyur te bar chad bco brgyad po kun tu yongasu gang ngo // lus
338b8(mdo sde): pangad mo lta bur gyur pa de re re la yang lus kyi yan lag pad+mo'i 'dab ma lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod do// yan lag de re res kyang bar chad re re yongasu gang
339a1(mdo sde): // bar gyur te/ bar chad rnams kyang chen por ma gyur la sems can dmyal ba'i lus kyang chung ngur ma song ste/ de lta bu'i dmyal bar yongasu geng bar gyur to// 
339a2(mdo sde): sdig pa can des de lta bu'i dmyal ba chen por lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du sdug bsngal chen po blangs te/ de'i gnas nas shi ste yang dmyal ba'i shar phyogs kyi bar chad
339a3(mdo sde): bco brgyad po kun gyi nang du sdug bsngal chen po snga ma bzhin du len to// de bzhin du mnar med pa'i lho phyogs na yang bar chad bco brgyad/ nub phyogs na yang bar chad
339a4(mdo sde): bco brgyad byang phyogs na yang bar chad bco brgyad yo du do// de dag kun tu gang shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo la bskur ba btab pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa byas
339a5(mdo sde): ba dang / 'thun pa'i bar du dbyen byed pa dang / dge slong ma la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang / dge ba'i/ rtsa ba yongasu bcad pa dang / de la sogs pa'i sdig byas
339a6(mdo sde): pa dag mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lus kyis yongasu gang ste/ lus kyi yan lag bzhis kyang bar chad bco brgyad kun tu gang ngo // mnar med pa'i sems
339a7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba 'di dag rtag tu de ltar 'bar ro// sems can dmyal bar sa bon btab pa'i gang zag de bskal pa zad du nye ba na/ dmyal ba'i shar phyogs kyi sgo bye nas
339a8(mdo sde): sgo'i phyi rol na chu mig dang 'bab chu dang bsil ba'i rdzing bu dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshal mang po snang bar gyur to// sdig pa can des de lta bur de dag mtsho/ 
339b1(mdo sde): ba dang / mig nas me 'bar ba chung zad cig zhi nas bar chad 'og ma nas 'bye zhing gog ste bar chad ltag mar phyin nas/ ral gri'i 'khor lo la 'ju ste bzung ba dang / na mkha'
339b2(mdo sde): las lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba char bzhin du bab ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rgyug so// sgo'i them par phyin nas srung ma srin po rag sha dang yag sha mdung rtse kha brag pas mig du
339b3(mdo sde): btsugs te phyir bu lo// lcags kyi khyi rnams kyis kyang bzung nas de nyid du 'gyel te shi'o// shi ma thag tu phyir yang sos te dmyal ba'i lho sgo bye ba yang snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin
339b4(mdo sde): du nub sgo dang byang sgor yang snga ma bzhin te/ de lta bur yang bskal pa phyed kyi bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro// mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba de nas shi ste rab tu
339b5(mdo sde): grangs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyeso// rab / tu drang ba'i sems can dmyal ba de nas yang shi nas// mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes ste/ lo/ 
339b6(mdo sde): khri phrag brgyad stong gi bar du ji dzi yang mi mthong bar gyur to// de nas yang tshe 'phos nas srin bu chen po zhig gi skye ba blangs te lto bas 'phyi zhing 'gro ste/ dbang po rnams yongasu
339b7(mdo sde): mi gsal ba dang / shes pa med par gyur te/ spyang gi brgya stong mang pos za bar gyur to// de nas yang tshe 'phos nas byol song gi khamasu skye ba brgyud cing skyes te/ skye ba khri
339b8(mdo sde): phrag lnga brgya'i bar du byol song gi lus len par 'gyuraro// de nas thar nas bzod kyis mir skyes na yang 'on pa dang / rmugs pa dang / zha ba dang / long ba dang / mdze dang / 
340a1(mdo sde): / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / shu chen gyi gzir te/ dbul zhing phongs pa dang / rigs ngan par skye ba dang / gang ngan dgu thams cad 'tshogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar
340a2(mdo sde): shin tu dman pa'i lus su skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du skyes te/ de nas yang phyir yi dwags kyi khamasu skyes te gnas pa las/ de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems da/ 
340a3(mdo sde): chen po dang phrad de/ tshig 'di skad ces sgo bar gyur to// khyod sngon skye ba grangs med pa'i sngon rol na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa/ dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / ma/ 
340a4(mdo sde): dad pa dang / ma mos pa dang / ma phyogs pas mnar me/ du pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo // dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dngos po yongasu gdungs pa ni
340a5(mdo sde): bshad kyis kyang mi rdzog so// da khyod byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems skyed cig ces bsgo ba nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo// zhes smrar bcug go/ de nas
340a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes brjod pa'i bsod nams kyi mthus/ de nas tshe 'phos nas rgyal ched bzhi'i lhar skye so// lnga der skyes nas rab tu 'gyod de byang chub mchog tu sems
340a7(mdo sde): byed do// sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis de dag mi gtong zhing yongasu 'dzin to// sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar de dag byams shing thugs brtse ste/ 'di skad du rigs kyibu/ 
340a8(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las byol cig ces rje bu bstan pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal chen po sangs rgyas kyi
340b1(mdo sde): thugs kyi 'od zer chen po snang bar mdzad pa'i don rnams shes par 'dod na/ de ni gang zag mtshams med cing skyabs med pa'i skye bo rnams la rtag tu snang bar mdzad par shes par
340b2(mdo sde): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa ni rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'i gang zag sdig pa can rnams la dgongs te/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ gang zag sdig
340b3(mdo sde): pa can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams kyang bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal
340b4(mdo sde): pa de la ji ltar na rab tu grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad ce na/ rab tu grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni/ chab brom gyi ri chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod de/ 
340b5(mdo sde): de gcig la yang bar chad bco brgyad dang / ri chu ngu bco brgyad yod de shel gyi kha dog lta bu la rab tu grang ba'o// te rab tu grang ba'i sems can dmyal bas ri
340b6(mdo sde): de dag gi bar na yongasu gang nas/ gyo mo'i pad+ma lta bu la mtho khyad dpag tshad bco brgyad dang / chab brom gyi 'khor lo chu zhing gab par dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa steng gi nam
340b7(mdo sde): mkha' las ser ba de bzhin du bab bo// de dag 'jig rten na gang snying rje'i sems med cing nu zhing 'phrog pa dang / sbrus 'phrog pa dang / sems can gyi srog gcod cing sdig
340b8(mdo sde): ba mang po byas pa'i gang zag de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na gnas dang / 'du byed kyi dngos po thams cad me rab tu che ba dang / mtshon char gyur te/ sdig pa can de 'di snyam du
341a1(mdo sde): bdag me rab tu che ba dang mtshon chas nyen par gyur pa dang / bdag chab zom gyi glong chen po zhig na nyal na ji ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu dmyal/ 
341a2(mdo sde): ba'i srungs ma srin pos lag na chab brom gyi 'khor lo chen po thogs te bya dkar po 'phur ba ltar na mkha' las gom pa 'dor zhing 'ongs te spro ba skyed pa dang / sdig pa can
341a3(mdo sde): des mthong ba dang tsha bzhi zhing bsil bar gyur to// de la sems kyis 'dod cing chags pa las tshe 'phos te chab brom gyi ri la skyeso// der skye ba dang chab brom gyi ri chen po
341a4(mdo sde): rnams bsil g.yab kyis g.yabs pa bzhin du grang ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad ba spu'i bu ga kun tu song ngo //  bar chad bco brgyad po kun tu lus kyis gang nas
341a5(mdo sde): lus dang yan lag kun gas shing ral te bye nas pad+mo dmar po lta bur gyur to// chab brom gyi 'khor lo tshon pos lus la yongasu khebs te/ phyogs mtshams
341a6(mdo sde): brgyad kyi chab brom gyi ri rnams kyang dus gcig tu 'dus nas byol ba dang bzur ba'i sa med de/ tshig tu a byi dang a la la zhes bya ba 'bod do// de tshe sdig pa can de 'di snyam
341a7(mdo sde): du bdag nam zhig gi dus na rab tu grang ba 'di las thar te/ phyir yang me'i nang du skye grang snyam bsams pa dang / de'i dmyal ba'i lcags kyi bya rnams kyis kha nas me phyung ste/ 
341a8(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og kun nas chab brom bzhu ste/ sdig pa can gyi glad pa brtol nas glad pa bzhibs pa dang / de nyid du dmyal ba'i srungs mas mdung rtse kha brag pa
341b1(mdo sde): sa la brdabs te yang sos shig ces bos pa dang / de ma thag tu yang sos nas phyir yang me rab tu tsha bas gdungs pa dang / 'di ltar bdag gi lus la mes rab tu gdungs par
341b2(mdo sde): gyur na/ chab brom snga ma des me 'di bsad na ji ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / dmyal ba'i srungs mas chab brom gyi 'khor los sdig pa can de blangs nas bar chad gcig nas
341b3(mdo sde): byung ste/ bar chad gzhan gyi nang du bcu gnas bar chad bco brgyad po kun tu ma phyin pa'i sa med de/ kun tu sdug bsngal 'drar spyod do// rab tu grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i
341b4(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad ni rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas kyi nyi ma dang / zla bas bgrang ba'i lo khri phrag brgyad stong snyed kyi bar du gnaso// de las thar nas kyang rigs ngan par skyes te/ dbul zhing
341b5(mdo sde): phongs pa dang / byad gzugs ngan pa dang / skye ba lnga pa rgya'i bar du gzhan gyi bran khol du skyes te/ gos kyisalus mi yog pa dang / zas kyis lto mi khengs pa dang / 
341b6(mdo sde): tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyuraro// de nas sdig sgrib kyi rnam smid bri nas gzod dge ba'i gshes gnyen chen po dang phrad de/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan
341b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mud nag gi sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni ri nag po rim pa bco brgyad dang / 
341b8(mdo sde): mud dra ba nag po rim pa bco brgyad dang / lcags kyi tshal rim pa bco brgyad dang / lcags kyi bla re rim pa bco brgyad mun pa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa yod do// mud pa'i
342a1(mdo sde): ri de dag kun kyang mtho khyad dpag tshad brgya khri bzhi stong snyed yod do// bla re rim pa gcig la yang sdug khyad dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ bla re'i
342a2(mdo sde): rim pa re re'i bar na yang kho ra khor yug tu ri nag po bco brgyad kyis grib mar bsgrib so// 'di ni 'jig rten na skye bo dang / gang zag glen zhing gti mug can dag sangs rgyas
342a3(mdo sde): dang / chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang / mchod rten chen po brgyad dang / ma hA bo de la sogs pa la bsngos pa'i me mar dang snang ba'i sgor ma brkus pa dang / pa ma dang slob
342a4(mdo sde): dpon dang / bla ma'i sdang ba brkus pa dang / chos dang chos kyi mkhan po la skur pa btab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag la mkhas pa la yang brnyas smod byed pa
342a5(mdo sde): dang / legs nyes kyi ngo ma shes pa dang / sdig pa mang po byas pas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe na/ mig na glog lta bur 'gyur zhing 'bar ba rgyun mi 'chad pa
342a6(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag nyes pa ci byas nas 'di ltar rtag tu mig mi mthong bar gyur pa yin snyam bsams nas/ nyi zla'i 'od kyang mthong bar mi 'dod do// mtha' ma 'chi
342a7(mdo sde): ba'i dus byed pa na/ dmyal srungs srin pos lcags kyi khri la lcags kyi bla re bres pa khyer to/ sprin 'du ba bzhin du na mkha' las bab so// de'i tshe na mkha' las gzugs mi snang
342a8(mdo sde): bar sgra 'di skad du gragaso// rigs kyi bu gnas 'di rab tu mun pa gnag na/ khyod 'gro 'dod dam zhes grags pa dang / sdig pa can des thos pa dang / gnas der 'gro bar dag/ 
342b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems skyes te/ de ma thag tu 'phos nas lcags kyi khri la 'dug par gyur nas/ bya ngang pa'i rgyal po 'phur ba ltar chas te/ mun nag gi sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo // 
342b2(mdo sde): der phyin nas ral gri'i 'khor lo mang po ltag 'og gnyis nas 'phen te/ lus gtub cing gsheg go// lcags kyi bya chen po mchu rno zhing ring ba dag kyang / ri nag po de las babs
342b3(mdo sde): nas mchu rnod pos thal byung du zug cing thug go// de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po lo 'bum phrag lnga brgya'i bar du myong bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi nyi ma rab tu med pa dang / phar
342b4(mdo sde): tshun du rgyug cing snang ba tshol lo// de'i tshe rkang pa'i 'og nas/ lcags kyi sbrang chen po dang / gze ma rnon pos rus pa dang rkang la thal byung du zug cing phug go// de lta bu'i sdug
342b5(mdo sde): bsngal chen po lo 'bum phrag lnga brgya'i bar du myong bar gyur ra te/ 'jig rten gyi nyi ma dang zla bas bgrang ba'i lo dang skal pa'i tshad ni rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha dang mnyam
342b6(mdo sde): mon sdig pa can de mud nag gi khams der ni nag po kun la phan tshun du mgo bo thug pas glad pa rlugs te lcags kyi khyi rnams 'ongs te log so// mig gi 'bras bu yang sa la
342b7(mdo sde): lhung ste/ dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos mdung rtse kha brag pa thogs te mig gi 'bras bu blangs nas phyir mig tu 'dzud do// sdug bsngal chen po de lta bu dag myong nas/ ci ste thar
342b8(mdo sde): na yang dbul zhing 'phongs pa dang / dbang po lnga mi gsal ba dang shes pa med pa dang lus la nad mang ba dang / kun gyis mi 'dod par 'gyuraro// de lta bu'i rnam par smin
343a1(mdo sde): pa yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyuraro// bcom
343a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na rab tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad ce na/ rab tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad
343a3(mdo sde): ces bya ba ni/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bzhin du/ lcags kyi mkhar me rab tu 'bar ba rim pa bdun dang / lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun dang / gzhan yang
343a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi dngos po ma rungs pa tshad med pa dag yod do// gang zag la las dkon mchog gsum la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig byas pa dang / slob dpon la du/ 
343a5(mdo sde): ba dang / slob dpon gyi zas la gtsang sbra ma byas pa dang / slob dpon gyi khri stan la 'jug pa dang / slob dpon la brnyas shing smod pa dang / slob dpon la gso
343a6(mdo sde): rgyu byed pa dang / slob dpon la skur pa 'debs pa dang nga / slob dpon la rdeg pa dang / slob dpon la gso da pa dang / slob dpon la dug ldud pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa
343a7(mdo sde): byas pa dang / gzhan yang gang zag slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / pha mas bstan pa bzhin du mi byed cing log pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / byams pa mi shes pas drin
343a8(mdo sde): du mi gzo ba dang / gzhan yang mchod rten dang lha gang dang / sku gzugs gshig pa dang / dkon mchog gi dkor snang brkus pa dang / pha ma dang / phu ru dang / ming
343b1(mdo sde): tshang dang gnyen 'dun du gyur pa la sogs pa la 'tsho zhing gsod pa dang / chos ma yin pa rnam pa mang po byas pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dum byed pa na mnar med pa'i byem/ 
343b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba'i bsrungs ma bco brgyad kyis so so nas mdung rtse kha brag pa'i kha la bar chad re re khyer te 'ongs pa las/ sems can dmyal ba de dag gis bar chad de/ rin
343b3(mdo sde): bo che'i gdugs la bdud rtsi char spel ma 'bab pa lta bu la/ char gyi thig pa me tog dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / sdig pa can de sdig pa'i rnam par smin pas rab tu tsha ba'i
343b4(mdo sde): sems snying la gdungs pa'i tsha bas nyen pa las 'di snyam du bdag gdugs kyis bkab pa'i 'og na 'dug cing char gyi thigs pa 'dis phog na ci ma rung snyam pas rma
343b5(mdo sde): pa dang / de ma thag tu tshe 'phos nas rdo 'phangs pa ma gyi srid du ral gri'i khri la 'dug par gyur to// ral gri rnon po la me rab tu 'bar ba grangs brjod du med pa
343b6(mdo sde): snyed dkrigs shing bsdams te/ rin po che'i gdugs de yang mtshon sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gdug su gyur te/ steng na bab te spyi bo nas thal byung du phyed tshal du gsheg
343b7(mdo sde): shing dral te dus bu brgya te dum bu brgya so// char gyi thigs pa me tog du mthong ba de yang steng gi phyogs nas lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba char bzhin du bab ste/ ba spu'i bug
343b8(mdo sde): kun tu song ba dang / lus me'i phung por 'bar ro// srungs ma srin po bco brgyad kyis kyang mdung rtse kha brag pa thogs te sdig pa can gyi mig tu 'jugs shing / snying la
344a1(mdo sde): mtshon gyis 'debs pas de nyid du 'gyel te shi'o// de ma thag tu phyir yang sos nas ral gri'i khri dang 'khor lo'i steng du 'dug cing rlung drag po mas mgyog
344a2(mdo sde): par sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo // de'i tshe dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos gshin rje'i gnas dang bcas te steng gi na mkha' la 'dug nas 'di skad ces smra'o// / 
344a3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i sa bon khyod/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang slob dpon dang gnyen 'dun du gyur pa las mtshams med pa/ 
344a4(mdo sde): lnga dang / de dang nye ba lnga dang mi dge ba bcu'i sdig byas pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i sdig pa mang po byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas khyed kyi skye ba'i gnas 'di ni lce
344a5(mdo sde): 'byin pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ste/ khyed bskal pa gsum gyi bar du sems can dmyal phrang pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyuraro zhes smraso// sdig pa
344a6(mdo sde): can de'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gdungs pa'i tshad ni sngar bshad pa bzhi no// gal te de las thar na yang ngan song gsum gyi nang du skye ba brgyud de/ de las
344a7(mdo sde): thar te phyir mir skyes na yang ngan dgu 'tshogs par 'gyuraro// de nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis
344a8(mdo sde): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mtshon gyi 'khor lo'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad zhe na/ mtshon gyi 'khor lo'i sems can dmyal ba ni/ phyogs
344b1(mdo sde): bzhin ral gri dang mtshon cha'i ri yod de/ ri de dag kun gyi bar na ral gri dang / spu gri ka ma la dang / mdung dang shag ti la sogs pa nags tshal bzhin du dkrigs te/ 
344b2(mdo sde): steng gi na mkha' las kyang ral gri dang / spu za'i 'khor lo chen po khri phrag brgyad brgya'i rnams mthar gyis rang bzhin du 'bab bo// sems can gang gzhan la 'tshe
344b3(mdo sde): bar dga' zhing sems can gyi srog gcod par 'dod pa dang / sdig pa mang po byas pa dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe na/ grang nad kyis shin tu nyon mongs nas khong
344b4(mdo sde): pabar sman chen por zhugs te rdo bzhin du sra zhing rab tu gang ba dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi lto ba 'di dgri 'am/ ral gri 'am/ spu gri rnon po zhig gis dral te nang
344b5(mdo sde): 'di thang la phyung na ji ma rung snyam bsams pa nga / de ma thag tu dmyal srungs srin pos spyidro/ la ral gri dang / spu gri'i 'khor lo thogs te/ sdig pa can
344b6(mdo sde): gyi drung du 'ongs nas spro ba bskyed de tshig 'jam pos 'di skad du/ bdag la 'di lta bu'i spyad rnon po dag yod na/ khyod kyi lus la nad yod pa 'di ngas gcad cing dbyung na/ 
344b7(mdo sde): rung ngam zhes smras pa dang / sdig pa can des tshig de thos nas 'khor lo rnon po de dag mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ste 'di snyam du bdag ni rab tu tshim par gyur to snyam/ 
344b8(mdo sde): bsams pa dang / de nyid du tshe 'phos te mtshon gyi 'khor lo'i ri la skyes nas/ ban glang rmis pa rgyug pa bzhin du mtshon gyi ri la 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas phyogs
345a1(mdo sde): // bzhi'i ri yang phan tshun 'dus nas mtshon gyi nags tshal gyis gtub cing dmyal te de nyid du yang shi'o// dmyal srungs srin pos sdig pa can de mtshon gyi/ 
345a2(mdo sde): ri la bdas pa dang / ri'i rtse mor ma phyin par lus kyi yan lag kun dun bur chod kyang / dmyal srungs kyis 'jigs pas tshon gyi ri la gog cing 'gro'o// ri'i rtse mor
345a3(mdo sde): phyin pa dang dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos mtshon gyi sdong po bteg ste sdig pa can de la rdeg go// de'i tshe lcags kyi khyi dang lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyis kyang snying dang / klang
345a4(mdo sde): pe dang / rkang pa 'jib cing za ste/ phung po zhig nas sha kun zad pa dang phyir yang sos so// de nas yan lag bzhi la ral gri'i 'khor los zugs bzhin du ri'i rtse mo nas
345a5(mdo sde): phyir 'bab so// de ltar nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag drug bcu ni 'chi lan khri phrag drug cu 'tsho/ 'o// de ltar sdug bsngal rnam pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su
345a6(mdo sde): gtug pa ni rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i tshe tshad bzhin du gnas so// gal te de las thar na byol song gi khams skyes te/ skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du zas su rtsa dang shing za bar 'gyuraro// 
345a7(mdo sde): de las thar na yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du rigs ngan par skye ba brgyud cing skye bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzod dge bo'i gshes gnyen chen po dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed
345a8(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa de la ji ltar na ral gri'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba zhes na/ ral gri'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal/ 
345b1(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ni/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga bcu snyed la bar mtshams med par ral gri gtams pa'i nang na ral gri sdong po yod pa'i grangs ni 'bras kyi zhing ngam
345b2(mdo sde): 'od ma 'am/ 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin no// ral gri'i sdong po de gcig cing yang mtho khyad dpag tshad bzhi bcu yod do// ral gri'i 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed ni/ 
345b3(mdo sde): lo ma ltar 'phyang / ral gri'i 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed ni me tog ltar rgyas so// ral gri'i 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 'bras bu ltar gyur la/ lcags can
345b4(mdo sde): 'bar ba brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed ni sdong po'i yal ga ltar gyur to// de yang sems can gang 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyi dbang du song ba sems can gyi
345b5(mdo sde): srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ lus la tsha grang rnam pa gnyis kyi nad kyis btab nas 'di snyam du/ bdag gi lus dang ya
345b6(mdo sde): lag kun bar bar na ni shin tu tsha/ bar bar na ni shin tu grang nas lus kun 'dar zhing rengs te rdo 'am shing ltar gyur pa 'di la rdo'i mtshon cha lta bu zhig gis gtugs
345b7(mdo sde): te/ cha grang gi nad 'di bcad na brjod kyis mi lang bar shin tu dga' zhing tshim par 'gyur ro// snyam semaso// de'i tshe dmyal srungs srin po glang gi mgo can gyis lus
345b8(mdo sde): bsgyur te/ sdig pa can gyi pha ma 'am/ gnyen bshes lta bur sprul nas 'ongs te/ 'di skad du khyod kyi yid la sems pa ltar bdag la cho ga gsang ba zhig yod na/ 
346a1(mdo sde): khyod nyan nam mi nyan zhes smras pa dang / sdig pa can de rab tu dga' nas mos par gyur te/ la gor myur du sgrub par 'dod do// de ltar bsams ma thag
346a2(mdo sde): tu lhubs chad de tshe 'phos nas dpag chen gyi mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du ral gri'i me tog gi nang du skyes te lus gtub cing dmyal te dum bu sran ma tsam du gyur pa dang / lcags
346a3(mdo sde): kyi bya rnams kyang lcags kyi sdong po'i kha nas babs te/ mig gi 'bras bu dang / snying 'byin cing glad pa yang 'jib bo// gzhan yang dmyal srungs srin pos lag na star
346a4(mdo sde): chen po thogs te/ mgo bcom nas glang pa la lcags kyi khyi rnams 'ongs te ldag go// de ltar shi nas yang sos te bos pa dang / phyir yang sos te lcags kyi shal ma
346a5(mdo sde): ri'i sdong po la 'dzeg tu bcug go// sdong po'i rtse mor ma phyin par lus dang yan lag rdul bzhin du lhag so// de bzhin du sdong po de nyid la nyin yang lan
346a6(mdo sde): ri/ mtshan la yang lan re 'dzeg te/ nyin zhag gcig la lus rdul bzhin du gyur pa'i grangs ni brjod par bsre ba ma yin// sems can gyi rgyal po mi gsad pa
346a7(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i sdig pa can de la de ltar rnam par smin par gyur te/ de nas thar na yang lo 'bum phrag brgyad kyi bar du byol song gi khamasu skye ba brgyud cing skyes te/ 
346a8(mdo sde): rtag tu khal lci ba khur zhing shi nas kyang pags pa ba shu zhing sha khrag za bar 'gyuraro// de nas mir skyes na skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du rigs ngan pa dang / nad mang ba dang / 
346b1(mdo sde): tshe thung ba dang / shin tu dbul zhing phongs par gyur to// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po dang phrad nas bzod byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
346b2(mdo sde): kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na me'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad ce na/ me'i shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ zangs re re yang tshe khyud
346b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad bzhi bcu ste/ de'i phyi nang na me rab tu 'bar te/ 'og na yang lcags tshan 'bar ba'i 'phang lo chen po bco brgyad yod de/ steng na yang me'i 'khor lo che/ 
346b4(mdo sde): po dgu bcu rtsa bzhi snyed 'bar ro// sems can gang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas su gyur pa'i gang zag gam/ tshangs pA la rjed pa 'am/ khyim nas rab tu byung ba dag
346b5(mdo sde): bcu drug po 'am/ khyim pa yang rung ste log pa 'tsho/ zhing g.yo sgyu dang sdig pa mang po byas pa'i gang zag de 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na/ rlung gi khams
346b6(mdo sde): g.yos nas ba spu'i bu ga kun tu song ste/ lus chab brom ltar rab tu grang bar gyur pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag nam zhig gis dus na rab tu 'bar ba'i me'i phung po'i nang
346b7(mdo sde): na 'dug cing grang ba'i nad 'di rab tu zhi bar gyur na ji ma rung snyam bsam pa dang / dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin po rag shas me'i shing rta gser gyi pad+mor sprul te/ srin po/ 
346b8(mdo sde): nyid kyang khye'u gzhonu lta bur sprul nas/ lam na me'i shing rta pad+mor sprul pa dang / spang yab dkar po thogs te/ lus bsgyur zhing gar thabs dang sdig pa can gyi
347a1(mdo sde): // drung du 'ongs nas 'dug pa dang / sdig pa can de rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ gser gyi pad+mo lta bu de la 'dug par dga' ba dang / de ma thag tu tshe 'phos
347a2(mdo sde): nas skad cig ma dang po la me'i shing rta'i steng du phyin te/ lus dang yan lag kun nas kyang me rab tu 'bar nas/ me'i phung por lhung ste tshig cing thal bar gyur to// 
347a3(mdo sde): srungs ma srin pos sos shes bos pa dang phyir yang sos so// de nas me'i shing rtas lus bsregs cing gshegs pa ni nyin zhag gcig la lan bco brgyad ste/ lus
347a4(mdo sde): rdul bzhin du phye mar gyur pa la lcags tshan gyi khu ba char bzhin du bab pa dang / phyir yang sos so// de nas zangs tshan na lcagasu khol ba'i nang du yang gting nas
347a5(mdo sde): nas kha'i bar du mar 'byung zhing me'i shing rtas gshag ste nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag drug cu ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag drug cu ni 'tsho ste/ de las thar nas kyang shin tu dman
347a6(mdo sde): pa'i rigasu skyes te dbul zhing 'phongs pa dang / gzhan gyis bkol ba dang / gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur zhing bdag la dbang med par 'gyur to// de las thar nas sngon khyim
347a7(mdo sde): nas byung ba'i dge ba'i bsod nams kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de/ gzod byang chub tu sems bskyed nas chos bstan pa dang / de dag sems kyis chud cing yid kyis
347a8(mdo sde): rtogs te dgra bcom par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na shin tu dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal
347b1(mdo sde): ba bco brgyad ce na/ dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni tshe khyad dang / dpag tshad brgyad cu ste/ lcags kyi mkhar me 'bar ba rim pa bco brgyad
347b2(mdo sde): yod de/ mkhar de gcig cing yang bar chad bco brgyad yod do// bar chad de gcig cing yang ngos bzhin ral gri'i nags tshal 'bar ba yod la/ steng 'og dang phyogs mtsham
347b3(mdo sde): kun nas kyang ral gri'i so rab tu bsnams te/ ral gri'i so'i steng na yang lcags kyi gzem 'bar ba bstams te/ gze ma dang ral gri'i bar dang mtshams na lcags tshan gyi
347b4(mdo sde): srid bu grangs med pa yod do// srin bu de gcig la yang mgo brgya stong snyed yod de/ mgo de gcig la yang mchu brgya stong snyed yod do// mchu'i thog ma la yang lcags
347b5(mdo sde): kyi srin bu rtsangs pa brgya stong snyed yod de/ rtsangs pa de dag gi kha nas shin tu dri mi zhim zhing khol ba'i// lcags khu 'byin te/ lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i nang
347b6(mdo sde): yongasu gang ngo // steng nas kyang lcags tshan 'bar ba'i dra ba dang bla rer bres te/ de'i steng na yang lcags kyi bye chen po yod do// de dag 'jig rten na gang zag dus
347b7(mdo sde): khrims brgyad bshig pa dang / dge tshul pho mo dang / dge slong ma'i khrims bshig pa dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge slong ma dang / dge sbyong ma la sogs pa'i
347b8(mdo sde): 'khor bdun po'i tshul khrims bshig pa/ gzhan yang dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / slob dpon gyi zas la mi gzang ba'i lag gis reg pa dang / gtsang sbram byas shing phyi gzhod
348a1(mdo sde): // byed pa dang / 'khor rnam pa bzhi las gang zhig mi gtsang ba'i lus kyis dge 'dun gyi stan la 'dug pa dang / mi dge ba'i las byas nas 'gyod tshangs ma byas par// 
348a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu stan gcig la 'dug pa dang / kha zas lhan cig tu za ba dang / dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin byed pa dang / de la sogs pa'i mi dge ba'i las ngan
348a3(mdo sde): pa mang po byas pa dag tshe 'phos pa'i dus byed pa na lus gla rtsi ltar shin tu dri mi zhim zhing mi bzod de/ 'di snyam du bdag nam zhig gi dus na gnas gang na dri gsung ngan pa 'di mi
348a4(mdo sde): khro bar 'gyur zhing / spos kyi dri ngang zhim po zhig bdag gi lus la rlung chen po phog na ci ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu srungs ma srin pos lag na bum pa ri mo can gyi nang
348a5(mdo sde): spos kyis bkang ba lta bu sprul pa thogs te/ sdig pa can gyi du nga du 'ongs nas 'dug pa dang / de la shin tu 'jo/ da cing chags pa skyes pa dang / de nas lhubs chad de tshe
348a6(mdo sde): 'phos nas rlung pos sa bus pa bzhin du dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo // rab tu dri mi zhim pa'i lcags kyi srin bu ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang
348a7(mdo sde): lce'i rtsa ba dang srog rtsa ba la 'jib cing za'o// de lta bur nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag brgya dgu bcu ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag brgya dgu bcu ni 'tsho'o// de las thar nas kyang ngan/ 
348a8(mdo sde): la dbul zhing phongs pa'i rigasu skyes te/ gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba dang / skye ba blangs pa'i tshe na yang rgyal po ngan par lta ba can gyi khamasu skye zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs
348b1(mdo sde): lus la mnar bar gyur te/ 'brum bu sna tshogs dang / shu chen gyi lus la gos gyon pa bzhin du 'gyuraro// de yang 'jig rten gyi mi chos bcu drug spyad pa'i dge ba'i rgyu tsam
348b2(mdo sde): gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de gzod rab tu byung nas spyod pa la zhugs te/ dgra bcom par 'gyur zhing rigs pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par
348b3(mdo sde): grol ba brgyad thob par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na chu tshan khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ chu tshan khol ba'i sems
348b4(mdo sde): can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ zangs chen po bco brgyad yod de/ zangs de gcig cing yang che khyad dpag tshad bzhi bcu yod do// de na lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor
348b5(mdo sde): cing bla rer bres te me rab tu 'bar ba'o// zangs chen po de ga kun gyi nang na/ chu tshan khol ma lcags khu'/ bar ba lta bus yongasu gang ngo // de'i 'og na srin po
348b6(mdo sde): lnga brgyas ni rdo thal gyi me 'bud de/ zangs de dag kun sreg go// rdo ba'i me lce rgyun mi 'chad par 'bar ba ni lan cig 'bar nas/ nyin zhag drug cu'i bar du mi 'chi ste/ dmyal
348b7(mdo sde): ba'i nyin zhag drug cu de 'dzam bu gling gi nyi ma dang zla bas bgrang ba'i lo khri phrag bcu gnyis// de ltar zangs tshan 'bar ba'i nang nas chu tshan khol ma lcags khu 'bar ba lta bu
348b8(mdo sde): slarar+ya mda' ltar gnam du yar te/ me'i 'khor lor gyur nas phyir ra chas kyi nang du lhung ngo // gang zag la la sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims bshig cing ltar rjed pa dang / 
349a1(mdo sde): sems can gyi srog gcod cing sha khrag za ba dang / ri dang 'brog la me btang nas sems can sems can mang po bsregs pa dang / gson por me ri bcug nas/ 
349a2(mdo sde): bsregs pa dang / sdig pa mang po byas pa dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na lus dang sems myos te dbang po kun 'gags nas/ lus bar bar ni me'i phung po ltar tsha khar bar/ 
349a3(mdo sde): ni chab brom gyi phung po ltar grang ste/ 'di snyam du lus chu dron zhig gi nang du zhugs te bkrus na ci ma rung snyams bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin
349a4(mdo sde): pos g.yog 'khor lta bu zhig du sprul nas/ chu dron gyi snod chen po thogs te/ sdig pa can gyi drung du 'ongs pa drang / chu dron de'i nang du 'jug par dga' zhing chags pa'i
349a5(mdo sde): sems skyes so// de nas tshe 'phos pa'i nang du skyes te/ de ma thag tu tshogs shing myags nas rus pa las ma lus so// de nas mdung rtse kha khrag pas blangs te/ phyir
349a6(mdo sde): byung ba dang lcags kyi khyi rnams kyis rus pa 'chos pa dang / de ma thag du phyir skyugs nas yang sos te snga ma bzhin no// srungs ma srin pos phyir yang zangs kyi nang du ded pa dang
349a7(mdo sde): zangs khol ma des 'jigs nas ral gri'i sdong po la 'jus pa dang / sha dang rus pa kun dum bur chad de zangs khol ba'i nang du lhung ngo // srog bcad pa'i dbang gis nyin
349a8(mdo sde): zhag gcig la lan gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'chi/ lan gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'tsho'o// de las thar nas byol song gi khams skyes te/ byol song gi nang
349b1(mdo sde): yang gang tshe thung ba'i gan su skye ba khrag brgya stong gi bar du brgyud cing len no// de nas yang phyir mir skyes nas rnam par smin pa rnam pa gnyis pa yongasu smin par gyur te/ nang
349b2(mdo sde): rab tu mang ba dang tshe shin tu thung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'khor du gyur pa rnams kyang tshe thung nad mang bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyang bskal pa brtsi ba dang bgrang ba las 'das nas/ ga
349b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de khrims lnga 'dzin cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na
349b4(mdo sde): thal chu'i sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ thal chu'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ chumar dpag tshad nyis brgya zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis snyed de/ 
349b5(mdo sde): 'og nas kyang ral gri'i so rab tu bstams la 'gram yang ralo gri'i sdong pos yongasu bsnams te/ 'og gi ting nas kyang me mur zab su 'dom nyi shus bkang
349b6(mdo sde): ba'i steng thal bas g.yogs te/ 'jig rten na gang zag gti mug can pha dang ma la bcu 'phrog byed pa dang / bskyed pa'i drin ngo mi shes shing lan blon pa'i sems med pa dang
349b7(mdo sde): bla ma dang slob dpon dang phu nu dang gnyen bshes la nu 'phrog pa slob dpon dang pha ma dang / mi bla mas bstan pa bzhin du mi byed cing 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur nas khrel/ 
349b8(mdo sde): ba dang ngo tsha ba med pa dag/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na lus rab tu brtse zhing grang ba'i nad kyis khong pa sbubs kyis gang ba dang / 'tshangs shing rab tu mi bde bar gyur
350a1(mdo sde): pa las 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di 'di ltar rab tu brtse zhing lhubs kyis 'tshangs pa 'di la thal chu 'jam po zhig gis bkrus sam bshal na ci ma
350a2(mdo sde): rung snyam sems pa dang / de ma thag tu srungs ma srin po 'bar bas bdag gi bu dang / chung mar sprul te/ lag na me mur gyi snod thal bas bkang pa thogs te/ drung du
350a3(mdo sde): 'ongs pa dang / sdig pa can des de mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ de ma thag tu tshe 'phos pa dang thal chu'i sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo // de nas
350a4(mdo sde): ral gri sdong po'i bar kun na srin po lag na ral gri'i so la me 'bar ba rnon po thogs pa mang po yod de/ srin po de dag kun gyis ral gri gzangs pa dang / 'jigs shing
350a5(mdo sde): srag nas thal ba'i nang du bros so// der yang gom pa po ma thag tu thal ba'i nang nas ral gri'i so bsta// mas pas rkang pa kun dum bur sran ma tsam du chad de/ 
350a6(mdo sde): ral gri'i sdong po las kyang ral gri char bzhin du bab nas/ ba spu'i bu ga kun tu zug go/ dmyal srungs srin pos mdung rtse kha brag pa thogs te de'i snying dang glad pa byung
350a7(mdo sde): nas shi ma thag du phyir yang sos so// de ltar sdig pa can des sdig pa mang po byas pa'i las kyi dbang des de lta bu'i nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag lnga brgya ni 'chi/ 
350a8(mdo sde): lan khri phrag lnga brgya 'tsho'o// bkres shing skom pas yongasu gdungs te kha gdangs pa dang / ral gri'i sdong po las ral gri char bzhin du bab ste/ kha dang spyi bor zug/ 
350b1(mdo sde): pas lto ba dang / rus pa yang thal byung du bshags te shi nas tshe 'phos so// sngon sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis/ de las thar nas
350b2(mdo sde): phyir yang mir skyes te/ rigs ngan pa dang dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten mi rtag par shes nas gzod rab tu byung bar gyur te/ mngon par shes pa
350b3(mdo sde): drug dang / rnam par grol ba brgyad thob par gyur te/ gal te sangs rgyas mi bzhugs na yang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka'
350b4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mtshon gyi tshul gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya zhe na/ mtshon gyi tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor yug du che
350b5(mdo sde): khyad dpag tshad brgya stong snyed yod de/ de'i nang ral gri sdong pos yongasu gang ste/ de'i lo ma ni spu gri dang / 'khor lo'o// 'bras bu ni lcags kyi thu lum ste/ ra
350b6(mdo sde): gri'i sdong po mtho khyad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// sems can gang pha ma la sri zhu mi byed pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma la sri zhu mi byed cing gnyen btsun du mi lta
350b7(mdo sde): ba dang / ngan du smra ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / sems can mang po la 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed cing snying rje'i sems med pa'i sdig pa can de dag 'chi/ 
350b8(mdo sde): ba'i dus byed pa na rnyog cing yid kyis gnas kun chags pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi rnam shes 'di thams cad kun la chags shing / lus rab tu na yang snying gi/ 
351a1(mdo sde): chags shing mi gtong na/ gri rnon po zhig gis chags pa'i snying 'di bcad na ci ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos de ma
351a2(mdo sde): thag du g.yog bran gyi lus su sprul nas drung du 'ongs te/ lag na me long thogs te sdig pa can de la 'di skad du/ khyod kyi snying la yang chags pa de me long 'di la
351a3(mdo sde): ltos shes smras pa dang / sdig pa can des bltas pa dang / me long de'i nang na ral gri dang spu gri rnon po yod par mthong nas 'di snyam du nga ni mtshon rnon po 'dis bdag
351a4(mdo sde): gi snying dngos kun la chags pa 'di bcad do snyam nas rab tu dga' ba dang / tshe 'phos te yi dwags kyi lus blangs nas ral gri dang / spu gri nags tshal gyi nang du
351a5(mdo sde): skyeso// skyes ma thag du lcags tshan gyi thu lum gyis spyi bor phog nas thal byung du rkang pa'i ma/ thil du phyung ngo // des khong pa nas glo snying dang rgyu long dang / 
351a6(mdo sde): nang grol kun tshig cing rul nas sa la 'gyel to// dmyal ba'i srungs mas mdung rtse kha brag pa sa la brdabs te/ sdong po la 'dzeg du bcug go// mtshon gyi sdong po de/ 
351a7(mdo sde): khar phyin ma thag du lcags mtshan gyi srin bu mang pos btogs shing zos pa dang / shin tu skrag cing spangs nas sdong po gcig nas gcig tu mchongs te/ lus rdul
351a8(mdo sde): bzhin du lhag so// de bzhin du mthar gyis sdong po kun la mchongs shing nyi na pas khri phrag brgyad ni 'tsho'o// de las thar nas kyang yul mu ge can du
351b1(mdo sde): bgal pa bang du nye ba'i 'jig rted du zan khol gyi rigs skyes te/ kha dang lcags kyi drim mi zhim pa dang / kun gyis mi 'dod par 'gyuraro// de ltar brgal ba brdzi ba dang / 
351b2(mdo sde): bgrang ba las 'das nas/ gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji
351b3(mdo sde): ltar na tsher ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya zhe na/ tsher ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad brgyad stong gi nang lcags kyi tsher
351b4(mdo sde): mas yongasu gang ste/ lcags kyi tsher ma de gcig gi rtsa ba nas yang lcags kyi tho ba dang / ti tsa dang skam pa grangs med pa yod do// de dag 'jig rten na so so'i skye bo dang
351b5(mdo sde): gang zag gti mug can dag zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / 'phra ma smra ba dang / dkon mchog/ gsum la 'khyal pa smra ba dang / ngan du brjod pa dang / mdo
351b6(mdo sde): sde zab mo dang bka' yang dag pa'i bden pa ma yin par smra ba dang / mi khyad par can la ngan tu snod pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na lce dang kha skams shing
351b7(mdo sde): ldulcags thung ba dang / 'di snyam du tsher ma rnon po zhig gis bdag gi lce dang / rtsa dang / yan lag kun nas khrag dang / chu ser phyung na ji ma rung snyam bsam pa dang / srung
351b8(mdo sde): ma srin po des sdig pa can gyi pha ma'i lus su sprul te/ lag na nor bu zla ba zhes bya ba la tsher ma rnon po yod par sprul nas/ sdig pa can de'i khar bzhug par
352a1(mdo sde): / gzas pa dang / nor bu de la chu 'babasas cing 'dzag par/ sdig pa can des mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/ bdag gi nyil la 'dod pa dang phrad do snyam nas/ 
352a2(mdo sde): dga' ste/ dbugs chad nas tshe 'phos so// de yang glog gi yud tsam gyis tsher ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal bar skyeso// der skyes nas dmyal srungs srin pos lag na/ 
352a3(mdo sde): skam pa 'bar ba thogs te/ lce drangs nas phyung ngo // de yang kyi glang chen po la lcags kyi thong chen po bshal te lce kun dral to// de nyid du tsher ma'i tshal dang / tsher ma'i/ 
352a4(mdo sde): sdong po rnams kyang dmyal ba'i rlung chen pos bskyod nas/ de'i lus la 'jug cing rdeg ste/ gshegs cing 'dral lo// nyin zhag gcig la lan drug brgya ni 'chi/ 
352a5(mdo sde): lan drug brgya ni 'tsho'o// de las bskal pa zad nas mir skyes na yang gzugs byad ngan pa dang / bzhin ma dog mi sdug pa dang / dbang po mi gsal zhi dag
352a6(mdo sde): lkugasu smra ba dang / lus la mdze dang shu ba la sogs pa'i nad rnam pa mang pos gzir cing rnag khrag mang po lus la 'dzag pa dang / skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du kun gyis
352a7(mdo sde): mthong mi 'dod par 'gyuraro// de las tshe 'phos nas phyir skye ba mi'i lus thob na yang smra ba'i tshig dang ngag sus kyang mi nyan par 'gyuraro// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen
352a8(mdo sde): chen po dang phrad nas gzod byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na lcags kyi sdong po'i sems can
352b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po khri phrag lnga brgya zhe na/ lcags kyi sdong po'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ lcags kyi sdong po'i dbyibs kyang me'i ri lta bu ste/ mtho khyad kyang dpag
352b2(mdo sde): chang drug brgya srid do// 'og na me rab tu 'bar te/ me de'i nang na lcags chan 'bar ba'i khri yod do// de'i steng na mtshon gyi 'khor lo yod do// mtshon gyi 'khor lo'i bar
352b3(mdo sde): na lcags tshan 'bar 'bar ba'i srin bu dang / lcags tshan 'bar ba'i bya yod do// 'jig rten na gang zag glen zhing gti mug can dag/ 'dod chags kyi bag chags che ba
352b4(mdo sde): 'dod pas log par spyod pa la dga' ba/ dus dang gnas ma yin pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byas pa dang / gzhan yang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
352b5(mdo sde): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ bram ze 'a ma/ de la sogs pa tshangs par spyod pa dag/ gal te du sa dang gnas ma yin pa la mi tshangs par spyad pa
352b6(mdo sde): dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i las ngan pa spyad pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ gzhu ltar rengs te rab tu 'dar zhing btso nas mi bzod par gyur
352b7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di lcags kyi sdong po chen po zhig la drang por mi 'gul bar bsdams na ci ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu dmyal srungs
352b8(mdo sde): srin pos g.yog bran gyi lus su sprul te/ lag na lcags kyi khar ba thogs nas sdig pa can de la 'di skad du/ khyod kyi lus sra zhing rengs par gyur pa de ngas mnyen
353a1(mdo sde): bar byams/ myong bar ba 'dil la sa shig ces smras nas spro ba babyed pa dang / rig pa can de rab tu dga' bar gyur nas mas cad dekyi chom so// 
353a2(mdo sde): lcag g.yabs pa tsam gyi chod na lcags kyi sdong po'i thog ma la skyeso// de la me rab tu 'bar bas gdungs shing bsregs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas 'og tu
353a3(mdo sde): bltas pa na/ lcags kyi khri'i steng na skyes pas bu mo sdug gu 'dug par mthong ba dang / bud med kyis skyes bu bzang po shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhig 'dug pa lta bur mthong ste/ 
353a4(mdo sde): chags pa'i sems skyes nus lcags kyi sna kha nas bubs sapa skye mtshungs pa dang / lcags kyi snong po su lus thal byung du drug nas/ lcags chen gyi drabs kyi
353a5(mdo sde): mgo dkris so// lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyis ni 'a/ rdib cing za'o// de nas lus dum bu mang por chad de lcags khri 'bar ba de'i steng du lhung ba dang / yan lag
353a6(mdo sde): kun nas me rab tu 'bar te/ lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyang mig gi nang dang dbang po kun gyi nang dang / pho smos kyi mtshan ma kun gyi nang du 'jug cing za'o// srin bu de dag la
353a7(mdo sde): khri phrag dgu brgya yod de gcig gi mgo la yang chu bcu gnyis yod de/ mchu de nyid las kyang me rab tu 'bar zhing de'i lus la za zhing 'jib bo// gang zag la la zhig
353a8(mdo sde): gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i las kyis gang dag tshul khrims can gyi tshul khrims bshig pa dang / mi dge ba spyad pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas de lta bu
353b1(mdo sde): nyon zhag gcig la lan khri phrag dgu brgya ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag dgu brgya ni 'tsho'o// ci ste de las thar nas yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du bya thi ba dang / phug ron gyi lus/ 
353b2(mdo sde): su skyes te/ de las thar nas kyang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du klu dbul po'i lus su skye'o// de nas mir skyes na yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du ma ning dang mtshan med dang mtshan
353b3(mdo sde): gnyis dang / mtshan 'gyur du skyes te/ ji ste dbang po dang ldan yang 'khor ngan pa'i ngang tshul can rtod pa dang bcas pa'i bu slad dang bu che/ sri gzhu med cing blo rman pa dang
353b4(mdo sde): bran g.yog bka' blo mo bde ba'i 'khor bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
353b5(mdo sde): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji lcags kyi tha/ gas zangs kyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag/ lnga brgya zhe na/ lcags kyi thag zangs kyi sems can dmyal
353b6(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ni/ lcags kyi khri me rab tu 'bar ba chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi pa gcig yod de/ de'i steng na lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba grangs med pa las lcags
353b7(mdo sde): kyi mnga' gzhu khri phrag stong snyed yod par gyur te/ mda' de nyid las me rab tu 'bar ro// 'jig rten na gang zag glen zhing gti mug can 'dod chags kyi dbang gis 'dod
353b8(mdo sde): pas log par spyod pa dang / pha ma la sri zhu mi byed pa dang / slob dpon dang bla ma la bkur sti mi byed pa dang / legs par ston pa la mi gzhol ba dang / sems can gyi
354a1(mdo sde): // srog bcad pa dang / bcod pa la dga' ba dag rnam par smin pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ lus kun 'dar zhing 'gul te btso nas mi bzod de bu ga drug
354a2(mdo sde): nas zag pa rnams zag pa dang / sdig pa can des 'di snyam du bdag gi nyal ma la 'di rab tu snyi zhing mugs te/ che bar gyur na/ bdag shin tu sra zhing grang ba'i mal la
354a3(mdo sde): bde bar nyal te/ gnyid cig log na ji ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / dmyal srungs srin pos/ mdung rtse kha brag pa'i kha nas lcags kyi khri la lcags kyi bar tang bting ba
354a4(mdo sde): khyer te 'ongs pa dang / sdig pa can des de mthong ba dang rab dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ lcags kyi khri la bar tang bting ba de la nyal bar dga' ba dang de ma
354a5(mdo sde): thag tu dbugs chad nas tshe 'phos so// de nas lca gas kyi thag bzangs kyi sems can dmyal bar skyes te/ lcags 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba khri phrag brgya stong
354a6(mdo sde): snyed lta 'og nas 'phen zhing dus gcig tu 'khrul zhi g.yos so// de las lcags kyi gzhu grangs med pa las lcags tshan gyi mda' grangs med pa zhig sdig pa can
354a7(mdo sde): gyi snying la phog nas rab tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de lta bur nyid zhag gcig la lan khri phrag drug brgya ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag drug brgya ni 'tsho'o// de las thar nas
354a8(mdo sde): kyang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du byol song gi khamasu skye'o// de las thar te mir skyes na yang dbul zhing phongs pa dang / rigs ngan par skyes te/ rtag tu gzhan gyis bkol/ 
354b1(mdo sde): ba dang / dgra sdang bas zin cing btson chas dam por 'dzud pa dang rtag tu rdeg cing 'tshogs par 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems
354b2(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na lcags kyi dra ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ lcags kyi dra ba'i sems can dmyal
354b3(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ni/ dmyal ba chen po'i gnas de nyid na/ lcags tshan 'bar ba'i dra ba'i rim pa brgyad cu rtsa dgu snyed yod do// dra ba de re re'i bar dang mig na khab dpal ma khri phrag
354b4(mdo sde): brgya stong snyed yod de/ khab de dag kun gyi rtse mo la lcags kyi khrul 'khor 'bor ba grangs med pa 'khrul zhing rab tu 'bar ro// de dag 'jig rten na sems can gang dkon
354b5(mdo sde): mchog gsum la smod cing log par lta ba dang / brdzun du smra zhing g.yo dang sgyus log par 'tsho zhing pha/ rol 'brid par byed pa dang rtag tu mi dge ba'i las
354b6(mdo sde): byed par sems pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe na/ lus dang yan lag kun rab tu g.ya' zhing gtso ste/ 'di snyam du khab rnon po spar gang gis lus kyi srin bu 'di
354b7(mdo sde): ngag gtsogs na ji ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos sman pa'i lus su sprul te lag na gtsags khab rnon po thogs nas 'di skad du bdag ni khyod
354b8(mdo sde): kyi nang 'tsho bar byed pa'o zhes smras te/ sdig pa can de'i sems spro ba bskyed de dga' ma thag tu lhubs chang de tshe 'phos so// de dag de nas lcags kyi dra ba'i sems can
355a1(mdo sde): dmyal bar skyes nas dra ba dang 'khrul 'khor rnams la drud cing 'dre'o// 'khrul 'khor rnams bskul zhing bskyod pa las khab dpal ma lta bu'i lcags/ 
355a2(mdo sde): tshan 'bar ba grangs med pa ba spu'i bu ga kun tu zug te/ de bzhin du lcags tshan gyi dra ba'i bar dang dra mig cig nas gcig tu skad cig ni 'chi/ skad cig ni 'tsho'o// de las
355a3(mdo sde): thar nas mir skyes na yang yul mtha' khob du sangs rgyas kyi chos med pa'i gnasu skye/ 'jig rten gyi tshig snyan pa bzang po yang mi thos na yang dag pa'i chos lta ci smos te/ 
355a4(mdo sde): mi thos so// gal te mir skyes na yang ngan song gsum gyi nang du brtsi'o// brtsal pa brtsi ba dang / bgrang ba las 'das nas gzo dge ba'i bshes dang phrad de chos thos
355a5(mdo sde): par gyur kyang sems kyis chud cing rtogs par mi 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa de de la ji ltar na lcags kyi khang pa'i sems can
355a6(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad can/ lcags kyi khang pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du song ba'i nang na sdug bsngal gyi mchog go// de la
355a7(mdo sde): lcags kyi ri chen po gcig yod de/ tshe khyad dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// ri de la lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba khri phrag lnga brgya yod de/ thu lum de dag re re la che khyad dpag
355a8(mdo sde): tshad bcu gsum mo// gzhan yang ri de la ral gri'i sdong po dang mtshon gyi nags tshal khri phrag brgyad stong snyed do// lcags kyi ri de'i shar phyogs na lcags kyi khro mon
355b1(mdo sde): ring po yul mnyam dka'i breg tsam cig yod de/ de'i nang nas dud pa nag po dri mi zhim pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ngo // 'jig rten na gang zag drug gsum gyi dbang
355b2(mdo sde): du gyur pa ser snas yongasu bcings pa 'dod cing chags pa'i sems rdo bas sra ba rtag tu g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho zhing gzhan la 'tshe ba dang / sems can mang po'i srog bcad pa
355b3(mdo sde): dang / sems can la mi rtag pa la mi sems shing nor zas kyi dngos po la shin tu phangs par 'dzin pa/ pha ma dang slob dpon dang bshes gnyen dang bu dang chung ma dang 'khor
355b4(mdo sde): la yang sbyin pa yongasu mi gtong ba dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ba cad pa dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ dbang po kunanyams te sgra yang mi shes nas/ yid la 'di snyam
355b5(mdo sde): du bdag shi ba'i 'og tu bdag gis zas dang nor la spyod pa 'di dag lcags kyi thu lum 'bar bar gyur ciganga'i khyim na 'dug pa 'di dag mun nag du gyur
