383a3(mdo sde): phug tu gyur pa'i nang na/ 'od srungs chen po de na rtag tu mi nyal bar 'dug go// slob ma rnams kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la gnaso// ri de sprir mgyogs pa
383a4(mdo sde): 'am rlung drag po ltar drang srong snying gi ri la phyin par gyur to// mo'u 'gal ya na chen po yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te/ klu 'khyil pa brgya stong sprul nas/ de la
383a5(mdo sde): 'dug cing klu'i kha nas me phyung ste/ gser gyi khang / ba brtsegs pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi khri dang / rin po che'i bla re dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
383a6(mdo sde): dan tshad med par sprul pa'i nang na me'u dag la ya na po DUR+Ya'i mi lta bur phyi nang gsal bar 'dug pa dag drang srong rnying gi ri la lpag so// shA ri'i bu yang mngon par shes pa'i
383a7(mdo sde): mthus gangs ri lta bu'i shel gyi ri sprul te/ shel gyi phug gi nang na dge tshul gyun te la sogs pa dge tshul lnga brgya dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phug tu bcas te/ gangs lnga/ 
383a8(mdo sde): bu'i shel gyi ris bskor nas/ shA ri'i bu shel dkar po'i phug gi nang nas gser gyi mi lta bur sprul te/ gser gyi kha dog gi 'od btang nas/ 'od rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
383b1(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ chos kyi sgra chen po yongasu sgrog cing dge tshul rnams nyan bzhin du yul der lhag so// ka t+ya ya na chen po yang 'khor dge slong lnga brgya dang / 
383b2(mdo sde): pad mo gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu mang po dag sprul te/ dge slong rnams de la 'dug nas lus kyi slad nas ni 'od zer chu lta bu byung ste/ chu mig lta bu'i 'od zer
383b3(mdo sde): pad+mo'i bar kun na 'bab kyang sa la mi zag go// steng nas kyang yang gser gyi bla re bres te/ dge slong rnams de'i nang na 'dug ste/ yul der lhag so// de ltar dgra bcom pa
383b4(mdo sde): chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum rnams kyang so so nas 'khor dge slong lnga brgya dang bcas te/ mngon par shes pa yang shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dag la ya na dang 'dra bar byas
383b5(mdo sde): nas steng gi na mkha' las 'phags nas/ ngang pa 'i rgyal po ldings pa bzhin du yul der lhag so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos gos bsnams lhung bzed bsdam
383b6(mdo sde): nas/ chos gos bting ba yang dga' bo lag tu bskur te/ bcom ldan 'das na mkha' la gom pas gsheg so// bcom ldan 'das gom pas gshegs pa na/ rgyal
383b7(mdo sde): chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po dang / brgya byin lnga'i dbang po dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu grangs med pa dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lar bdud bskor
383b8(mdo sde): te phyag 'tshal nas zha 'bring du chas so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mgur nas gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer btang nas/ 'od zer de las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas khri
384a1(mdo sde): / phrag brgya stong sprul to// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so so nas de bzhin du mgur gyi 'od zer btang ste/ de bzhin du sprul pa'i sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad stong
384a2(mdo sde): sprul te/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'dab chagasu na mkha'i khams yongasu btang ste/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ldings pa bzhin du yul der gsheg so// yul der gshegs nas/ rgya
384a3(mdo sde): pos sangs rgyas bsus te/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te gshegs pa mthong nas/ klu chen po bcu drug gis rnamakha
384a4(mdo sde): la sprin chen po brgyad nas 'brug sgra chen po bsgrags te ser ba phab bro// mig nas kyang glog la 'byin cing / kha nas kyang me phyung ste/ sder mo dang / lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas
384a5(mdo sde): dud pa 'thul zhing me rab tu 'bar ro// srin mo lnga yang mi sdug pa'i gzugs bstan te mig glog dang 'dra bar/ 'bar bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ngar
384a6(mdo sde): 'grong ngo de'i tshe klu'i bu zhig gis bltas na/ steng gi na mkha' la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongasu gang bar mthong ngo // / pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar me dang
384a7(mdo sde): gdugs pas/ sangs rgyas gcig la gnod pa bya bar chas na/ da ltar bar snang la sangs rgyas grangs med pa zhig bzhugs na zhes smraso// de nas klu gdugs pa can gdugs
384a8(mdo sde): pa'i sems lhag par yang skyes te/ bu la spyo ba byas nas/ da ltar sangs rgyas gcig las med na mang po ga la yod ces smra'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo
384b1(mdo sde): rjes rdo rje thogs pa grangs med pa'i lus sprul nas/ rdo rje mgo la me mgal bskor ba bzhin du me 'bar te/ me'i 'khor lo 'dab chagasu steng gi na mkha' las babs nas me
384b2(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar ba lcags khu dang 'dra bas klu ma rungs pa'i lus bsreg so// klu'i rgyal po des 'jigs shing skrag ste/ 'bros khung med nas sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i nang du zhug so// 
384b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi grib ma rab tu bsil bas zil dngar gyi chus phog pa bzhin du/ klu'i tsha ba zhi bar gyur nas na mkha' la bsdus na steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas kyis yongs
384b4(mdo sde): su gang bar mthong ngo // sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so so nas 'od zer grangs med pa stong ste/ 'od gcig gi nang na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa dag bzhug so / 
384b5(mdo sde): sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so so nas/ 'od grangs med dpa brgya stong snyed gtong / 'od de dag gi nang na lag na rdo rje rdo rje gsor bas yongasu gang bar mthong ngo // 
384b6(mdo sde): klu rnams kyis sangs rgyas mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyeso// lag na rdo rje mthong nas rab tu 'jigs shing skrag ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sti stang du bcas te/ sangs
384b7(mdo sde): rgyas la phyag 'tshal to// srin mo lnga yang de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal to// de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams kyis me tog mar da ra ba dang / mar nga ra ba cheran po dang / mar 'ju
384b8(mdo sde): shA ka chen po cher bzhin du phab ste/ mchod pa byas nas lha'i rnga yang rang rdung zhing / lha rnams thal mo sbyar ras steng gi mkha' la sdong ngo do// de'i tshe rgyal po de 'khor lnga sngo
385a1(mdo sde): dang bcas te/ bdug pos sna tshogs bsregs nas spyi bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mgon dang skyabs mdzad cing
385a2(mdo sde): lag na rdo rje 'di dag gis lus la mi gci bar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri phyung ste/ sangs rgyas la lag gis dar te/ phul nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
385a3(mdo sde): bdag gi mgon dang skyabs mdzad cing lag na rdo rje 'di dag gis bdag gis lus la mi gtse bar mdzad par cig nang zhes gsol to// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs
385a4(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs kyis mas bu la smra ba bzhin du klu'i rgyal po la spro ba skyed do// klu'i rgyal po dang srin mo yang chos kyi rgyal por btul to// de'i tshe rgyal pos khri mthong po btsugs
385a5(mdo sde): te/ khyad na rab tu 'jam po bting nas ras dkar po'i yol bas bskor cing / mu tig gi dra bas bla re/ ra bres nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs par
385a6(mdo sde): gsol to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zhabs btegs nas gshegs pa na/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po'i byin pa lta bu'i zhabs kyi byed pa las/ 'od kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 
385a7(mdo sde): byung ste/ sangs rgyas la lan bdun bskor nas/ lha'i me tog dam pa'i bla rer gyur te/ me tog gi 'dab ma'i bar na sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa snyed thal mo// 
385a8(mdo sde): sbyar te/ dbyangs du mas tshig su bcad nas bstod do// steng gi na mkha' la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rnams kyi zhabs kyi byed pa las 'od bkye ba yang snga ma bzhino// 
385b1(mdo sde): klu phra mo bcu drug lag na ri dang pha bong dang / gnam lcags thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/ 'khor mang pos 'jigs skrag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi nang du
385b2(mdo sde): zhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gtso ma lta bu'i phyag brkyang nas/ phyag sor 'brel pa'i dra ba'i bar na rin po che chen po'i pad+mo char bzhin du phab ste/ 'khor mang
385b3(mdo sde): po rnams kyis ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyas su mthong ngo // klu rnams kyis ni na mkha' lding gi rgyal pos 'tshig cing za ba lta bur mthong ste/ klu rnams na mkha' lding gis 'jigs
385b4(mdo sde): skrag nas sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i phag tu zhugs te/ sang sa rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas srog gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes smraso// bcom ldan 'das yol ba dang / 
385b5(mdo sde): nye bar gshegs nas dga' bo la gding ba thing cig ces bka' stsal to// dga' bos yol ba'i nang / du song ste/ lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas 'phrag pa
385b6(mdo sde): g.yon pa nas gding ba blangs pa'i tshe/ gding ba las gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa/ khri phrag lnga brgyar gyur to// gding ba gting ba'i tshe gser
385b7(mdo sde): gyi pad+mo la rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i khri phrag lnga brgyar gyur to// grwa bzhi sa la brkyang ba'i tshe grwa gcig la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mo khri phrag lnga brgyar gyur te/ 
385b8(mdo sde): pad+mos 'dab chags yol ba'i nang gang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che sna bduran gyi khri la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhug so// pad+mo rnams kyi steng na yang
386a1(mdo sde): // sangs rgyas dag bzhugs par gyur to// dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdund bsor
386a2(mdo sde): nas so so nas gding ba bting nas 'dug go// dge slong rnams gding ba ni/ bting ba thams cad bai DUr+ya'i sngur tu gyur to// dge slong rnams bai DUR+Ya'i stan la 'dug nas/ baiDUR+Ya'i
386a3(mdo sde): stan nas/ bai DUR+Ya'i stan las 'od byung ste/ bai DUR+Ya'i brag phug du gyur to// dge slong rnams me'i 'od kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ dge slong dag gi lus gser
386a4(mdo sde): gyi kha dog lta bur gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po des sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / cho 'phrul de lta bu dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar rmad kyi dga' ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ de
386a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te bya ga 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul mang po mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
386a6(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed do// gzhan yang 'khor mang po rnams kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal rgya gar skad du/ Ar+tha pa ra mA rba d+harma
386a7(mdo sde): bi dza ya nA ma ma hA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
386a8(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma lon par ga ya'i ri la dge slong
386b1(mdo sde): mngon par zhugs pa mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad
386b2(mdo sde): dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong dang / gyad drug khri dang / gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang / drang srong chen po
386b3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gdungs pa lngas yan lag chog pa lnga brgya/ yan lag dkar ba/ sha med cing rus mgo lpags kyis yogs pa/ lto zhar zhing sgra'i
386b4(mdo sde): khur khyer ba/ lus dgu pa/ g.yang bzhi dang shing shun gyon pa/ lag na ril pa thogs pa/ brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs gcig go// rgal bar 'dun pa rnams
386b5(mdo sde): dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta/ ra drang srong rnams kyi nang na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge
386b6(mdo sde): ste/ lug rnams kyi nang na/ glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa 'dra la/ srin bu mi khyer gyi drung na/ gnyi zla dang mtshungs shing / rtsa ka sha'i me tog gi nang na man da ra ba'i yal
386b7(mdo sde): ga dang 'dra la/ na mkha' lding gi rgyal po bya rog gis bskor ba dz+ra bar/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi nang na gnyis gyur du mdzeso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po
386b8(mdo sde): che gtong ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu med par mdzad cing / glo g.yas g.yor gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ de
387a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa bye ba dngag tu med pa byung / byu ba sems dpa 'bye ba lag tu med pa dang byed dang / rgyas pa dang / lam ma rgyang ba
387a2(mdo sde): med pabyung / gal pa na dka kheng bstsu'aM/ gang dang / gzong ma dang / sa bzhid dang / ngas paded pa la khyod pag tu me d+ma / 
387a3(mdo sde): sa snang ba dang / ngas rgya rgyal po dang / gis sngags 'acang dag tu me ba byung / rnal dang grags pa dang / wa~M lding ba dang / 
387a4(mdo sde): phyogs dang / nags khrod pa dpag tu med pa byung / rgyal chags shing sA la chen po lta zla dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag shing sal chen po lnga bu dang / mi gzugs dang / 
387a5(mdo sde): cha byad dang / mdog dang / smra ba'i skad sna tshogs pa ji snyed pa dang / lha'i ris ji snyed pa de dag tham sa cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las phyung ngo // de nas
387a6(mdo sde): 'khor chen po de the tshom du gyur nas/ bar tshun gdong du lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste/ rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nas/ rgyad thams cad kyi bar gyi cha
387a7(mdo sde): 'beb po// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba'i ting 'dzin las bzhengs te/ seng ge bsgyings pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzig so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
387a8(mdo sde): phyogs bcur gzigs ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la sdang ba de dag thams
387b1(mdo sde): cad lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu kun tu snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 
387b2(mdo sde): ji ltar byung ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
387b3(mdo sde): de logasu song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'dus par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / 
387b4(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag dang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po dpe med pa thogs te 'dir lhag so// de bzhin du lha
387b5(mdo sde): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma de dag kyang / bcom
387b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
387b7(mdo sde): mchod pa bla na med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas te/ pha rol tu phyir pa drug gis yongasu bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar
387b8(mdo sde): du yang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa phyung ba de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad/ 'og min gyi gnas man chad du mngon
388a1(mdo sde): bar phyung ste slar log go// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i
388a2(mdo sde): khung bu thams cad du nub bo// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa phyung ba de dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnamasu nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
388a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i phung po zhes bya ba stad las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa ge cig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
388a4(mdo sde): ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kye ma mi rnams kyis ni 'dren pa yis/ 
388a5(mdo sde): sngon chad ma byung mdzad pa sna tshogs 'di// skye dgu kun la/ myur du kun bstan pa// de yis bdud sde thams ca/ da mog mog bgyis// phan tshun dag tu tshig tu
388a6(mdo sde): sgra bgyid pa// kye ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi// bdag cag ci zhig phyir ni 'dir lhags ke/ bdag cag bcom mo bdag cag bcom zhes mchi// dka' thub
388a7(mdo sde): can bdag dka' thub can min gyur// nyam chung lus la lpags tsam zhig las// bdag 'khogs bdag skams bde ba rnams las nyams// bdag cag rdzu 'phrul
388a8(mdo sde): thob par gyur ma yin// yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul gsum rnams kyis// bstan pa'i dgra rnams mog mog gyur pa mdzad// bstan pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni// 
388b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad// 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur// dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste// gang zhig gnas nas
388b2(mdo sde): lha tshogs bdag cag kyang ka/ 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas gyur cig mchi// 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas
388b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkor// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis// cho 'phrul rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol// 'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig lags// thub
388b4(mdo sde): ba chos ni gang zhig gsungs par bzhed// 'khor 'di thams cad 'gyod cing mchis lags na// sems can thugs brtse'i slad du bdag la gsungs// de nas sangs
388b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ 'khor de'i nang nas/ drang srong chen po me sgron zhes bya ba gcig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung po la 'di skad
388b6(mdo sde): ces smraso// kye gzhonu re shig kha rog shig/ kho bo'i dri ba dri bar bya'o// gal te kho bo'i dri ba khong du chud par byed na no// de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ming dang yang
388b7(mdo sde): 'thun no// 'on te sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul pa byed du zad na ni/ 'dir ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ skyes bu ngan pa/ 
388b8(mdo sde): dang / sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis ni 'di grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis/ drang srong gi tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas/ drang srong chen po me/ 
389a1(mdo sde): sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po ci nus kyis dri ba dris shig dang / rnam par byang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
389a2(mdo sde): la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u ta ma sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung / ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur/ sems can rnams
389a3(mdo sde): gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur/ nang na sems can phra ba khru gang tsam 'am/ mtho gang tsam 'am/ mdzub mo tsam 'am/ mthe bo tsam 'am/ nas dang / gro dang / mon sran sde
389a4(mdo sde): dang mon sran gre'u dang / til dang / lungs 'bru tsam 'am/ sems can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po
389a5(mdo sde): sgron la/ drang srong chen po legaso leg so zhes/ leg so zhes bya ba byin no// drang srong chen po che bskal pa drug cu/ pa'i dri ba 'dri ba 'di ni 'thun pa'o// de na drang
389a6(mdo sde): srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ drang srong chen po me sgron gyi tshe'i tshad ni ma brjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na 'dis ji
389a7(mdo sde): ltar shes snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// drang srong chen po
389a8(mdo sde): gang nga la sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni/ yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkyen las skye ba dang / rga shi'i
389b1(mdo sde): bar du 'byung ba'o// drang srong chen po yang rgyu rkyen las sems can skye ste/ rgyu rkyen ni pha ma'o// drang srong chen po yang pha ma 'grogs pa ni de'i rgyu'o// gang gi tshe yongasu rtog+sa/ 
389b2(mdo sde): pas kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud med kyi 'grod du 'jug pa de ni de'i rkyen to// drang srong chen po yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug
389b3(mdo sde): bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni sems can no// nye bar len pa'i phung
389b4(mdo sde): po lnga dang / khams bco brgyad ni sems can no// drang srong chen po sems can yang gzhan la/ las kyang gzhan ma yin/ las kyang gzhan la sems can yang
389b5(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin no// drang srong chen po sems can ni 'grib ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yino// drang srong chen pos gsol ba/ kye go'u ta ma gal te sems can
389b6(mdo sde): la 'grib pa ma mchis/ 'phel ba ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas shi 'phos te dbang bsgyur du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
389b7(mdo sde): drang srong chen po de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma yin// gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin na ni/ dbang med par 'chi ba'i mi rig so// drang srong chen po gang ra
389b8(mdo sde): gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ srin bu mi khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar
390a1(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du sems pa'i rkyen gyis/ srin bu mi khyer gyis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byed dam/ sems ma dul ba ni dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin// drang srong / 
390a2(mdo sde): chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bri bar gyur na ni/ khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag khyi la yang yod cing // 
390a3(mdo sde): dbang sgyur la yang yod pa de'i tshe/ sems can la 'grib pa yang mi dmigs 'phel ba yang mi dmig so// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ go'u ta mas nyon mongs pa 'grib
390a4(mdo sde): par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po ngas phyin ci log dang bzlog pa yang med/ 'grib par byas pa yang med do// drang srong chen pos
390a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ gal te de ltar na khyod kyang dbang sgyur/ ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/ ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang
390a6(mdo sde): dbang sgyur ma yino// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ go'u ta ma bka' mching 'di re shig zhog/ go'u ta me 'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa lnga sems can skye'o zhes gsung
390a7(mdo sde): na/ sems can mang du 'grogs pa las sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur pa 'di ji lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// drang srong
390a8(mdo sde): chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro// de las res 'ga' ni gtsigs
390b1(mdo sde): bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi lhag ma sa bon gyi 'os su mi 'gyur ba de ji lta bu/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma rlung dang nyi mas shing rtog rnams ma rungs par bgyis
390b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/ las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras bu rnams ma rungs par bya'o// drang srong chen po kha cig
390b3(mdo sde): ni mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe/ srin bu rnams kyis zos so// kha cig ni las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar byaso// drang srong chen po shing gis nyes pa ni nyung ngo // sems can
390b4(mdo sde): gyi nyes pa ni mang ngo // drang srong chen po yang sems can gyi khams ni yongasu rtog pas kun nas bsla dang ba ste/ drang srong chen po sems can rnams kyi sems dang
390b5(mdo sde): sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa la dmigs te/ drang srong chen po de'i phye bar sems can gyi khams ni yongasu rtog pas kun nas bslang
390b6(mdo sde): ba'o// zhes nga smra'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma de de bzhin te/ zhu ba brjod pa 'di ni rnam par dag go// ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ba bka'
390b7(mdo sde): stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pas sregs par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gal
390b8(mdo sde): bskal pas sreg par mi 'gyur na/ chos kyi dbyings gnyisu 'gyur te/ la la mi rtag la/ la la rtag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden par smra bar mi
391a1(mdo sde): 'gyu ro// drang srong chen po gang gi phyir 'di thams cad rtag pa ma yin/ brtan pa ma yin/ dbugs phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
391a2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i ming thob bo// drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/ 'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshan gsol pa ni 'thun no// bcom ldan 'das kyis
391a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gal te bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ 'di ni dus bzang po'o// 'di ni dus ngan pa'o zhes bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// 
391a4(mdo sde): drang srong chen po gal te yang bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas/ pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa tha dad pa med
391a5(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// drang srong chen po yang 'di lta ste/ bskal pa sa sreg pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ drang srong chen po sems can ji snyed
391a6(mdo sde): bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ba thos nas/ dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de snyed de bzhin gshegs pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lta
391a7(mdo sde): dper na/ kha chu ldag pa'i sprul ni mig gis kyang rngub/ rna ba dang / sna dang / kha'i sgo nas kyang rngub bo// drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de ltar blta ste/ sbyin pa
391a8(mdo sde): kyang sdud/ snyan par smra bas kyang sdud/ don spyod pas kyang sdud/ don 'thun pas kyang sdud/ drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ gser la gnod par bya ba'i phyir/ mer
391b1(mdo sde): / 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ gser dul ma yin pa 'di ji ltar na dul mar 'gyur snyam nas/ de'i phyir mer 'jug ste/ shin tu bsregs pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'os su 'gyuro// 
391b2(mdo sde): rin po ches spras pa de'i rin thang med par 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir gser brdung ba dang / bsreg pas rnam par sbyong ngo // drang srong chen po de bzhin du sangs rgyas
391b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rgyu med par sreg pa'i bskal pa mi 'byin te/ 'dir sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang
391b4(mdo sde): srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom da ldan 'das bskal pas sreg pa'i me phyung yang / sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni ngo
391b5(mdo sde): mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ sems ca na gang la yang gnod par mi mdzad do// drang srong
391b6(mdo sde): chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs bcu rnams char phra mo'i rgyun 'bab pa de bas ni/ drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub
391b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams nye bar gnas te/ rang gi lag gis sems can thar par byed pa ches mang ngo // drang srong chen po de'i tshe sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
391b8(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gzugs kyang mthong / kha dog mdzes pa yang mthong / bskal pas bsreg pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid sgrol bar yang
392a1(mdo sde): mthong nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrol ba por gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar
392a2(mdo sde): gzugs mdzes par gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar kha dog mdzes par gyur cig ces 'dzer to// kha cig ni yid byung nas sems rnam par grol te/ rgyun tu zhus
392a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid/ kha cig ni rang
392a4(mdo sde): byang chub kha cig ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob/ kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon/ kha cig ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye/ kha cig ni sum cu
392a5(mdo sde): rtsa gsum du/ kha cig ni mtshe mar/ kha cig ni dga' ldan du/ kha cig ni 'phrul dgar/ kha cig ni ga zhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang na skye'o// drang srong
392a6(mdo sde): chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bur/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang / khams
392a7(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po rnam su gyur te/ drang srong chen po rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du yang 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bu de bzhin gshegs
392a8(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing / bdag nyid kyang 'jigs pa chen po las sgrol bar mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing / byas pa shes par 'gyuraro// de
392b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid thos nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyuraro// thabs 'dis na ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// drang srong chen po yang sa bcu
392b2(mdo sde): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o rnams kyi mig lo/ sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de bas ni/ sems can gyi khams gang 'khor ba la chags skyon chags par
392b3(mdo sde): shes nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa ches mang ste/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir bskal pas sregs par 'gyuraro// de
392b4(mdo sde): nas drang srong chen po me sgron gyis/ rang gi yid kyis rnam par dpyad nas/ tshig tu smras pa/ kye ma'o gang bdag la drang srong chen po zhes 'bod pa/ shAkya'i sras 'di'i
392b5(mdo sde): che ba nyid ni rgya che'o// bdag gis 'di la bgam pas kyang chog ste/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen par mdo na gyis/ bdag gis kyang 'di la yang dag pa'i ming gis
392b6(mdo sde): 'bod par bya'o zhes smraso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas gyur cing mkhyen pa dpag tu ma
392b7(mdo sde): mchis pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsol pa/ sems can gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
392b8(mdo sde): drang srong chen po gnas med pa la sems can 'du bar 'gyuraro// mnyam pa nyid la sems can 'du bar 'gyuraro// drang srong chen po theg pa gcig gis 'byung ba la sems can/ 
393a1(mdo sde): 'du bar 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'dra bar 'gyuraro// drang srong chen po phung mo ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu sems can
393a2(mdo sde): 'dra bar 'gyuraro// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ chu klung chen po tha dad pa dang / krung phran dang / klung chen po dag rgya mtsho cher bor bab nas/ ro gcig tu 'gyu ro// drang
393a3(mdo sde): srong chen po de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed zag pa zad pa byed pa de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du gyur pas 'du bar 'gyuraro// drang srong chen po 'khor
393a4(mdo sde): bar 'du bas sems can 'du bar 'gyur ba ni 'du ba ma yin pa'o zhes nga smra'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gis bangs nas phye ma leb phyi phyi na la 'du
393a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ rlung med na so sor 'gye so// drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'a/ gyur pas phan tshun las 'brel ba'i sems can
393a6(mdo sde): gyi khams de dag kyang der 'du bar 'gyuraro// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bu phan tshun las kyis 'brel pa dag yi drag su skye bar 'gyuraro// dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur te/ 
393a7(mdo sde): der de dag tu 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po lha dang mi rnamasu de dag 'du bar 'gyuraro// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ thams cad mkhyen
393a8(mdo sde): pa mir skyes pa 'di sems can che ge mo zhes bgyi ba zhig dang 'dus par gyur to// dud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyi ba nas/ yid dgasu skyes pa 'di 'dus par gyur to// 
393b1(mdo sde): / zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po sems can gang zhig sems can gang dang lhan cigan
393b2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong na yid mi bde bar 'gyur de zhe sdang bar yang 'gyur/ des de mthong nas/ gal te na de glad pa na bar yang
393b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bshang ba dang / gci ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di ni sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// gang la la de ltar gyur
393b4(mdo sde): bdes kyang / bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu sems can dmyal ba rnams na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de lta ra khong du chud par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsol
393b5(mdo sde): par rigs gsal bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa du 'gro dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyi ma tshan mar 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'a/ 
393b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshe/ phan tshur mthong ba na 'khon du mdud par 'dzin cing 'di las bdag gis skyon ji ltar rnyed snyam du ston
393b7(mdo sde): tshol ba 'di ni/ drang srong chen po dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de/ bdag dang 'di lhan cig dud 'gro'i nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes
393b8(mdo sde): de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po yi dwag su skyes pa rnams ni dri nga ba 'dod cing kha zas la shin tu sred par 'gyur ro// pha rol la sbyin par bsams kyang chags pa skye
394a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// gang dag de yi dag su skyes nas lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa de'i dbang phyug mthong nas phrag dog skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan gyi nor la 'dod pa/ 
394a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ 'di ni yi dag su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu yi dwags kyi nang na gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// 
394a3(mdo sde): drang srong chen po mir skyes pa gang la la zhig tshe rabs gzhan dag la 'dus par gyur pa da ni des de mthong na/ 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di
394a4(mdo sde): ni mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la bradag dang 'di mi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong
394a5(mdo sde): chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag lhar skyes te/ 'dus par gyur pa las mir skyes pa de dag gi lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
394a6(mdo sde): pa/ drang srong chen po gang dag ltar skyes te 'dus par gyur pa de dag ni phan tshun mthong na lta ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/ de nas bdag dang 'di lhan cig 'dus par gyur to zhes
394a7(mdo sde): shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po rnams de lta bu dag tu sems can 'dra bar 'gyuraro// de nas drang srong chen po me sgron dga' mgu yid rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
394a8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smod par mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bslus pa'o// zhes bdag 'chad do// de nas yang
394b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me smon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po nang na sems can zhes bya ba phra ba ji tsam zhig yod ces nga la de skad ces
394b2(mdo sde): zer ba ni/ drang srong chen po gang sems can du dmigs pa de sems can phra mor rnam par 'byed do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ la la zhig gis dbus yo na/ 
394b3(mdo sde): la 'di skad du/ be skyes bu kha dog dkar po zhes bya ba ci 'dra zhes skan/ drang srong chen po 'di ji snyab du sems/ ma mthong ba'i phyir kha dog dkar po 'di 'tshu'o zhes de sgra / 
394b4(mdo sde): nus sam/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ 'brel pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de bzhin du ngas kyang dmus long ltar ma mtho
394b5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ sems can zhes bya ba ni phra mo 'di lta bu zhig go zhe sa sems can brjod par mi nuso// drang srong chen/ bo yang mig la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// 
394b6(mdo sde): na ba dang / snga dang / lce dang lus dang / yid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// 
394b7(mdo sde): drang srong chen po khams bco brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / 
394b8(mdo sde): phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po mig ni ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / 
395a1(mdo sde): dang kham dang / yid kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// rkang cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// zang grong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yang dran pa'o// 
395a2(mdo sde): 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// sems can
395a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yang med gzugs kyang med de/ drang srong chen po rdzas 'dus pa ni sems can zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o// yongasu rtog pa pa gang dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed
395a4(mdo sde): pa de dag ni srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag/ dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu me dmig so/ drang srong chen po gal te sems can yod du zin na/ 
395a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis shin tu chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ drang srong chen po gang gi phyir/ sems can med pa de'i
395a6(mdo sde): phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob ste/ de'i phyir ji lta ji ltar yang dag par sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar yang dag par 'grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
395a7(mdo sde): drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad drang srong chen po me sbron bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par bgyid do// bcom
395a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das gal te bdag bskal pa mu ma mchis par sems can dmyal ba'i zhugs kyi 'ob su gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ ri rab 'og min gyi gnas tsam du gyur pa
395b1(mdo sde): mthon po'i kha de nas/ bdag gis bdag 'dor bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gdung ba lnga bzhal pas sreg pa lta bur 'gyur ba 'am/ nyi ma bskal par gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ 
395b2(mdo sde): bsal pa sum cu'i zla ba gcig tu sbyang bar 'gyur ba da lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spro ste 'dun gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi srang du ni brtsond
395b3(mdo sde): 'grus nyams par mi bgyid ba'o// drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags pa de dag kyang stan las langs te/ bcom
395b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon par bgyi'o// rdo ci
395b5(mdo sde): thog gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// drang srong rnams kyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ bcom ldan/ 'das kyis smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes
395b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'od zer byung / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang sri mtshams nas 'dul bcad zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gi mthus sa chen po
395b7(mdo sde): 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon/ lho phyogs dpa'/ nub phyogs dma' na/ byang
395b8(mdo sde): phyogs mtho/ shar phyogs dpa' na lho phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs mthon byang phyogs dpa'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
396a1(mdo sde): pa'i steng du me tog gi char phab/ rnga bo che rnams brdung so// dri za'i bdag po yid du 'ong rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga'i sil snyan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
396a2(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do// lha'i bu bdug pa dri rab tu zhim po dag kyang rlung gis ngang bslang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dang ldang bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'
396a3(mdo sde): rnams rab tu dga' ste/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shal dang / se mo do rnams 'thor zhing rin po che'i char yang 'bebs/ me tog dang / 
396a4(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// lha'i tshogs
396a5(mdo sde): rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas/ me tog man da ra ba/ dang / man da ra ba chen po'i char 'beb so// tham/ sa cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang dga' mgu yid rangs
396a6(mdo sde): te ji ltar gyon gyon pa'i gos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to// de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya'o 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas man chad/ sems can
396a7(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yan chad sdang bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskor ba byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu/ 
396a8(mdo sde): nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyu ma mchis par shAg thub de ring 'dir// phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi
396b1(mdo sde): gtong ste// 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom gyur lags na// thub pas rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston// mi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas// dga' bar gyur cing / 
396b2(mdo sde): spro ba che gyur te// rab tu dga' bas lag pa bstod bgyis nas// kha cig 'di na bcom ldan legs shes mchi// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// nam
396b3(mdo sde): mkhar gnas nas 'byung po'i tshogs dang stong// mkha' las lha yi me tog char du 'bebs// rnga bdud rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
396b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod kyis drang srong me sgron mthong dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong
396b5(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor drang srong chen me smon 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang
396b6(mdo sde): po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya bar 'gyur ro// 
396b7(mdo sde): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor drang srong chen po brgyad khri ban
396b8(mdo sde): stong gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i rjesu thob ste/ rab 'byor de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rabs la
397a1(mdo sde): bcu la gnas par 'gyuraro// bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
397a2(mdo sde): bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu
397a3(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ skad dang skad ma yin pa shes pa'i ting 'dzin dang rgyal bas dbang bskur ba'i tingange 'dzin dang sgyu ma lta
397a4(mdo sde): bu'i ting 'dzin dang / khams rnam par 'byed pa'i ting 'dzin dang / blo gros rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ting 'dzin dang / mnyen
397a5(mdo sde): ba'i sa ting nge 'dzin dang bsam pa'i snying po'i ting nge// 'dzin dang / 'od gsal ba'i ting 'dzin 'tho/ ba bo// rab 'byor lha bye ba phrag gang ga'i
397a6(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag chad
397a7(mdo sde): med pa dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// rab 'byor lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
397a8(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang ga'i bye ba snyed dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du/ 
397b1(mdo sde): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de mthong nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi ljags
397b2(mdo sde): kyi dbang pos gakhebs par mdzad de/ ljags kyi dbang po de las kha dog dum kha dag tha dad pa'i 'od bar 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / 
397b3(mdo sde): dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang // shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med
397b4(mdo sde): pa dag tu mngon par byung nas srung log/  ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su rub bo// 
397b5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zo gros mi bzad pa stan las langs te bla gos phra/ ga btsog tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
397b6(mdo sde): ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
397b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzub pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ 
397b8(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ma dad pa'i
398a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi don tu ljags 'di lta bu ni brdzun mi gsung ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyiraljags kyi dbang po 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom
398a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su
398a3(mdo sde): bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam snyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
398a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyad la snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su mya ngan las
398a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi bar du gang zhig gis bde bar sbyar ba/ thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ yongasu/ mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod
398a6(mdo sde): ni byed pa de bas/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// rigs kyi nga/ 
398a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na/ gang zhig dang ba'i sems kyis leg so zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod par 'gyur ro// 
398a8(mdo sde): gang gis 'di la rim gro byas pa des nga la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par gzigs nas
398b1(mdo sde): 'di ga kyis bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dgang ni bden pa sgra bte/ sa phyogs gang nachos kyi ma grangs 'ang grags pa'i sa phyogs de la rangs rgyas pangs
398b2(mdo sde): cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i sems can rnams kyi slad du gyur par 'gyuraro// gang gis chos kyi rnam
398b3(mdo sde): grangs 'di lan gsum brjod dmabarjod du bcug na/ des ston pa la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskur bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zhig chos kyi
398b4(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde rab dang bcas bzhin du/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs
398b5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod kyang bzung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can
398b6(mdo sde): dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
398b7(mdo sde): rnams skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang gis sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du chos kyi
398b8(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dang dam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam
399a1(mdo sde): kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de'i lag tu byang chub song ngo zhes bshad do// 
399a2(mdo sde): des mig lnga thob par 'gyur/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa brjod pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub
399a3(mdo sde): pa'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi snying po'i ting 'dzin dang / gtsug gi nor bu'i phyag
399a4(mdo sde): rgyu'i ting 'dzin dang dbang bskur ba'i ting 'dzin dang spyad ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur/ yi ge med pa'i za ma
399a5(mdo sde): rtog gi gzungs thob par 'gyur/ chos tham/ sa cad la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa'i gzungs dang the tsom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang / 
399a6(mdo sde): don dam pa rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa'i gzungs dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro// 
399a7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsams bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yong su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
399a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa khyod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu gtang
399b1(mdo sde): kyis yang dang yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu shod cig/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la sti stang byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang // 
399b2(mdo sde): rim gro byas pa dang / mchod pa bya la de ji snyam du sems/ 'jam dpal dge ba'i rtsa ba de la mtha' 'am/ mu yod dam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dpag par nus
399b3(mdo sde): sam 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
399b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gang gis snyigs ma lnga'i dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir rgyas par byed par 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba
399b5(mdo sde): chen por 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa mang po de snyed cig/ lan bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang
399b6(mdo sde): sbyin gsos sman dang ga kha yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston par mi byed na/ khyod da drung du yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyes
399b7(mdo sde): ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la'ang phyag mi byed kyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par byed na/ 
399b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa'i bar du byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpa
400a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / drang srong chen po me sgor dang dge slong de dag dang lha dang ka mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
400a2(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg
400a3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang dA na shI la dang / bu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes
400a4(mdo sde): bgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tur d+harma nir de shan nA ma ma hA yA na
400a5(mdo sde): sU dz+ra/ bod skad du 'phags pa chos can bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 
400a6(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na/ lha'i bdun sa chos bzangs na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong
400a7(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu
400a8(mdo sde): bzugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byangs pa byang chub sems dpa'
400b1(mdo sde): / sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par
400b2(mdo sde): sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang / gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang rten gyi stobs so// de la rnam par sun
400b3(mdo sde): 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni mi dge ba'i las spyad na/ de la gnyen pa mang ba yin no// de la gnyen po kun tu spyod pa ni mi dge ba'i las byas nas kyang
400b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i las la shin tu brtson pa'o// de la sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'o// de
400b5(mdo sde): kha rten gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la skyangasu 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems mi gtong ba ste/ de stobs dang ldan pa la rten
400b6(mdo sde): pas sdig pas zil gyi gnon par mi nus so// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing
400b7(mdo sde): bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngos mdo 'di rtag tu klag par bya'o// kha thon du bya'o// bsam
400b8(mdo sde): par bya'o// bsgom par bya'o// mang du bya'o// des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
401a1(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang dge slong de dag dang byang chub
401a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
401a3(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan
401a4(mdo sde): bo su ren dra bo sde dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du.Ar+ya
401a5(mdo sde): tsa tur d+ha ma kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang
401a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal
401a7(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub
401a8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge slong dag byang chub sems
401b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi po 'di dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gi phyir yang yongasu mi gtong ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong dag byang chub/ 
401b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du byang chub kyi sems srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dge slong dag byang chub sems
401b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'
401b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzod pa dang nges pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dge slong dag byang chub sems
401b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi btang ste dge slong dag byang chub
401b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid mtsho'i bar du chos bzhi po 'di dag srog gi phyir yang yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
401b7(mdo sde): do skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nasaston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to// thams cad mkhyen nyid/ 
401b8(mdo sde): sems ni mi gtong zhing // mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cig/ bzod dang nges pa'i stobs la rab gnas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su
